story:
TONIGHT ON PRESSABLE DEFECTS

ANI-MIA!

 

THE PRESSABLE DEFECTS GANG IS HERE!

JUST ABOUT A YEAR AGO 3 DUDES DECIDED TO GET TOGETHER ON COMPUTERS AND TALK ABOUT COMIC BOOKS........3 DIFFERENT PERSONALITIES......3 DIFFERENT VIEWS......ONE GOAL..... BRINGING GR8 CONTENT AND INFO TO THE COMIC BOOK COMMUNITY....... THE PRESSABLE DEFECTS WERE BORN AND THE REST IS HISTORY!!!!

THE PRESSABLE DEFECTS GANG PRESENTS - BLACKY SHEPHERD'S VAMPIRELLA VS REANIMATOR SPECIAL EDITION!

STRETCH GOALS

A LOOK INSIDE "VAMPIRELLA vs. REANIMATOR" #1

Written by Cullen Bunn and Blacky Shepherd, with art by Blacky Shepherd

ALSO AVAILABLE...

story:
Here's your 2nd Chance to get this EPIC Story by Mike Baron!

The book is complete and will ship immediately upon receipt of funds from Indiegogo.  Some perks will take longer to ship and will be noted in the descriptions.

OFFWORLDER Cover A by Jordi Armengol

 

OFFWORLDER page 1

 

OFFWORLDER page 2

 

OFFWORLDER page 3

 

OFFWORLDER page 4

 

OFFWORLDER page 5

 

OFFWORLDER page 6

Written by Mike Baron

Cover A, Cover E, interior artwork, colors & lettering by Jordi Armengol 

Created by Ben Henderson

Cover B by Massimiliano Veltri

 

Seventh century Scotland. Henry Gunn leads his clan in a ferocious battle with Viking invaders led by the Savage Rathgar! Rathgar sees victory finally within his grasp. Gunn and his men, sensing that this may be their last stand, are saved by the approach of three unknown ships. The Vikings flee, not sure if the new uninvited "guests" are friend or foe.

Gunn and his men are saved by the fortuitous approach of Princess Sa' Ra of Alexandria. Sa' Ra has been sent on a mission to find a champion. One that she believes will aid her in her time of need. But the "Gods" have an even greater need for this man, Henry Gunn! And if he chooses to ally himself with Sa' Ra and these "Gods", he will be forever changed!

Will Gunn undergo the transformation to something other than human, and at what cost? The fate of civilization rests on the shoulders of a troubled warrior, husband, and father. What are you willing to sacrifice for all of humanity?

In the tradition of The Stars My Destination and The Silver Surfer, OFFWORLDER is a star-spanning science fiction saga that will keep you riveted from the first page to the very last.

OFFWORLDER Cover B by Massimiliano Veltri

Indiegogo Exclusive Cover E by Jordi Armengol

 

Rewards --

$5 -- Digital Copy only

 

$8 - Physical copy of OFFWORLDER Issue #1.  Choose from:

  • Cover A by Jordi Armengol
  • Cover B by Massimiliano Veltri
  • Cover E by Jordi Armengol - Frazetta Homage cover

Scratch & Dent copies are also available for a discounted price of $4.  Pics below show range of damage.  We will choose books at random.

 

 

NEW REWARD — Get Cover A signed by Mike Baron & Jordi Armengol (limited quantities) — $30 + Shipping.  This may take longer for fulfillment.  Books are currently in transit to get signed.

 

 

Will you pick the side of the Vikings with Rathgar & the Lizzersin?  Or will you choose Clan Gunn and stand with Henry & Sa'Ra?  — 

Choose your side t-shirt tier:

  • Henry Gunn T-Shirt & Keychain -- OR -- Rathgar T-shirt & Keychain
  • Your Choice of Cover --Cover A by Jordi Armengol; Cover B by Massimiliano Veltri; Cover E by Jordi Armengol - Frazetta Homage cover
  • Swag Bundle - Broderick Print, Sa'Ra Print by Matt Weldon, Coaster, Bookmark, Sticker
  • PDF of OFFWORLDER Issue #1

This tier may take longer because we will need to order T-shirts. Normally we have the orders in about 3 weeks, so hopefully we can still fulfill in July, but we marked as August just in case there is a delay.

 

 

Will you pick the side of the Vikings with Rathgar & the Lizzersin?  Or will you choose Clan Gunn and stand with Henry & Sa'Ra?  —

Choose your side All In tier:

  • Henry Gunn Jacket & Keychain -- OR -- Rathgar Jacket & Keychain
  • All 3 Covers --Cover A by Jordi Armengol; Cover B by Massimiliano Veltri; Cover E by Jordi Armengol - Frazetta Homage cover
  • Swag Bundle - Broderick Print, Sa'Ra Print by Matt Weldon, Coaster, Bookmark, Sticker
  • PDF of OFFWORLDER Issue #1

This tier may take longer because we will need to order the jackets. Normally we have the orders in about 3 weeks, so hopefully we can still fulfill in July, but we marked as August just in case there is a delay.

 

 

Add-ons

These are available as add-ons during checkout:

  1. Physical Books
  2. Swag Bundle - Broderick Print, Sa'Ra Print by Matt Weldon, Coaster, Bookmark, Sticker
  3. Choose Your Side Keychains - Henry Gunn or Rathgar
  4. Choose Your Side Jackets - Henry Gunn or Rathgar — available in sizes XS-3XL
  5. T-shirts — available in sizes S-3XL — Choose from:
    •   — Design 1 - Pat Broderick Cover
    •   — Design 2 - "Stonehenge" by Jordi Armengol
    •   — Design 3 - Pat Broderick Cover Line Art
    •   — Design 4 - Main Cover by Jordi Armengol
    •   — Design 5 - Frazetta Homage Cover by Jordi Armengol
    •   — Choose Your Side T-shirt — Henry Gunn
    •   — Choose Your Side T-shirt — Rathgar
  6. PDF of OFFWORLDER Issue #1

 

SHIPPING

We ship with Gemini and only Gemini. Gemini today and Gemini tomorrow. Gemini all day.  Did we mention we only use Gemini mailers?

We will bag & board all books, and secure them in Gemini mailers.

 

How can you help?

If you are able to contribute to our campaign, that is wonderful!  If you are unable to contribute by pledging, you can still help spread the word.  Please use the share links at the top of the page to help get the word out to others who may be interested in backing the campaign.

In either case, we greatly appreciate your support.

 

Risks and challenges

As with any project, there are always unforeseen circumstances that cause delays. Right now, the biggest challenge we foresee is the delivery time for the USPS. If you choose a tier with a jacker or t-shirt, it will take a couple extra weeks to get them in.

story:
THE CHRISTMAS ODYSSEY CONTINUES!

Last Fall, the first issue of BRIC-A-BRAC successfully funded on Indiegogo.

We met our main characters Garret and Marie as they embarked on their journey to find Father Christmas and save Planet Christmas from impending doom. That doom, almost single-handedly, was brought by General Almond and his army of Nutcrackers who were determined to take over the Planet and steal its resources.

Issue Two continues this epic story while adding more characters and obstacles! You will meet new characters like the ominous Jack Frost, the evil Caesar Dimitrius, and the Ghosts of Christmas Past, Present and Future among others!

Issue Two will be a 28-page comic book written by Ryan Haack, featuring interior art by Rafael Sam. The comic book will also include a five-page back-up story with art by Tom Barton and Milton Aguiar. 

THE CREATORS

WRITER/CREATOR - RYAN HAACK

My name is RYAN HAACK and I'm the creator and writer of BRIC-A-BRAC! Since I was a little kid, I was fascinated by Christmas and all the lore surrounding it! I loved the imagery, the decorations, the holiday specials, and I still do to this day! BRIC-A-BRAC is my attempt at creating a story that can show adults and children how valuable and important Christmas is as a concept! It's an incredibly useful holiday with ideals and values which we can implement every single day of our lives! I am so passionate about this story and had an absolute BLAST writing in the dramatic, fun, and always exciting world that is BRIC-A-BRAC! I am the host of the FAR-FETCHED STORYTELLING PODCAST and the creator of the web-comic the UNSPEAKABLE TEXT, too!

 

RAFAEL SAM: Born in São Paulo, and raised in Recife (PE), Rafael Sam has worked as a freelance illustrator and comic artist for 9 years. He has worked in the area of textbooks and also comic books, in cartoon style, concept art, and has made scenes for animations. Some time ago, he worked for DreamWorks Animation's comics division, where he made 3 editions of the Madagascar title. He recently worked on the catharsis-funded Black Desert author project where he made the official launch at ccxp 2018. His Instagram is @rafael1234hc. 

TOM BARTON: Tom’s been working as an illustrator for the last 5 years. He’s done several comics, including a short webcomic series for League of Legends called “Olaf Vs Everything”. His biggest influences are the likes of Joe Madureira, Chris Bachalo, and Ed McGuinness. When he’s not working on comics, he’s coming up with character designs, concept art, and writing his own stories. His Instagram is @tomo_tron

MILTON AGUIAR: Milton is a 21-year-old Portuguese artist who is the creator of RAPTOR and IMAGINACTION COMICS! Ryan and Milton have collaborated for years on many projects including LOVE COPS and HEY, DAYS! Milton created the BRIC-A-BRAC logo and designed the cover of the first issue. He will be reprising his role as designer in BRIC-A-BRAC #2. Milton will also be teaming up with Ryan and Tom Barton to draft several pages from our back-up story The Tragedy of Jack Frost! His Instagram is @miltonaguiarart

 

FAN ART! 

THE LOGISTICS

As mentioned before, this will be a 24 page comic book. It will be identical in design to the last comic we produced for BRIC-A-BRAC #1. Because they are so similar, it was very easy for me to calculate shipping costs and how much I will need to deliver the best product possible. Here's some breakdowns for those interested:

PRODUCTION OF COMIC (ART/LETTERING) : $3,400

PRINTING (ISSUE 2 and REPRINTS of ISSUE 1): $600

SHIPPING (NATION-WIDE AND INTERNATIONAL) : $1,000

EXTRA FEES (KICKSTARTER FEES) :$200

SHIPPING

This book will not be completed before Christmas, although we presently have about 20% of it done. My goal is to have it in your hands by January or February, which was the same time the books were in the backers hands with BRIC-A-BRAC #1.  The digital copy of BRIC-A-BRAC #1, the back-up story THE TRAGEDY OF JACK FROST, and whatever we have completed of BRIC-A-BRAC #2 will be sent to you once the campaign closes, so you can enjoy it with your family!

If the physical copy being delivered before Christmas is a deal-breaker for you, we want you to know that this story is about the idea of Christmas--not the holiday. On Planet Christmas, Christmas is every single day. It's about implementing Christmas cheer into each of our lives everyday, for a better tomorrow!

 

PLEASE HELP US MAKE THIS COMIC BOOK A REALITY!

story:
Story

Blanco Volume One: The Truth Shall Set You Free

In a post-apocalyptic future where man has long since been gone, and medieval kingdoms control their people with an iron fist, religious rule is the order of the day. And Blanco is one of the most beloved warriors in the kingdom of the seraph Azrael.  

He and his brother Cane hunt the heretics who dare defy their father's law. Zealots of a new apocryphal belief that is spreading across the Five Kingdoms and the Middling Lands.

When Blanco discovers a band of heretics is heading through the Outer Zone to a safe haven, they call New Eden. He decides to make an example of them, but what he finds in the Outer Zone will literally change his perception of the world he lives in.

 

COVER (Cover lettering and title design by Ivan Plaza. Cross designed by David Brame.)

 

Power to the Pulp

What we wanna bring to all of you is a killer, fun, and wild over-the-top graphic novel with good old melodrama. That combines the brutal sword and sorcery of Conan with great anthropomorphic characters. Reminiscent of Don Bluth's Secret of Nimh or Brian Jacques Redwall series of novels but in a post-apocalyptic adult world.

Hopefully, this will be the first of a series of original graphic novels set in the world of Blanco. A bit of pulp goodness you can read over and over. Just long enough to give you a fulfilling story but short enough so that you can enjoy them in between whatever life is throwing at you.

We're in a new golden age of comics right now with a wide assortment of genres hitting the shelves, but there are too many titles for stores, and they can't order them all. And even with the number of publishers out there, they can't publish them all.

 SO THAT'S WHERE YOU COME IN! Because we're also in another golden age of self-publishing. Thanks to IndieGoGo and Kickstarter, so many creators have been able to take their careers into their own hands and put out their passion project. Or a project they know has a fanbase out there waiting for them. Even when publishers have told them they don't exist. And that's you. You're that fanbase waiting for the world of Blanco, and only with your help can we make it happen.

 

What We Need & What You Get

The $3,900 we're asking for will all go toward bringing you the most beautiful and kick-ass graphic novel you will ever read. Jump to those preview pages below if you can't wait to see some of the thunder David's bringing to this project. Besides printing and distribution costs, the money will also go toward a page rate for the fantastic lettering by DC Hopkins and Kickstarter fees. 

What are some of those other perks? Well, we have two SPECTACULAR trading cards (check the images below). Besides that, we're offering a mini print (another gorgeous image by David Brame), an early bird special, and a 50% OFF perk for Retailers (in the United States) that includes FREE shipping. Find out more about all these amazing perks by checking them out to the right of you.

I believe so much in this book I'm paying for the trading cards and mini print in the tiers out of my own pocket.

Blanco Trading Card 1 

Blanco Trading Card 2 

Mini-Print

Blanco Preview Pages

Now what you've all been waiting for. What the hell does this graphic novel look like? Well, feast your eyes on these additional killer preview pages. I know there's a lot of hype on this page, but you can see in the art that David loves working on this book. Hopefully, you will love these pages too.

Look at all that energy, joy, and passion in those pages. This is definitely a comic book you want to give a chance. Every volume is going to be worth your hard-earned money. Because that's what it's about. Giving you something that at the end of the read you can say was worth every dollar you tossed down for it.

 

UPDATE!

Since we blew past $1500, EVERY backer (except digital) will get for FREE the first of the Blanco Origin trading cards. This isn't part of any tier and won't be part of any stretch goal. The below image is what will be on the front of the card. These are early designs David Brame did back in 2010! This is how long this journey has been. Now, if we get to $2000 by Tuesday 3/16 at 1130am, then I'll be throwing in a SECOND Blanco Origin trading card. Can we do this?! YES, WE CAN! Spread the word! Up your pledge! Help us bring you the greatest graphic novel of 2021.

ANOTHER UPDATE!

I honestly can't believe we've reached this number so fast. And way ahead of schedule too. But like I said, if we reached $2000 by Tuesday, then every backer (except digital) would get a 2nd Black Origin Trading Card. The below image will be adorning the card, and again THANK YOU to everyone for making this possible. We have 29 days to go (not counting today), and I feel we can surpass our initial goal and eventually hit that stretch goal. PLEASE keep sharing and let everyone know about the next great graphic novel of 2021.

MORE FREE STUFF!

$2725! We did it! We've hit our next goal! Every physical backer gets the Blanco Virgin Cover mini print! You all don't know how incredibly happy this makes us. And don't forget. Not only do all physical backers get the mini print, but you also get the Blanco Origin trading cards! Now onward to our ultimate goal of $3900!!! We got 21 days left, and nothing is stopping us!

 

Team

 Eisner Award Winner Marco Lopez (Writer/Co-creator): has worked on projects with Lion Forge comics for Nick Cannon and Ernie Reyes Jr. He then wrote a story for Zenescope Entertainment’s comic book horror anthology series Grimm Tales of Terror. Afterward, he co-created, put the initial team and talent together, and brought to Lion Forge, the graphic novel Puerto Rico Strong. Which he also contributed a supernatural story. Puerto Rico Strong sold out of a first print run of 10,000 copies, went into a second printing, and won (Marco and his fellow editors) an Eisner award. He then worked with Ivan Plaza Publisher of Chido Comics to co-create and write the hit Masked Republic Luchaverse license. A series of sci-fi and horror comics, starring famous Mexican wrestlers.

 David Brame (Artist/Co-creator): is proudly blackity black, an afro-futurist, and scholar. His most recent scholarly creative accomplishments for 2019 and 2020 include Sanford Biggers: CODESWITCH in collaboration with Professor John Jennings, The Bronx Museum, and produced by Yale University Press. He has also done scholarly work targeted towards black youth called, The Struggle, produced by Minnesota Press. He has a forthcoming graphic novel After the Rain, disseminated by ABRAMS/Megascope. It is a short story written by Nnedi Okorafor and adapted by Professor John Jennings. His comic work explores issues of race and identity in the context of the American South, Black Gothica, mysticism, and the African diaspora.

 DC Hopkins (Letterer): has worked with clients ranging from Eisner-nominated indie projects to major publishers such as Scout Comics, BOOM! Studios, DC Comics, IDW, Dark Horse, Image, Humanoids, Tor, Disney, Oni, and more. In addition to being a freelancer, DC is also a proud staff member of Deron Bennett's AndWorld Design studio.

 Eisner Award Winner Derek Ruiz (Editor): has worked in the comic business for 20 years. He began his career in comic books writing The Legend of Isis for Blue Water Productions before going to work at Dabel Brothers Publishing where he became the writer, editor, and publisher. As the former Publisher for DBP, he has had the honor to work with the best of the best in the literary world such as author George R.R. Martin, followed by Jim Butcher, Robert Silverberg, Tad Williams, Orson Scott Card, Raymond E. Feist, Laurell K. Hamilton, Monte Cooke, Patricia Briggs, and many others. His most recent project which is close to his heart was co-editing and co-writing a story for the Eisner and Diamond Gem Award Nominated Puerto Rico Strong.

 

Stretch Goals

What's a campaign without some stretch goals? Having a sweet and kick-ass graphic novel is one thing, but what about some additional goods to go along with it? But here's the thing. A lot of these campaigns want to throw at you free stuff (via stretch goals) that, even though they're cool, are just extras you might not care for down the line.

That's why we added the trading cards and our mini print to the tiers. Because that's where we want to be different. We want you to get us to stretch goals you will care about, and we aren't asking for some exorbitant price to help us get there. 

8-page Back-Up Story: At the end of the day, while we all love prints and trading cards, there's nothing better than more comics. And that's what we want to offer here. An 8-page backup story from Blanco's past. We'll travel back to when Blanco was a teen and the time he got in over his head. And ended up alone facing off against the terrors of the old world in a city long abandoned in a zone no one dares enter. Titled: BLANCO in DAMNATION ALLEY​

Stretch Goal #1 - $5,900

MORE STRETCH GOALS? Well, let's get to our first stretch goal, and then we'll talk more stretch goals. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We know not everybody can pledge. Especially during these trying times, we're in, but if you like what you see and still wanna help us, then share this page. Share it far and wide across social media. Maybe hit up your friends that can pledge. Comic book fandom isn't always about spending money. It's also about spreading the joy of something you love and something you think is cool. Hopefully, we'll be both for you.

Risks and challenges

Our goal is to have this book in your hands by September 2021. Throughout my comic book career, I've always had my back against the wall with the clock ticking when it came to the projects I worked on. I thrive on tight schedules. And if I could get those projects done with the little time we had. Then David and I can definitely get this project finished, printed, and in your hands by our estimated delivery date. But if any issues do arise, we will let you know and keep you constantly updated. Because our number one goal is getting this book out and showing you that we're creators you can trust and that Blanco is a comic book you want to keep on reading.
story_txt:
Story

Blanco Volume One: The Truth Shall Set You Free
In a post-apocalyptic future where man has long since been gone, and medieval kingdoms control their people with an iron fist, religious rule is the order of the day. And Blanco is one of the most beloved warriors in the kingdom of the seraph Azrael.  
He and his brother Cane hunt the heretics who dare defy their father's law. Zealots of a new apocryphal belief that is spreading across the Five Kingdoms and the Middling Lands.
When Blanco discovers a band of heretics is heading through the Outer Zone to a safe haven, they call New Eden. He decides to make an example of them, but what he finds in the Outer Zone will literally change his perception of the world he lives in.
 
COVER (Cover lettering and title design by Ivan Plaza. Cross designed by David Brame.)

 
Power to the Pulp
What we wanna bring to all of you is a killer, fun, and wild over-the-top graphic novel with good old melodrama. That combines the brutal sword and sorcery of Conan with great anthropomorphic characters. Reminiscent of Don Bluth's Secret of Nimh or Brian Jacques Redwall series of novels but in a post-apocalyptic adult world.
Hopefully, this will be the first of a series of original graphic novels set in the world of Blanco. A bit of pulp goodness you can read over and over. Just long enough to give you a fulfilling story but short enough so that you can enjoy them in between whatever life is throwing at you.
We're in a new golden age of comics right now with a wide assortment of genres hitting the shelves, but there are too many titles for stores, and they can't order them all. And even with the number of publishers out there, they can't publish them all.
 SO THAT'S WHERE YOU COME IN! Because we're also in another golden age of self-publishing. Thanks to IndieGoGo and Kickstarter, so many creators have been able to take their careers into their own hands and put out their passion project. Or a project they know has a fanbase out there waiting for them. Even when publishers have told them they don't exist. And that's you. You're that fanbase waiting for the world of Blanco, and only with your help can we make it happen.

 
What We Need & What You Get
The $3,900 we're asking for will all go toward bringing you the most beautiful and kick-ass graphic novel you will ever read. Jump to those preview pages below if you can't wait to see some of the thunder David's bringing to this project. Besides printing and distribution costs, the money will also go toward a page rate for the fantastic lettering by DC Hopkins and Kickstarter fees. 
What are some of those other perks? Well, we have two SPECTACULAR trading cards (check the images below). Besides that, we're offering a mini print (another gorgeous image by David Brame), an early bird special, and a 50% OFF perk for Retailers (in the United States) that includes FREE shipping. Find out more about all these amazing perks by checking them out to the right of you.
I believe so much in this book I'm paying for the trading cards and mini print in the tiers out of my own pocket.
Blanco Trading Card 1 

Blanco Trading Card 2 

Mini-Print

Blanco Preview Pages
Now what you've all been waiting for. What the hell does this graphic novel look like? Well, feast your eyes on these additional killer preview pages. I know there's a lot of hype on this page, but you can see in the art that David loves working on this book. Hopefully, you will love these pages too.




Look at all that energy, joy, and passion in those pages. This is definitely a comic book you want to give a chance. Every volume is going to be worth your hard-earned money. Because that's what it's about. Giving you something that at the end of the read you can say was worth every dollar you tossed down for it.
 
UPDATE!
Since we blew past $1500, EVERY backer (except digital) will get for FREE the first of the Blanco Origin trading cards. This isn't part of any tier and won't be part of any stretch goal. The below image is what will be on the front of the card. These are early designs David Brame did back in 2010! This is how long this journey has been. Now, if we get to $2000 by Tuesday 3/16 at 1130am, then I'll be throwing in a SECOND Blanco Origin trading card. Can we do this?! YES, WE CAN! Spread the word! Up your pledge! Help us bring you the greatest graphic novel of 2021.

ANOTHER UPDATE!
I honestly can't believe we've reached this number so fast. And way ahead of schedule too. But like I said, if we reached $2000 by Tuesday, then every backer (except digital) would get a 2nd Black Origin Trading Card. The below image will be adorning the card, and again THANK YOU to everyone for making this possible. We have 29 days to go (not counting today), and I feel we can surpass our initial goal and eventually hit that stretch goal. PLEASE keep sharing and let everyone know about the next great graphic novel of 2021.

MORE FREE STUFF!
$2725! We did it! We've hit our next goal! Every physical backer gets the Blanco Virgin Cover mini print! You all don't know how incredibly happy this makes us. And don't forget. Not only do all physical backers get the mini print, but you also get the Blanco Origin trading cards! Now onward to our ultimate goal of $3900!!! We got 21 days left, and nothing is stopping us!

 
Team

 Eisner Award Winner Marco Lopez (Writer/Co-creator): has worked on projects with Lion Forge comics for Nick Cannon and Ernie Reyes Jr. He then wrote a story for Zenescope Entertainment’s comic book horror anthology series Grimm Tales of Terror. Afterward, he co-created, put the initial team and talent together, and brought to Lion Forge, the graphic novel Puerto Rico Strong. Which he also contributed a supernatural story. Puerto Rico Strong sold out of a first print run of 10,000 copies, went into a second printing, and won (Marco and his fellow editors) an Eisner award. He then worked with Ivan Plaza Publisher of Chido Comics to co-create and write the hit Masked Republic Luchaverse license. A series of sci-fi and horror comics, starring famous Mexican wrestlers.

 David Brame (Artist/Co-creator): is proudly blackity black, an afro-futurist, and scholar. His most recent scholarly creative accomplishments for 2019 and 2020 include Sanford Biggers: CODESWITCH in collaboration with Professor John Jennings, The Bronx Museum, and produced by Yale University Press. He has also done scholarly work targeted towards black youth called, The Struggle, produced by Minnesota Press. He has a forthcoming graphic novel After the Rain, disseminated by ABRAMS/Megascope. It is a short story written by Nnedi Okorafor and adapted by Professor John Jennings. His comic work explores issues of race and identity in the context of the American South, Black Gothica, mysticism, and the African diaspora.

 DC Hopkins (Letterer): has worked with clients ranging from Eisner-nominated indie projects to major publishers such as Scout Comics, BOOM! Studios, DC Comics, IDW, Dark Horse, Image, Humanoids, Tor, Disney, Oni, and more. In addition to being a freelancer, DC is also a proud staff member of Deron Bennett's AndWorld Design studio.

 Eisner Award Winner Derek Ruiz (Editor): has worked in the comic business for 20 years. He began his career in comic books writing The Legend of Isis for Blue Water Productions before going to work at Dabel Brothers Publishing where he became the writer, editor, and publisher. As the former Publisher for DBP, he has had the honor to work with the best of the best in the literary world such as author George R.R. Martin, followed by Jim Butcher, Robert Silverberg, Tad Williams, Orson Scott Card, Raymond E. Feist, Laurell K. Hamilton, Monte Cooke, Patricia Briggs, and many others. His most recent project which is close to his heart was co-editing and co-writing a story for the Eisner and Diamond Gem Award Nominated Puerto Rico Strong.
 
Stretch Goals
What's a campaign without some stretch goals? Having a sweet and kick-ass graphic novel is one thing, but what about some additional goods to go along with it? But here's the thing. A lot of these campaigns want to throw at you free stuff (via stretch goals) that, even though they're cool, are just extras you might not care for down the line.
That's why we added the trading cards and our mini print to the tiers. Because that's where we want to be different. We want you to get us to stretch goals you will care about, and we aren't asking for some exorbitant price to help us get there. 
8-page Back-Up Story: At the end of the day, while we all love prints and trading cards, there's nothing better than more comics. And that's what we want to offer here. An 8-page backup story from Blanco's past. We'll travel back to when Blanco was a teen and the time he got in over his head. And ended up alone facing off against the terrors of the old world in a city long abandoned in a zone no one dares enter. Titled: BLANCO in DAMNATION ALLEY​
Stretch Goal #1 - $5,900

MORE STRETCH GOALS? Well, let's get to our first stretch goal, and then we'll talk more stretch goals. 
 
Other Ways You Can Help
We know not everybody can pledge. Especially during these trying times, we're in, but if you like what you see and still wanna help us, then share this page. Share it far and wide across social media. Maybe hit up your friends that can pledge. Comic book fandom isn't always about spending money. It's also about spreading the joy of something you love and something you think is cool. Hopefully, we'll be both for you.
Risks and challenges
Our goal is to have this book in your hands by September 2021. Throughout my comic book career, I've always had my back against the wall with the clock ticking when it came to the projects I worked on. I thrive on tight schedules. And if I could get those projects done with the little time we had. Then David and I can definitely get this project finished, printed, and in your hands by our estimated delivery date. But if any issues do arise, we will let you know and keep you constantly updated. Because our number one goal is getting this book out and showing you that we're creators you can trust and that Blanco is a comic book you want to keep on reading.

story:
Overview

Testament is a 60-page fully colored graphic novel (a 52-page main story and an 8-page bonus story). Inspired by Mad Max and Vampire Hunter D, this science fantasy series takes place in the year 10,081 on the planet Von. Von is a harsh planet composed of five regions, each one ruled by antagonistic warlords.

The story focuses on Karl, an orphaned drifter and swordsman, who arrives to the region of Reinland on a quest for revenge. The region of Reinland is controlled by the oppressive King Albrecht. The King has started occupations in the other regions of planet Von in hopes of recovering the technology of his ancient ancestors, the Old Gods.

Chimera (Writer), Juliano Silva (Line Art), Marcos Martins (Colors), Eric Weathers (Lettering), Joe Ball & Marcos Martins (Cover A), Rob Willis & Adam Brown (Cover B), and Bob Stone (Logo)

Cover Art by Joe Ball & Colors by Marcos Martins

Cover Art by Rob Willis & Colors by Adam Brown (this cover is exclusive to Indiegogo)

SYNOPSIS

Karl sets out for revenge after the massacre of the clan of warriors who raised him. Later, Karl joins an underground rebel group made up of runaways, criminals, and ex-soldiers. The rebel group intends to overthrow the King and establish order to Reinland. Along the way, Karl learns of his bloodline and the power he inherits.

Progress

Line Art - 52/52 pages completed

Colors - 52/52 pages completed

Letters - 60/60 pages completed

Cover - 2/2 covers completed

Preview Ashcan - 12/12 pages completed

Bonus Chapter - 8/8 pages completed

More Interior Art

Stretch Goals

Recent Interior Art

Risks & Challenges

I have fulfilled three campaigns. You will receive your book and I will update you if I run into any obstacles. Transparency is very important to me.

story:
-------- PRINTS CLAIMED SO FAR: 5 --------

THE PRINT IS ONLY FOR INDIEGOGO BACKERS, SO GET YOURS NOW!!

 

-------------------------

Welcome to the
World of Whitaker Knox

Imagine having the power to visit the dead and see their last moments of life and the chaos that lies beyond. Now what would you do if you find your own dead body in an apartment that might be alive?

That was just book one.

 

Now-

In book 2, Knox finds his life shattered, as the horrors of the unknown haunt his every waking moment. The creeping evil from book one is always there, hiding in the darkness. Does the mysterious woman named Kay hold the answers to rebuilding what he's lost, or will she bring about the end of everything?

 

---------------------

Knox's story

Detective Whitaker Knox is a lost soul, living in the not so distant future, where magic is a reality. Knox considers himself a low level necromancer, and he uses that curse to visit the recently departed to solve their murders. It's a way of piecing his life back together, and after a recent tragedy, he's more determined than ever to fix his fractured past.

His colleague and partner, James Summers pulls Knox into an unusual crime scene. Five mutilated bodies have been found in a hollowed out apartment, that may not be part of this reality. When they discover one of the victims is actually Knox, he feels he has no choice but to visit his own death.

That decision begins a series of events that will eventually lead Knox back to his death in that otherworldly apartment, unless something or someone can stop the future. 

Your pledge is for issue 1 and 2 of a 4 issue mini-series. Issue 1 is 32 pages and issue 2 is 36 pages. Along the way you'll be introduced to dark dimensions, future timelines, creeping oddities, and an evil older than time itself.

If you're new to Whitaker Knox, prepare for a haunting story of death and redemption. If you're coming back to continue your journey, get ready for an even crazier ride. 

 

 

This is where Knox's journey began. Knox carries a curse that allows him to visit the recently departed's last moments. He uses this ability to solve murders, but it takes a heavy tole on him. His latest murder investigation involves 5 mutilated bodies in an apartment that might be alive. It doesn't take Knox long to find his own dead body amongst the victims.

 

This is the latest issue of Whitaker Knox. After the events of book 1, Knox is no longer the man he once was. He's broken mentally and physically, and he's heading towards a mistake that can do more than destroy himself. A woman named Kay claims to have the answers, and promises a way to fix Knox's life - but at what cost?

 

 

Randall Rozzell 

I'm a web designer, living in Raleigh, North Carolina. I'm married with 3 kids and quite a few pets. I've been writing for years, but Whitaker Knox is my first printed book that I've built on my own. I've been working on this for over 10 years in one form or another, and I'm extremely happy to be offering my book to you. Book 1 full-filled a childhood dream. Book 2 is gonna be a rollercoaster ride!

 

Silvio DB

Silvio is a fantastic artist, with a solid background in comics. He produces each page digitally, and I'm in awe of his talent. Silvio lives in Recife, Brazil and has been in the comic industry for quite some time, having worked with Bluewater Prod, Image Comics, Gov't Comics, Immortal Comics and several more.

List of previously published work: Legend Of Isis#7, #8 and #9 (Bluewater Production); Clockwork#1 (Gov't Comics); Out of our Mind (Comics experience); Meridien City (Alpha Girl Comics) ; Quest (Bad Cat); Time of reflection (self published-eagle award winner); The VIP room (Alpha Girl Comics) ; destiny (snap Comics), Mascate (Draconian - Brazil), Outlaw Territory V.3 (Image Comics); The Locksmith ( Self Published - USA); Cleansing the World - Flood Myths Around the World (Capstone Books); Gretel - Crônicas dos sobreviventes (Immortal comics ) -Cyberpunks (Immortal comics) - Ctchulhu is Hard to spell (Independant - USA) - Crossroads (Immortal Comics); Ninja -Japan's Stealthy Secret Agents (Capstone Books); Vikings Scandinavian's Ferocious Sea Riders (Capstone Books).

story:
No Gods or Lawmen are going to save the innocent.

It's up to The Devil Himself.

The Blocke family founded the town of Deepwell, and then tore themselves apart trying to control it. When The Gray Devil arrived, it was like adding fire to kerosine.

DEEPWELL: The Caliber Of Death follows the exploits of the Blocke family and The Gray Devil, the mysterious masked vigilante hell-bent on destroying them and their legacy.

Rafael Dantas and Mike Murphy are looking to deliver a 32-page full-color violent western epic, and we need YOUR help to make it happen!

This book is filled with MATURE CONTENT and is intended for ADULTS ONLY.

!!!NEW TO THE CAMPAIGN FOR A LIMITED TIME!!!

You asked, we listened! For a limited time, we are offering a SECOND alternate cover featuring Jon Malin's AMAZING pin-up! Once we close our Indemand store, this cover is gone for good and WILL NOT be reprinted. This is a one-time-offer specifically for THIS CAMPAIGN! So get yours while you can!

Our first SWAG BAG PINUP BY VINNIE TARTAMELLA!

Our second SWAG BAG PINUP BY THE ONE AND ONLY JON MALIN!

STRETCH GOALS!

$8K- Gray Devil sticker by @sixamcomics! UNLOCKED!!!

$10K- Pay bonus for Rafael Dantas! UNLOCKED!

*BONUS* Free second sticker featuring Myra Blocke by Peter Gilmore!

$12K- Jacob Blocke family portrait by @ETMadness!

$14K- Additional 4pg Myra Blocke epilogue drawn by Peter Gilmore!

story:
UPDATE 3/3

Our second Stretch Goal has been unlocked! Everyone will receive a digital companion soundtrack to WIREHEAD with music composed by Steve James and The Institute 91'.

Album art by Ben Soto

 

UPDATE 1/24

All FEATURED PERK Backers will receive an exclusive Fan Art Booklet, collecting all of the incredible WIREHEAD fan-art. This is available as an Add-On as well.  A digital version of the book has also been added as a Perk, as well as a two new Blood Realm T-Shirts (Sizes Limited).

You know their names: Jason, Freddy, Michael Myers, Ghost Face, Chucky, and Candyman. Now get ready for a new face in slasher horror: WIREHEAD. 

 

Story: Robert Geronimo (Blood Realm)

Art: Michael O’Shea (It Came Out On A Wednesday) & Geoff Elkins (City of Rot)

Letters: Wes Locher ( TMNT, Unit 44, Gods & Gears, Red Koi, etc.).

 

WIREHEAD is a black and white, 80 page graphic novel that will satiate any horror fan of the slasher genre. Fans of retro sci-fi will certainly enjoy this nightmarish tale with deep, twisted lore.

Cover Art by Michael O'Shea and Jose Exposito

Art by Geoff Elkins (City of Rot)

 

WIREHEAD oozes an 80s/90s aesthetic with its setting and plot twists, featuring spectacular gore and moody tension. The series also highlights the classic 80s obsession with slasher villains and big corporate conspiracies.

My childhood was filled with these classic horror flicks that we’ve all come to know and love: Nightmare on Elm Street, Friday the 13th, The Terminator, Halloween, and many more! Needless to say, they left a lasting impression and the nostalgia for these films inspired WIREHEAD. It is an amalgam of them all and pays homage to their influence on horror culture.

 

Ties to WW2

I'm a big history buff and always love to ground my tales in real-life horror. The twisted experiments that the Japanese scientists conducted during the war were some of the most disturbing accounts I had read in a long time. What's even more horrifying is that the worst of those scientists were given immunity after the war. WIREHEAD's creator is Dr. Yuji Akastu. In exchange for his immunity, Dr. Akatsu must continue his research in developing an army of metal men!

The Cast

WIREHEAD - Designed by Japanese scientist, Dr. Yuji Akatsu, "Wirehead" is the doctor's first successful prototype of cybernetic creatures designed to serve mankind. However, after a severe malfunction in its operating system, Wirehead now follows a path of utter destruction across the Pocono Mountains.

 

NANCY - A resourceful, adventurous young film student that dreams of documenting one of the greatest cover-ups in history.  After learning of a secret laboratory deep within the Pocono Mountains, Nancy assembles her crew to investigate. 

 

DREW - Nancy's camera man and friend. Drew is a cautious individual and is known to crack under pressure when things get tough. He makes up for these traits with his expert eye behind the lens.

 

CHRISTIAN - A confident and thoughtful college student majoring in History. Christian is laid back and disregards warnings from his girlfriend when she tells him to be careful. 

 

SAMANTHA - Christian's girlfriend. She has a quick tongue and a sharp wit. She wants to enjoy life, party with her friends, and doesn't want the responsibility of watching after her younger sisters.

 

MICHELLE - Samantha's middle sister. She's brash in personality and dreams of being a model. Her and Samantha butt heads more often than not.

 

KELLY - The youngest of the sisters. She keeps to herself and isn't as brash as her siblings. 

 

Stretch Goals:

  • $10,000 - BONUS Story Added. UNLOCKED!
  • $11,000 - Expanded WIREHEAD Soundtrack. UNLOCKED!
  • $12,000 - UV Spotting Added.
  • $20,000 - Matte Coated Interior.

 

Backer Bonuses:

  • 100 Backers - Art Print by Vince Rush. UNLOCKED!
  • 150 Backers - Art Print by Michael Odom UNLOCKED!
  • 200 Backers - Digital Companion Track by Institute 91' UNLOCKED!

 

Add-Ons:

Special add-ons are available once you make your main selection, like prints, Blood Realm comics, commissions, and more. This à la carte system will allow you to completely customize your reward selection and build your own bundle!

 

PRINTS:

Art Prints are 6" x 9"

Art by Kristian Rossi

 

Art by Robert Geronimo 

 

Art by Ryan Winn

T-SHIRT:

 

TRADING CARD:

COMMISION GALLERY:

Robert Geronimo Commission Gallery 

 

Michael O'Shea Commission Gallery 

Preston Acevedo Original Artwork

Original Cover Art by Michael O'Shea

 

What We Need & What You Get

The goal of this campaign is to be able to finance the creation of this book. We need your financial support for the art, lettering, and printing costs.

 

Risks & Challenges

The script for WIREHEAD is complete and the first chapter is penciled and inked. At the rate we're heading, the book will be complete MARCH 2021. 

Thank you in advance for your generosity, loyalty, and dedication!
story_txt:
UPDATE 3/3
Our second Stretch Goal has been unlocked! Everyone will receive a digital companion soundtrack to WIREHEAD with music composed by Steve James and The Institute 91'.

Album art by Ben Soto
 
UPDATE 1/24
All FEATURED PERK Backers will receive an exclusive Fan Art Booklet, collecting all of the incredible WIREHEAD fan-art. This is available as an Add-On as well.  A digital version of the book has also been added as a Perk, as well as a two new Blood Realm T-Shirts (Sizes Limited).



You know their names: Jason, Freddy, Michael Myers, Ghost Face, Chucky, and Candyman. Now get ready for a new face in slasher horror: WIREHEAD. 
 
Story: Robert Geronimo (Blood Realm)
Art: Michael O’Shea (It Came Out On A Wednesday) & Geoff Elkins (City of Rot)
Letters: Wes Locher ( TMNT, Unit 44, Gods & Gears, Red Koi, etc.). 
 
WIREHEAD is a black and white, 80 page graphic novel that will satiate any horror fan of the slasher genre. Fans of retro sci-fi will certainly enjoy this nightmarish tale with deep, twisted lore.

Cover Art by Michael O'Shea and Jose Exposito

Art by Geoff Elkins (City of Rot)
 

WIREHEAD oozes an 80s/90s aesthetic with its setting and plot twists, featuring spectacular gore and moody tension. The series also highlights the classic 80s obsession with slasher villains and big corporate conspiracies.
My childhood was filled with these classic horror flicks that we’ve all come to know and love: Nightmare on Elm Street, Friday the 13th, The Terminator, Halloween, and many more! Needless to say, they left a lasting impression and the nostalgia for these films inspired WIREHEAD. It is an amalgam of them all and pays homage to their influence on horror culture.
 


Ties to WW2
I'm a big history buff and always love to ground my tales in real-life horror. The twisted experiments that the Japanese scientists conducted during the war were some of the most disturbing accounts I had read in a long time. What's even more horrifying is that the worst of those scientists were given immunity after the war. WIREHEAD's creator is Dr. Yuji Akastu. In exchange for his immunity, Dr. Akatsu must continue his research in developing an army of metal men!
The Cast

WIREHEAD - Designed by Japanese scientist, Dr. Yuji Akatsu, "Wirehead" is the doctor's first successful prototype of cybernetic creatures designed to serve mankind. However, after a severe malfunction in its operating system, Wirehead now follows a path of utter destruction across the Pocono Mountains.
 

NANCY - A resourceful, adventurous young film student that dreams of documenting one of the greatest cover-ups in history.  After learning of a secret laboratory deep within the Pocono Mountains, Nancy assembles her crew to investigate. 
 

DREW - Nancy's camera man and friend. Drew is a cautious individual and is known to crack under pressure when things get tough. He makes up for these traits with his expert eye behind the lens.
 

CHRISTIAN - A confident and thoughtful college student majoring in History. Christian is laid back and disregards warnings from his girlfriend when she tells him to be careful. 
 

SAMANTHA - Christian's girlfriend. She has a quick tongue and a sharp wit. She wants to enjoy life, party with her friends, and doesn't want the responsibility of watching after her younger sisters.
 

MICHELLE - Samantha's middle sister. She's brash in personality and dreams of being a model. Her and Samantha butt heads more often than not.
 

KELLY - The youngest of the sisters. She keeps to herself and isn't as brash as her siblings. 
 
Stretch Goals:



$10,000 - BONUS Story Added. UNLOCKED!


$11,000 - Expanded WIREHEAD Soundtrack. UNLOCKED!


$12,000 - UV Spotting Added.

$20,000 - Matte Coated Interior.

 
Backer Bonuses:



100 Backers - Art Print by Vince Rush. UNLOCKED!


150 Backers - Art Print by Michael Odom UNLOCKED!


200 Backers - Digital Companion Track by Institute 91' UNLOCKED!


 
Add-Ons:
Special add-ons are available once you make your main selection, like prints, Blood Realm comics, commissions, and more. This à la carte system will allow you to completely customize your reward selection and build your own bundle!


 
PRINTS:

Art Prints are 6" x 9"

Art by Kristian Rossi
 


Art by Robert Geronimo 
 

Art by Ryan Winn
T-SHIRT:

 
TRADING CARD:

Thank you in advance for your generosity, loyalty, and dedication!

story:
David Bowie was going to make a superhero movie about her.

Billy Idol has a tattoo of her.

And now, 50 years since her debut, celebrate the return of one of the most enigmatic comic book characters that you’ve never heard of...

OCTOBRIANA WITH LOVE is an all-star, 64-page, full colour softcover graphic novel showcasing several unique takes on the cult underground Russian superhero by an exciting mix of creative talent.

  • OCTOBRIANA WITH LOVE is now available to pre-order through Diamond Distribution for a November release: https://previewsworld.com/Catalog/SEP211446
  • Crowdfunding backers will receive their deluxe editions of the book in September.

 

What the media are saying...

 "This really is something that you want to be backing, a superhero saga decades in the making, a hero of Mother Russia made real on the printed page." - Comicon 

 "Very intriguing."  -  SYFY Wire 

 "Music aficionados might want to check out Octobriana with Love."  - AIPT Comics 

 "Please show your support for this amazing project!" - First Comics News 

 

In OCTOBRIANA WITH LOVE, Octobriana and her underground take on a daring rescue mission above the skies of a near future Britain to rescue Lucretia Hussain, a young vlogger destined to be a figurehead for a future revolution. To correct the course of history Octobriana clashes with her ancient nemesis Baba Yaga, leading Octobriana to relive her past and setting the stage for a whole new universe of adventures.

We have been working on the book for the past six months, and have just come off the back of a successful Kickstarter campaign to cover production and distribution costs. In return for your support, we will deliver a fun, action-packed book with high production values, as well as some crowdfund-exclusive bonuses. 

Every physical book pledge gets a copy of OCTOBRIANA WITH LOVE (choose from 3 unique cover designs), plus...

  • 2x random retro, 1970s style trading cards by Flops Comics
  • Temporary tattoo designed by Angus Byers from DFA Tattoos in Montreal
  • 50th Anniversary bookplate printed on parchment paper & signed by Stu Taylor
  • 8x10 full colour 50th Anniversary print, featuring art from Simon Fraser
  • Desktop wallpapers for PC, Android and iOS
  • Digital Scrapbook magazine featuring scripts and concept sketches

Digital backers will receive a copy of OCTOBRIANA WITH LOVE in PDF format, plus...

  • Desktop wallpapers for PC, Android and iOS
  • Digital Scrapbook magazine featuring scripts and concept sketches

Vikings, World War II, dinosaurs, 1980s TV evangelists, time travel, Billy Idol, a near future Britain and Baba Yaga… strap yourself in for a wild ride across 7 off beat tales, showcasing unique takes on Octobriana by an exciting mix of creative talent.

Meet the creative team bringing OCTOBRIANA WITH LOVE to life!

From Marvel / DC superstars to indie darlings, OCTOBRIANA WITH LOVE features a stellar creative team...

  • Juni Ba - Mighty Morphin Power Rangers, Kugali
  • Andy Belanger - Mother Trucker, Swamp Thing
  • Stephen Byrne - Wonder Twins, Justice League / Power Rangers
  • Tatto Caballero - Heavy Metal, Elephantmen
  • Joyce Chin - Vampirella, Commanders in Crisis
  • Michael Cho - Marvel, DC, BOOM
  • Sofie Dodgson - Bitter Root, Tank Girl
  • Simon Fraser- Doctor Who, Nikolai Dante
  • Nicole Goux - Shadow of the Batgirl, F**k Off Squad
  • N. Steven Harris - Aztek, the Ultimate Man, X-Force
  • Marc Laming - Star Wars Age of Rebellion: Boba Fett, Planet Hulk
  • Serge LaPointe - Far Cry 5, Ultimate X-Men
  • Justin (Lettersquids) - Sh*tshow, The Eight Immortal
  • Hassan Otsmane-Elhaou - PanelxPanel, I Breathed a Body
  • Stephanie Phillips - Harley Quinn, Nuclear Family
  • Josh Reed - DC, Top Cow, Aspen Comics
  • Vincenzo Riccardi - Something is Killing the Children, Power Rangers Unlimited
  • Marguerite Sauvage - DC Bombshells, Future State: Kara Zor-El Superwoman
  • Stu Taylor - Warhammer Monthly, Octobriana: Filling in the Blanks
  • Andrea Towers - Geek Girls Don't Cry, Entertainment Weekly
  • Ellie Wright - Batman / The Shadow, Red Sonja

 

 

About The Book

For centuries, immortal warrior woman Octobriana has been the champion of the oppressed. Leading a rag-tag group of freedom fighters, Octobriana travels the dimensional highways in her Wonder Machine, disrupting authoritarian regimes, overturning tyrants... and gate-crashing the best parties!

Just because you’re igniting the spirit of revolution, doesn’t mean that you can’t have a wild time doing it. 

OCTOBRIANA WITH LOVE story line-up:

  •  Baba Yaga's Cruel Britannia by Stu Taylor, Simon Fraser and Josh Reed.
  •  Octobriana and the Night Witches by Stephanie Phillips, Marc Laming and Sofie Dodgson.
  •  Origin of Octobriana by Stu Taylor, Andy Belanger, Tatto Caballero and Serge LaPointe.
  •  Vue to a Satanic Panic by Andrea Towers and N. Steven Harris.
  •  The La Brea Tar Beast of Sunset Strip by Stu Taylor, Stephen Byrne and Hassan Ostmane-Elhaou.
  •  Octobriana's Song by Nicole Goux, Juni Ba, Vincenzo Riccardi and Justin (Lettersquids).
  •  Prehistoric Poutine (or Dinosaurs in Montréal) by Stu Taylor, Simon Fraser and Josh Reed.

 

 

Who is Octobriana?

The character originally appeared in Octobriana and the Russian Underground by Petr Sadecky, a 1971 book that claimed that a group of dissident youth were fighting back against an oppressive Soviet regime by creating an ongoing series of surreal underground comic strips starring their globe-trotting heroine Octobriana. 

The truth that this group never existed and that the strips were doctored works of Czech artists (Bohumil Konečný and Zdeněk Burian) only added to the character's mystique, inspiring other comic creators like Bryan Talbot and Jim Rugg... and even music luminaries like David Bowie, Billy Idol and Amanda Lear.

The assembled creative talent in the anthology provides an eclectic showcase of the Russian Devil-Woman and established fans and new audiences alike.

 

 

Estimated Shipping Rates  

Shipping costs will be collected at checkout (after the campaign ends). You will also have the option to add on additional books and items. 

Our estimated maximum shipping costs for a single physical book tier are: 

$10 CAN [$8 USD] - Canada

$15 CAN [$12 USD] - U.S.A. / Mexico

$18 CAN [$15 USD] - Mainland Europe

$20 CAN [$16 USD] - UK

$25 CAN [$20 USD] - Rest of World

We support comic book shop retailers!

We have a separate "retailer-only" pledge tier, providing a hefty discount on a 7 book bundle to those comic book stores wanting to support Octobriana With Love. The retailer bundle features 3x copies each of covers A and B, plus 1x copy of the crowdfunding-exclusive Michael Cho variant. We will also include a selection of random trading cards, temporary tattoos and promo posters. To qualify for this retailer bundle, you will need to provide proof of authenticity, whether that's a Diamond retailer number or website address. 

 

 

Risks and challenges

All scripts have been completed and with their respective art teams, with almost half of the book already completed. Everyone involved in the production is an industry professional, known for delivering quality work. We will be issuing regular updates on production so that you can feel part of the journey. Backers will get regular updates from us on production of the book, and can also get up to date on our development journey through the official Octobriana Comic social channels on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook.

story:
Project Summary

Kevin Marcus joins his old buddy for drinks, and witnesses the unbelievable. In the middle of their visit his friend panics, and races to the restroom. Kevin follows only to walk in on the Reaper having cornered his friend. Kevin attempts to intercede to no avail, and witnesses the Reaper take his friends life. Before leaving the Reaper calls to Kevin by name, and says the next time they see each other, he'll only have 15 minutes left to live. FIFTEEN MINUTES follows Kevin Marcus as he navigates this reality, and how he chooses to prepare for the return of the Reaper.

---

Hello Friends,

I'm Anthony Hary, writer and illustrator for FIFTEEN MINUTES. Originally we published FIFTEEN MINUTES through a Kickstarter campaign. It was a huge privilege to have a successful campaign. It also resulted in a limited number of people getting their own copy of the graphic novel.

With this campaign we're releasing a SPECIAL EDITION version of FIFTEEN MINUTES. The graphic novel still contains the original story, and has increased from a 60 page book, to a 92 page book with the addition of a sketchbook to the end of the book collecting some of my best illustrations over the recent years.

 

Written and Illustrated by: Anthony Hary

Lettered by: Levi McCormick

Cover Pencilled and Colored by: Anthony Hary, Inked by: Mark Stegbauer

 

The Lowdown:

This campaign is very straightforward. THE BOOK IS DONE and already headed to the printer. We simply want to know how many copies to print. This is where you come in. Order your copy of FIFTEEN MINUTES: SPECIAL EDITION today, and receive it when the books print in August 2021.

 

BONUS: When we pass our $500 goal, and reach $750, I will include a surprise ORIGINAL SKETCH with each book. 

 

Risks & Challenges

With this project there are none. The book is completed, and being published. This campaign is simply a way to connect this project with a larger audience. 

 

THANK YOU!

story:
DEADSKINS! 3-4 is a 60-page, perfect bound comic book collecting the third and fourth issues of the series critics call:

DEADSKINS! was the first graphic novel we ever created, and it was serialized on our website from 2013-2014. The full story clocks in at 5 issues, roughly 30 pages each.

We're remastering this book 2 issues at a time, darkening the lines to improve print quality and bring out the beauty of our black, white, and red production. And if you missed our last campaign for issues 1-2, we've made it super-easy to catch up. 

Here's the pitch:

"A Harvard-educated dandy and his blind, drunk companion are all that stand between the Old West and an Undead Apocalypse. This is the true story of Custer's Last Stand... whatever they taught you in school is bullsh!t."

TART'S Kevin Joseph on DEADSKINS!

THE GALL-DANG PREVIEW

Last time out, we met Shane, a Harvard dandy on his way back home to propose to his girlfriend. He falls asleep on the train, and when he wakes up, everyone else on board is dead:

When he gets to town, same story. Everyone's dead (or gone), except the town drunk and his, uh, "wife":

Together, they have to solve the mystery of what happened and why they were spared... and save the girl, of course:

But when word gets out that there's something special about our unlikely heroes, they're quickly drafted into a war they don't understand... and it's not entirely clear who the real bad guys are... 

In this volume, you'll meet General Custer:

No relation to Yosemite Sam.

Custer sends Shane and Jack on a "special" mission alongside the brutes Thomas and Boston... and a kid aptly named "The Kid":

Dynamite vests. (Don't try this at home.)

Along the way, they meet some butt-kicking cowgirls...

Cowgirls. Kickin' ass and taking names since 1876.

...and, of course, zombies:

Busted. And on National Talk Like a Pirate Day for zombies, too...

Plus: Shane finally reunites with his beloved Annie! But, uh, she's full of surprises:

Reunited and it feels... so bad?

So settle in for some weird western action! 

If you're still not sold and want to read the first issue for free...

CLICK HERE TO JOIN OUR ONLINE LETTER COLUMN

BABY BADASS writer D.E. Schrader on DEADSKINS!

The Rewards

We're keeping our rewards pretty simple this go 'round. But in addition to our main cover by Wailing Blade's Joe Mulvey, we have...

 THE ALEX CORMACK VARIANT 

Variant cover by SINK and SEA OF SORROWS artist Alex Cormack

And if you missed any of our other campaigns for RED XMAS or PBOW, you can catch up with our ...

Box of Fries

More details below...


NOTE ABOUT THE SLANG

DEADSKINS! takes place in the Wild West, and as such, some characters--particularly the villains--express attitudes that seem outdated today. We think our readers are smart enough to know that we aren't condoning these things, but we also know that in 2020, some people don't want to read about it. So: fair warning.

There's also donkey-f*cking.

FRIED Comics is a proud purveyor of offbeat, irreverent pulp fiction since 2013, and a labor of love for Clay Adams and Alexandre O. Philippe.

So far, we have eight successful Kickstarters under our belts. (And between us we have a lot of belts. ) So, we're stoked to return to the scene of the crime.

Clay is the co-writer of RED XMAS, which was released in comic shops this December by Scout Comics, and served as co-editor for the NIGHTMARE THEATER anthology on Kickstarter. His feature script, THE ECLIPSE, placed second in the horror category of the FADEIn Awards, and his latest comic, ELECTRIC YOUTH, co-written with Kyle Roberts, was recently featured in the LA Times. He has written and directed for television and holds a BFA in Dramatic Writing from NYU. When Clay first met Alexandre, he thought, "My, what a sophisticated European." Boy, was he wrong!

Film nerd/director Alexandre is the co-writer of RED XMAS from Scout Comics. His most recent documentary is LEAP OF FAITH: WILLIAM FRIEDKIN ON THE EXORCIST, now streaming on Shudder. He holds a Masters Degree in Dramatic Writing from NYU’s Tisch School of the Arts and has written and directed numerous award-winning films and documentaries, including MEMORY: THE ORIGINS OF ALIEN, 78/52: HITCHCOCK'S SHOWER SCENE, AND THE PEOPLE vs. GEORGE LUCAS. When Alexandre first met Clay, he thought, "My, what a stupid American." Boy, was he right!

Leila is a comic book artist and writer living in Portland, Oregon. She draws SLEEPLESS, SHUTTER and writes AFAR at Image Comics. Leila has drawn for titles such as THE WICKED + THE DIVINE, SCARLET WITCH, AMERICAN VAMPIRE, and THE PANTHEON PROJECT. In 2015 and 2016, Leila was nominated for the Russ Manning Promising Newcomer Award for her work on SHUTTER. She only took this job because she thought she'd be paid in fries.

Brett Nienburg is a Denver-based artist who has worked as a concept artist for LEGO and  designed sets for feature films. We're sorry we made him peel so many potatoes. He looks pretty sad about it.

Charles is from Canada, so we imagine he looks like one of those flappy-headed dudes from South Park.* He has lettered books for Aftershock, Image, IDW and Top Shelf (among others) and is a founding member of Frozen Beach Studios. (*As far as we know, Charles has a normal-looking head.)

Ugh. Just... ugh.

The Package

We've gotten our fair share of comics that arrived mangled by the mail carrier.

You pay premium prices on Kickstarter, and you deserve better. That's why we've started using Gemini Comic Mailers:

These babies are sturdy. They require a little more money, a little more time (and a lot more tape!) but it's worth it to make sure your comics arrive in pristine condition.

And if somehow your comic still gets roughed up?

Frieda will replace it free of charge.

 

All funds from this campaign will go to:

  • Printing rewards
  • Shipping them to you
  • Anything above our goal goes towards making more comics

Image copyright Can Stock Photo / pressmaster

THE TIMELINE

Book Goes to Printer: ~Apr 15

Book Printed and shipped to us ~Apr 30

Pack and ship - ~May 1

Expected delivery to US backers - 2 Weeks (Early May)

Expected delivery for International Backers - 4 Weeks (late May)

THANKS, HON!

We're not asking for a million dollars. We just want to put a cool book in your hand and entertain you for a bit during these crazy times. So find a pledge level you like and pre-order. We'll make more comics.

Oh! And finally:

We heard somewhere that crowdfunding campaigns do better when they have pictures of cats on the page. So, here's a picture of Clay's cat:

Thanks for supporting! And remember...

Risks and challenges

The book is 100% finished. We've worked with our printer on multiple campaigns and we know they will deliver a quality product on time. Right now, the biggest risk is that the postal service will continue to see delays. We sincerely hope this won't be a problem... but if it is, we'll get your books to you via an alternate service.
story_txt:
DEADSKINS! 3-4 is a 60-page, perfect bound comic book collecting the third and fourth issues of the series critics call:DEADSKINS! was the first graphic novel we ever created, and it was serialized on our website from 2013-2014. The full story clocks in at 5 issues, roughly 30 pages each.We're remastering this book 2 issues at a time, darkening the lines to improve print quality and bring out the beauty of our black, white, and red production. And if you missed our last campaign for issues 1-2, we've made it super-easy to catch up. Here's the pitch:"A Harvard-educated dandy and his blind, drunk companion are all that stand between the Old West and an Undead Apocalypse. This is the true story of Custer's Last Stand... whatever they taught you in school is bullsh!t."TART'S Kevin Joseph on DEADSKINS!THE GALL-DANG PREVIEWLast time out, we met Shane, a Harvard dandy on his way back home to propose to his girlfriend. He falls asleep on the train, and when he wakes up, everyone else on board is dead:When he gets to town, same story. Everyone's dead (or gone), except the town drunk and his, uh, "wife":Together, they have to solve the mystery of what happened and why they were spared... and save the girl, of course:But when word gets out that there's something special about our unlikely heroes, they're quickly drafted into a war they don't understand... and it's not entirely clear who the real bad guys are... In this volume, you'll meet General Custer:No relation to Yosemite Sam.Custer sends Shane and Jack on a "special" mission alongside the brutes Thomas and Boston... and a kid aptly named "The Kid":Dynamite vests. (Don't try this at home.)Along the way, they meet some butt-kicking cowgirls...Cowgirls. Kickin' ass and taking names since 1876....and, of course, zombies:Busted. And on National Talk Like a Pirate Day for zombies, too...Plus: Shane finally reunites with his beloved Annie! But, uh, she's full of surprises:Reunited and it feels... so bad?So settle in for some weird western action! If you're still not sold and want to read the first issue for free...CLICK HERE TO JOIN OUR ONLINE LETTER COLUMNBABY BADASS writer D.E. Schrader on DEADSKINS!The RewardsWe're keeping our rewards pretty simple this go 'round. But in addition to our main cover by Wailing Blade's Joe Mulvey, we have... THE ALEX CORMACK VARIANT Variant cover by SINK and SEA OF SORROWS artist Alex CormackAnd if you missed any of our other campaigns for RED XMAS or PBOW, you can catch up with our ...Box of FriesMore details below...NOTE ABOUT THE SLANGDEADSKINS! takes place in the Wild West, and as such, some characters--particularly the villains--express attitudes that seem outdated today. We think our readers are smart enough to know that we aren't condoning these things, but we also know that in 2020, some people don't want to read about it. So: fair warning.There's also donkey-f*cking.FRIED Comics is a proud purveyor of offbeat, irreverent pulp fiction since 2013, and a labor of love for Clay Adams and Alexandre O. Philippe.So far, we have eight successful Kickstarters under our belts. (And between us we have a lot of belts. ) So, we're stoked to return to the scene of the crime.Clay is the co-writer of RED XMAS, which was released in comic shops this December by Scout Comics, and served as co-editor for the NIGHTMARE THEATER anthology on Kickstarter. His feature script, THE ECLIPSE, placed second in the horror category of the FADEIn Awards, and his latest comic, ELECTRIC YOUTH, co-written with Kyle Roberts, was recently featured in the LA Times. He has written and directed for television and holds a BFA in Dramatic Writing from NYU. When Clay first met Alexandre, he thought, "My, what a sophisticated European." Boy, was he wrong!Film nerd/director Alexandre is the co-writer of RED XMAS from Scout Comics. His most recent documentary is LEAP OF FAITH: WILLIAM FRIEDKIN ON THE EXORCIST, now streaming on Shudder. He holds a Masters Degree in Dramatic Writing from NYU’s Tisch School of the Arts and has written and directed numerous award-winning films and documentaries, including MEMORY: THE ORIGINS OF ALIEN, 78/52: HITCHCOCK'S SHOWER SCENE, AND THE PEOPLE vs. GEORGE LUCAS. When Alexandre first met Clay, he thought, "My, what a stupid American." Boy, was he right!Leila is a comic book artist and writer living in Portland, Oregon. She draws SLEEPLESS, SHUTTER and writes AFAR at Image Comics. Leila has drawn for titles such as THE WICKED + THE DIVINE, SCARLET WITCH, AMERICAN VAMPIRE, and THE PANTHEON PROJECT. In 2015 and 2016, Leila was nominated for the Russ Manning Promising Newcomer Award for her work on SHUTTER. She only took this job because she thought she'd be paid in fries.Brett Nienburg is a Denver-based artist who has worked as a concept artist for LEGO and  designed sets for feature films. We're sorry we made him peel so many potatoes. He looks pretty sad about it.Charles is from Canada, so we imagine he looks like one of those flappy-headed dudes from South Park.* He has lettered books for Aftershock, Image, IDW and Top Shelf (among others) and is a founding member of Frozen Beach Studios. (*As far as we know, Charles has a normal-looking head.)Ugh. Just... ugh.The PackageWe've gotten our fair share of comics that arrived mangled by the mail carrier.You pay premium prices on Kickstarter, and you deserve better. That's why we've started using Gemini Comic Mailers:These babies are sturdy. They require a little more money, a little more time (and a lot more tape!) but it's worth it to make sure your comics arrive in pristine condition.And if somehow your comic still gets roughed up?Frieda will replace it free of charge. All funds from this campaign will go to:
Printing rewards
Shipping them to you
Anything above our goal goes towards making more comics
Image copyright Can Stock Photo / pressmasterTHE TIMELINEBook Goes to Printer: ~Apr 15Book Printed and shipped to us ~Apr 30Pack and ship - ~May 1Expected delivery to US backers - 2 Weeks (Early May)Expected delivery for International Backers - 4 Weeks (late May)THANKS, HON!We're not asking for a million dollars. We just want to put a cool book in your hand and entertain you for a bit during these crazy times. So find a pledge level you like and pre-order. We'll make more comics.Oh! And finally:We heard somewhere that crowdfunding campaigns do better when they have pictures of cats on the page. So, here's a picture of Clay's cat:Thanks for supporting! And remember...Risks and challengesThe book is 100% finished. We've worked with our printer on multiple campaigns and we know they will deliver a quality product on time. Right now, the biggest risk is that the postal service will continue to see delays. We sincerely hope this won't be a problem... but if it is, we'll get your books to you via an alternate service.

story:
DEUS VULT! 

A crusade into another realm...

...leads to the deadliest of evils.

The Covers 

A beautiful oil painting by Jesse White: 

A purrfect variant by Miss Sashi: 

The Story:

Sir Domingo, Spanish Knight and Holy Crusader, is blessed with a vision on his return from his triumphant conquest in the Holy Land. The Holy Grail appears in the sky, leading him on an adventure to another realm where demons and monstrosities lay waste to all of creation. 

He discovers a strange race of people called the Kityin, who seem more kin to Earth's cats than they do humanity. He alone can lead them to salvation and away from the tyrannical rule of The Demon King. 

Should he fail, not only the Kityin but all the people of all the realms will be destroyed! 

DEUS VULT is a 66-page crusader fantasy graphic novel which will bring back memories of great comics like CONAN THE BARBARIAN and THE MIGHTY THOR.

The story is written by #1 Bestselling and award-winning Sci-Fi author, Jon Del Arroz, artist Jesse White, and colorist Matt Crotts with a special variant cover by our good friend Miss Sashi! 

Preview Pages: 

 

The Books: 

Deus Vult can be obtained in four forms:

1. A Digital PDF 

2. A standard-cover trade paperback

3. A variant cover trade paperback

4. The standard cover hardcover 

Each of these will be exquisitely printed by Jon Del Arroz's printer he uses for his novels. This means a higher quality paper than standard comic books because novels are meant to last! 

We also have options available for posters and t-shirts and original art! 

Jon Del Arroz's full complete comic library is also available, including his hit series, FLYING SPARKS! 

STRETCH GOALS: 

$7,000 - All backers will receive free PDF first issues of Jon Del Arroz's Flying Sparks and The Cosmic Warrior for an additional 44 pages of comics! 

$8,000 - We will include 3 "chapter covers" in the book as pin-ups of beautiful new art which will extend the book to 72 pages! 

$10,000 - We will add back cover art to the graphic novel 

$12,000 - Jon Del Arroz will write a short prose story of the Kityin's struggle against the demon horde to digitally deliver to all backers.

$15,000 - We will commission a pin-up of Domingo to add to the book by a popular artist TBD! 

$20,000 - Give our colorist Matt Crotts a BONUS! He did good work and we want to pay him more! 

$21,000 - We will create a PDF character bio profile of Sir Domingo

$22,000 - We will create a PDF character bio profile of The Demon King

$23,000 - We will create a PDF character bio profile of Mina, The Kityin 

$25,000 - We will add a fantasy map of the Demon King's realm to the book

$30,000 - We will illustrate Jon Del Arroz's short prose story of the Kityin and add it to the physical version of the books. We will also add the bio profiles to the physical book 

Thank you so much for all of your tremendous support and reading the real alternative to mainstream comics! 

Fans of Stealing Solo, Anna ThatStarWarsGirl, Fandom Menace, ComicsGate, Ethan Van Sciver, Cyberfrog: Rekt Planet, Graham Nolan, Alien Alamo FragaBoom, Jon Malin, Graveyard Shift, Shadowbinders, Kamen America, Tim Lim, Micah Curtis, Godlike, Billy Tucci, Shi Omnibus, Shane Davis, Graham Nolan, Jack The Ripper, Cyberfrog Action Figures, Earthbound, Art Thibert, and more will love Deus Vult!

story:
Faster Than Light!

As Earth is about to launch the first of its new fleet of FTL (Faster Than Light) spacecraft to explore beyond our Solar System, an Alien Empire threatens us with ANNIHILATION if we break the quarantine that they have imposed upon us!

The Stars Our Destination!

After a beam weapon almost destroys a major metropolitan area on the Eastern seaboard of the United States, ALL nations capitulate to the demands of the Alien Empire!

Non-Compliant!

But back-up pilot Tyrus Blake refuses to let an Alien Empire decide the future of Earth. He steals one of the FTL spacecraft and races to test the quarantine...putting the entire planet in jeopardy!

Space Race!

The United Nations tasks hero-astronaut Aaron Cruz to overtake and destroy Tyrus' ship before it breaks the quarantine and the entire planet has to pay for his insolence! But Aaron is dealing with some startling aftereffects from the rocket crash that turned him into an international hero!

The Crew!

IMPOSSIBLE STARS is brought to you by creators who have already delivered on multiple crowd-funding campaigns:

  • Story by Richard C. Meyer and Chuck Dixon
  • Script by Chuck Dixon
  • Art by Renzo Rodriguez

 

Amazing Art!

Here is the Cover Art as well as some additional Story Pages from IMPOSSIBLE STARS!

 

NEXUS!

Available as an Add-On or included in the Bundle:

  • Story by NEXUS Co-Creator Mike Baron
  • Art by Kelsey Shannon
  • All-New Space Adventure!

 

Merch!

A Blueprint of the Huracán, Earths first FTL (Faster Than Light) Spacecraft:

  •  A High-Quality Blueprint Poster
  • Rolled and mailed in a protective tube

 

Stretch Goals!

As the campaign grows, STRETCH GOALS will be UNLOCKED that add value to your perk with no additional cost to you!

$50,000 STRETCH GOAL  *UNLOCKED*- Spot Gloss Cover Enhancement!

$100,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED*- NEXUS Pin-Up
