story:
SERIES SUMMARY 

STANDARD EDITION COVER

 

LIMITED EDITION COVER

                                                          

"Neon Gods" to their adoring public, ARC ATHENA is the super powered team that the world is desperate for. Curated by the global tech and entertainment giant known as ARC, each member represents the most aspirational hero that public polling data can provide. Athena's roster consists of characters whose powers are bombastically perfect for their obsessed audience but yield very low stopping force- everything is for "The Show".

On the other side of the coin is ARC POSEIDON, the dark secret no one wants to believe exists. They are the lethal ARC mechanism used to extinguish threats so that the world can sleep soundly in their beds. The team operates behind the scenes with brutal force and without fanfare. Each member of the team has impressive power sets, abilities and technology that makes them equipped to combat larger-than-life villains and events.

 

ARC ATHENA is a 64-PAGE HARDCOVER BOOK

Part 1 of a a SIX ISSUE SCIENCE FICTION MINISERIES from illustrator/storyteller Eric Canete (TRON Uprising). Find out what happens when a beloved, focus-group approved public team encounter their cloak-and-dagger counterparts who do the REAL dirty work.
 

  • Art and Story by Eric Canete
  • Colors by Giuliano Peratelli (Sovereign Wolf)
  • Letters by Eric Weathers (Battle Brick Road)
  • Edited by Joe Fulton (The Lucent)
  • Distributed by Iconic Comics
     

We are proud to be under the Iconic Comics imprint: from Kickstarter to IndieGoGo (Kamen America, Black Hops) as well as independent titles (Soulfinder) that go to direct sales, Iconic Comics has maintained a 2 year track record of on time delivery, quality printing and packaging, and showcasing some of the greatest talent in independent comics.
 

  • FIVE out of SIX issues are FINISHED
  • No INDEMAND
  • Delivery in FOUR MONTHS

 

PERKS AND PACKAGING

ARC ATHENA 01 - 7x10.5in 64 pages, Full Color Cover and Interior

 

PREMIUM PRODUCT - This book will be bound in hardcover with spot UV and 64 pages in total (48-50 pages of story with 12-13 pages of supplemental material such as concept art, character designs, work-in-progress pencil versions of the pages, etc.) We believe that by giving you behind-the-scenes access, it will help immerse you  in the world of ARC ATHENA.
 

ADD ONS 

  • "DROP" 2021 Art Book
  • ARC ATHENA01 BLACK & WHITE Artist Edition 

 

"DROP" 2021 Art Book - 9x12in 64 pages, Full Color Cover and Interior

ADVANCED SCHEDULING - I have already completed the B&W line art for FIVE of the six issues. We are AHEAD OF SCHEDULE; currently coloring pages for Book 2 and writing dialogue for Book 6.

 

ARC ATHENA01 B&W Artist Edition - 11x17in, 54 pages. Color Cover w/ SpotUV, B&W Interior

 

EXCLUSIVE!


EXCLUSIVE to the first 1,000 backers: you will receive a complimentary ARC ATHENA X KAMEN AMERICA print, featuring the artwork of both Eric Canete and Timothy Lim! Iconic Comics is proud to be launching two books on the same day, at the same time, on two different platforms: Kickstarter for KAMEN AMERICA and IndieGoGo for Arc Athena! Head over to Kickstarter and pledge to KAMEN AMERICA to receive the complimentary print featuring the same characters at a different angle!

FAST FULFILLMENT- FOUR MONTHS

From the end of the 30-day campaign, that's how long it will take for you to get your book(s) if you live in the U.S. (International is variable). We are using THE BEST company in fulfillment and they will deliver quickly. Due to the timing of release, this campaign WILL *NOT* GO INTO IN-DEMAND.

 

THANK YOU for backing our project!

 

 

 

SHIPPING

All physical items come with an automatically generated tracking number e-mailed to you once the label is printed. We will offer replacements for any lost or damaged item. We will NOT offer refunds / replacements for books that we track as "DELIVERED", as it is your word against ours that any form of theft has occurred. Should this happen, please file a complaint with your local UPS / USPS / FEDEX provider.

We are not responsible for missing parcels after 3 months from the day they are sent out: that is when tracking information is no longer available to us, and it becomes the customer's word against our fulfillment that a package was not sent. Please read our fulfillment policies very carefully so that there is no confusion later on.

We also cannot guarantee the sending of products 3 months after the last package is sent out. Part of our on-time delivery is that customers are responsible for updating their addresses in a timely manner. We cannot hold on to parcels on behalf of backer who do not provide an address or whose packages get returned to us due to a wrong address entered at checkout: at some point, we liquidate our stock to make room for new books. While we try to accommodate all backers, we cannot guarantee either the quality of the book sent or that there will be books available after the fulfillment timeframe is completed. PLEASE ENTER YOUR ADDRESS CORRECTLY & MONITOR ALL UPDATES in the month leading up to expected delivery. We will make an announcement to lock in all updated shipping addresses before fulfillment begins.

Please read our fulfillment policies very carefully so that there is no confusion later on.
We also cannot guarantee the sending of products 3 months after the last package is sent out. Part of our on-time delivery is that customers are responsible for updating their addresses in a timely manner. We cannot hold on to parcels on behalf of backer who do not provide an address or whose packages get returned to us due to a wrong address entered at checkout: at some point, we liquidate our stock to make room for new books. story:
About Us

I'm Doug Garrett,  I have always wanted to make my own comic book and I decided that time is now! Jeff Lasley is the artist that I am working with. Jeff and I both have Native American ancestry and a love of the supernatural. We want to bring to you the story of Lone Wolf. You can follow us on twitter @dg310 and @jefflasley.

What is Lone Wolf about?

Lone Wolf is about a 200 year old Cherokee warrior and his fight against supernatural evil. He is the last in a long line of protectors, who have always protected the Earth. Wolf was chosen by his grandfather to carry on the fight, but the world was changing around them. He is given a gift that he doesn't understand and struggles to control. He does the best with what he has and is determined to honor his family. With his grandfather's guidance, he continues to push back against evil. His past is far from dead and continues to shape his future. 

The Artwork

The book is going to be offered as black and white newsprint or a full color modern style book.

UPDATED 1/10/19

We just hired a colorist. The book is now going to have some awesome colors, here's a sample.

 

UPDATED 2/3/19 

The colored Pages are coming in. We have posted them for your viewing pleasure!

 

This is what we need.

We need $3000 dollars to make this book happen. That money will be used to pay the artist, the letterer, printing and shipping. We don't make any profit at that point, this is just getting the book done.

Make Comics Great Again!

We want to make a fun book, without any political commentary or ideology! We like our comics to be escapism from the pressures of everyday life!

Please share with your friends

We are just a couple of Tennessee boys trying to chase a dream. Chase that dream with us! Tell your friends, tell your family, tell your friend's family! Comics books are cool!

Stretch Goals

$4000 - hire a colorist 

 

We are adding Jeff's Art Book as a Perk!

If you like creepy creatures this is right up your alley!

Here are a few pages!
story_txt:
About Us
I'm Doug Garrett,  I have always wanted to make my own comic book and I decided that time is now! Jeff Lasley is the artist that I am working with. Jeff and I both have Native American ancestry and a love of the supernatural. We want to bring to you the story of Lone Wolf. You can follow us on twitter @dg310 and @jefflasley.
What is Lone Wolf about?
Lone Wolf is about a 200 year old Cherokee warrior and his fight against supernatural evil. He is the last in a long line of protectors, who have always protected the Earth. Wolf was chosen by his grandfather to carry on the fight, but the world was changing around them. He is given a gift that he doesn't understand and struggles to control. He does the best with what he has and is determined to honor his family. With his grandfather's guidance, he continues to push back against evil. His past is far from dead and continues to shape his future. 
The Artwork
The book is going to be offered as black and white newsprint or a full color modern style book.
UPDATED 1/10/19
We just hired a colorist. The book is now going to have some awesome colors, here's a sample.

The colored Pages are coming in. We have posted them for your viewing pleasure!

story:
The Bubbas Are On Their First Mission

Apex City is in peril and only the Bubba Patrol can answer the call.

 
  Avengers 4 homage- "A" Cover
  • I'm John Anthony Chihak Soltero, the creator, writer, artist and Pop-O of the Bubba Patrol
  • Furry wet nosed heroes who are powered by hope
  • This issue is dedicated to the life of Foley

 

The first three issues just set the stage for this final act to the first mini series. Issues one and two introduced you to the Bubbas. Issue three showed you the origin of the First Bubba, Cypress and proved that the greatest superpower a hero can have, is heart. Issue four is the first of a two part finale for the volume one mini series of the Greatest Comic Book In The World.

What's In It For You?

Here's how it's gonna go down:

  • We're shooting for $1,000 ($2,000 total) to bring issue 4 to press
  • We've already raised half of our goal, but due to our original printer going on a hiatus we need to raise more funds to use alternate printing means
  • Celebrate the life of Foley, aka Mister Woobie, with an ultra limited, individually numbered, "Brothers Forever" tribute cover by IDW Retailer Incentive cover artist, Vic Hollins. Comes with a matching number Certificate of Authenticity.

  • Get a one of a kind full color sketch cover, complete with an Agnew approved Certificate of Authenticity

  • Join the team with your lifetime Bubba Patrol membership (includes a membership card, mini poster, a welcome letter and more). The membership never expires as long as you continue to believe in the Bubbas.
  • Get a reBARKed copy of the issue with a one of a kind quick character head sketch right on the cover
  • Retailer perk packs are also available

 

Why Back The Bubbas?

 

As some of you may know, the Bubbas are my real life family members. They have been with me through some of my lowest moments and my greatest achievements. And this comic book is the legacy I am making for them. During the creation of issue four, Foley lived a lifetime's worth of adventure. From first donning the cape in issue 3, to having his Grandma Marilyn create him his very own Mister Woobie costume, Foley guided his little brother Grayson, on the ins and outs of being a hero. The duo appeared in a 2021 calendar for Arizona entertainment super store, Bookmans in full superhero garb. On March 6, 2021 after more than a year long battle with cancer, Foley's physical being transitioned from this world. He was surrounded by those who loved him. Cradled in my arms, and wearing his Mister Woobie cape, Foley made me promise I would see this project through.

 

  • The Bubba Patrol brings the tradition of fun back to comic books. It's akin to the Silver Age of comics where things were a bit more light hearted, boldly colored and printed on newsprint.
  • Speaking of which, your support means we can bring you issue 4 how it was meant to be experienced, on newsprint. Sure we could do the regular on demand printing, but that's not our end goal. The Bubba Patrol isn't just a comic book, it's the Greatest Comic Book In The World.
  • The Bubba Patrol is perfect for beginning readers, to first time comic book collectors, to seasoned veterans of the game.
  • Three full issues and one mini issue have all been funded, and fulfilled utilizing crowd funding since 2017
  • The journey of the Bubba Patrol has been possible because of backers like you

 

Risks & Challenges

Honesty and transparency is extremely important to me, as it should be to you. After all, you're putting your money and trust into these projects. Obviously the side effects of the pandemic have caused issues with publishing for even the biggest of the Big Two in the industry. The printing program we used for the last three issues of the Bubba Patrol is currently on an indefinite hiatus. This has meant finding an alternate printer to meet our needs. And costs are different thus this campaign. But physical challenges are only one obstacle any campaign faces. As an artist who lives in the really real world, I face the challenge of the everyday, and that means hurdles including depression and anxiety along the way. These can slow down the process, but will never stop it. So, like any good hero, we've come up with some contingencies.

  • The artwork, coloring and lettering for issue 4 have already been completed!
  • Three issues of this self published series have already been produced, funded and fulfilled
  • This time, the team is not just me. The Bubbas and I have recruited some backup in the form of comic book industry veteran colorist, Bill Simpson and editor Ann Chihak Poff. Bill has worked for publishers such as Extreme Studios, Top Cow and even Marvel Comics. Bill, who provided inks on nine pages of issue, is taking the coloring of the Bubba Patrol to the next level. Bill has become an invaluable member of this team, and a very good friend. Issue 2 and 3 editor Ann also returns. She is a journalist by trade, a mentor to myself and not just my sister, but one of my best friends. She did an extraordinary job editing the last two issues (and technically she edited issue one since she was part of the Special Edition).
  • We're already hard at work on issue 5, so you won't have to wait too long to read the finale to the first mini series.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

100% funding is the main goal, but a true hero helps how they can. We realize not everyone is able to give financially, and that's ok.

  • Regardless of if you can back the Bubbas, your sharing the campaign and telling those you know will love it means the world to us
  • IndieGoGo makes it super easy to click and share. Please share this very personal project

Let's bring this home.

Bill has become an invaluable member of this team, and a very good friend. Issue 2 and 3 editor Ann also returns. She is a journalist by trade, a mentor to myself and not just my sister, but one of my best friends. She did an extraordinary job editing the last two issues (and technically she edited issue one since she was part of the Special Edition).
We're already hard at work on issue 5, so you won't have to wait too long to read the finale to the first mini series.

100% funding is the main goal, but a true hero helps how they can. We realize not everyone is able to give financially, and that's ok.

IndieGoGo makes it super easy to click and share. Please share this very personal project

Let's bring this home.

story:
Are coloring books dead?

NO!

One coloring book has risen from the dead to bring you the most horrifying and gruesome images for you to color. Ready your blood colored crayons and pencils for a book so frightening you may not finish it! 

Coloring the Undead is a 42 page adult coloring book of classic horror images for you to color.

 

BACK IN THE FIRST 60 DAYS and GET THESE PERKS:

If you purchase ANY book or deluxe tier in the first 60 days you will receive a random zombie sketch card! *Limit one per order*

IF you back EITHER deluxe editions, you will receive an ORIGINAL piece of 8.5x11 art from COLORING THE UNDEAD,MYTHZAR'S MENAGERIE OF MONSTERS or other horror and      fantasy art I have.  OVER 200 Pieces available!

**While supplies last. First come first served**

One FAMILY DELUXE backer from the first 60 days, will receive the ORIGINAL cover art for MYTHZAR'S MENAGERIE OF MONSTERS. (11x17 size)

 

Cover & logo: Allen Alonzo @The_HOWL_comics

Interior art: Rob Shaffer @passion4drawing

 

 

We did not forget the little GHOULS! We have also STITCHED together a coloring book for them as well! 

Frank is a simple monster. One day he is going to work and forgets the most important thing he has. HIS BRAIN! Now he must get the help of his fellow monsters to find it.

Kids can help Frank as well, in this 24 page coloring/activity book.

Cover and interior art: Rob Shaffer @passion4drawing

Logo: Sweens @sweens_07

PENCIL CASE

Hold your favorite pens, pencils, crayons, change, severed fingers, etc in this head stitched monster Pencil case.

 

SHIPPING BOX

ALL Deluxe editions will receive their orders in this CUSTOM ART shipping box. The COLOREM MORTIS can be used to hold your coloring supplies after it is shipped. It doubles as a tomb of the dead when put on a book shelf.

MYTHZAR'S MENAGERIE OF MONSTERS

My original coloring book is back! 100 pages of fantasy monsters for you to color. You can get this exclusively in the FAMILY DELUXE SET or as an add on. 

 

Stretch goals 

Stretch goals will be announced as we get closer to $9000. Some ideas are zombie scented car air fresheners, puzzle and much more. The more we grow, the more we can offer!

 

Ship Date: Target date is February 2022. The main book, pencil case and shipping box is ready. The child's book is nearly complete.

story:
John’s “short” story

 

John was the only survivor of an ambush after a mission, in Vietnam.

When he was about to be executed, he unleashed the power he had all his life, for the first time, as an adult.

He brought back to life his fallen brothers and they wanted revenge.

The book will be shipping from within the United States AND the European Union.

 

The Creative Team

Story and Art- MarV     Logos- Ricardo Ferreira

About Me

I’m Mário Vasconcelos, from Portugal.

I’ve been a part-time Freelace Illustrator for 10 years. I'm a factory worker. I’m a self taught artist.

I love comics since I was a kid. My father had all kinds of comics, from European to American comics.

As a kid, I would rather be surrounded by books than be with other kids and that made me interested  with illustration and drawing, specifically after seeing books about dinosaurs and ancient civilizations.

Back in the day, everyone wanted to be on Marvel or DC. I was one of them.

A few years ago I’ve found out about Independent Comics, from watching Jeff Lafferty’s videos on YouTube. He talked about his comic The Beserkonaut and after i saw him creating his book, I had decided to start making The Sin Killer.

Inspiration and Motivation 

I love Silver Age Comics. My favorite runs are Conan and Rom Spaceknight.
X-Men, Fantastic 4, Superman and Batman were also characters i was interested too and there antagonists.

All those great artists and writers inspired me. They still do!

My adventure and support 

I was able to get to know great people in the independent comic book world, from writers and artists.

I became friends with a graphic designer called Ricardo Ferreira, who I did a couple of events with, and helped me to do an 8 page story and the create logos of The Sin Killer, for Arrow Comics 4.0, for the Indie Volt Revolt book, lauched here on IGG.

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/indie-volt-revolt-sequential-art-collection/x/23366240

This was my first comic book credit, and it made me believe in myself enough to make The Sin Killer into a complete issue.

 

Campaign and Goals

For my first campaign, I want to be able to give as much as I can.

Backer #1 will get a piece of original art.
Every 25 backers, another one will be given out to someone at random.

The printing will be done by Mixam and shipping will be done by Critical Blast, in the U.S. The issues will be senton Gimini Mailers

 

In case you can’t back it...

You can share the campaign on social media, talk about it at your job, school, on your dates...

Without backers, i wont be able to print this story. 

 

 

Thank you for your time and support.

story:
PERKS ARE STILL AVAILABLE IN DEMAND!

 

Get the 200-Page Gut-Wrenching Story!

 

A Dream Years In The Making

I'm the writer/director of Escape the Night  and the gaming showsTabletop, Spellslingers, and Sagas of Sundry. I've been dreaming up this story and wanting to bring it to life through comics for years, the place where my love for visual storytelling started and still lives.

THE EIGHTH is the epic story of three teenagers who unlock a piece of ancient Sumerian armor and end up committing murder. Before they know it, they find themselves on a terrifying journey to destroy the world, with no going back.

Math is the language David, our anti-hero, uses to command the living piece of armor to take different shapes, his true superpower. The armor once belonged to The Eighth Sage of the Sumerian world. The other seven were responsible for the flood that cleansed the earth four thousand years ago, an event some would like to see happen again.

David believes the armor can make the world change. However, his two friends share different thoughts. Emma sees the armor as a way to exact revenge, and Atticus wants to destroy it. They leave their hometown in ruins and scramble across the world searching for the missing pieces of the armor and themselves.

The series is hard-hitting, fantastical, and full of twists. All brought to life by the amazing art of JORIN EVERS, my longtime creative collaborator.

 

Check out what the world is saying about it!

 

 

We Need Your Help!!

For almost two years, Jorin and I have slaved away completing five of the eight issues. With your contributions, we can take this across the finish and deliver into your hands, in stunning glossy print, the 200-page story of David, The Eighth, and his misfit friends.

 

 

The Perks

There are four amazing perks you can claim. Each one thought-through and aimed at making the best audience experience. The water is warm so dive in as deep as you want.

*NOTE ALL SHIPPING COSTS DETERMINED AFTER THE CAMPAIGN

 

Monthly Digital Issues

Because we have five issues completed already…

Every backer, starting on July 8th, will get issue #1 digitally (PDF format) and the next month issue #2 and so on like you were collecting them at your local comic shop. This gives us enough lead time to finish the final three and by the time you have all eight issues, the print order will have been sent overseas.

Talk about satisfaction! No waiting. You get to jump into the story right away! Pretty damn cool, and may be the best email you’ll get for the next eight months.

Hardcover Special Edition + Digital Issues

This is for those who want to wrap their hands around the tactile pages like me. You get the 200-page story on 70lb glossy paper wrapped in a jaw-dropping hardcover. It comes with a detailed slipcover making this a collectible, a coffee table accessory, and a bragging rights badge of honor.

*SHIPPING COSTS DETERMINED AFTER THE CAMPAIGN

 

 

T-Shirt + Hardcover Edition + Digital

Because you should rep THE EIGHTH, and rep it loud. We searched dozens of fabrics and styles and found the right one for the price. It’s not some stiff ugly t-shirt you drag out of Comic-Con. The fabric is soft and hangs well and the design is a custom Jorin created to make sure you don’t look like everyone else with a graphic tee. You will be asked for your size during the Backerkit survey.

*SHIPPING COSTS AND SIZING DETERMINED AFTER THE CAMPAIGN

 

The Ultimate Edition

There is only one of these. You get the original commissioned sculpt of David in the full armor by legendary sculptor Greg Aronowitz, worth five times our campaign asking price. It's one of a kind. There were no molds made. You will be the only one on earth with it. It's twelve inches tall and a true masterpiece. This changes any room and gives ultimate bragging rights. Plus you get the hardcover, T-shirt, and digital issues.

 

Let's Get This Book Upgraded!

Check out the stretch goals. They will continue through INDEMAND. The first three are already unlocked. Now, let's get that 2nd mini-story!

 

*Note digital backers will get digital versions of the print and mini-story.

 

One amazing thing you can do...

Before you dive into all the cool spoiler pages below, please share the link to this campaign on your social media. You can reach people in your circle that we'll never know and they may love it too!


Follow us on Instagram @failedsuperheroesclub for daily art!

 

Here are those pages!

Risks and Challenges

I have delivered over a hundred episodes of television and am very familiar with what it takes to take something across the finish line and get it delivered. Though this is my first graphic novel, the pathway is very clear and the manufacturers and vendors we are using deliver the best in the business.  We are in a time of a worldwide pandemic so I won't say we can't get slowed down, but I can say nothing can stop us from getting it into your  hands.

This is for those who want to wrap their hands around the tactile pages like me. You get the 200-page story on 70lb glossy paper wrapped in a jaw-dropping hardcover. It comes with a detailed slipcover making this a collectible, a coffee table accessory, and a bragging rights badge of honor.
*SHIPPING COSTS DETERMINED AFTER THE CAMPAIGN
   
T-Shirt + Hardcover Edition + Digital
Because you should rep THE EIGHTH, and rep it loud. We searched dozens of fabrics and styles and found the right one for the price. It’s not some stiff ugly t-shirt you drag out of Comic-Con. The fabric is soft and hangs well and the design is a custom Jorin created to make sure you don’t look like everyone else with a graphic tee. You will be asked for your size during the Backerkit survey.
*SHIPPING COSTS AND SIZING DETERMINED AFTER THE CAMPAIGN


 
The Ultimate Edition
There is only one of these. You get the original commissioned sculpt of David in the full armor by legendary sculptor Greg Aronowitz, worth five times our campaign asking price. It's one of a kind. There were no molds made. You will be the only one on earth with it. It's twelve inches tall and a true masterpiece. This changes any room and gives ultimate bragging rights. Plus you get the hardcover, T-shirt, and digital issues.

 
Let's Get This Book Upgraded!
Check out the stretch goals. They will continue through INDEMAND. The first three are already unlocked. Now, let's get that 2nd mini-story!
 
*Note digital backers will get digital versions of the print and mini-story.

 
One amazing thing you can do...
Before you dive into all the cool spoiler pages below, please share the link to this campaign on your social media. You can reach people in your circle that we'll never know and they may love it too!
Follow us on Instagram @failedsuperheroesclub for daily art!
 
Here are those pages!











Risks and Challenges
I have delivered over a hundred episodes of television and am very familiar with what it takes to take something across the finish line and get it delivered. Though this is my first graphic novel, the pathway is very clear and the manufacturers and vendors we are using deliver the best in the business.  We are in a time of a worldwide pandemic so I won't say we can't get slowed down, but I can say nothing can stop us from getting it into your  hands.

story:
Best described as WHAT IF the Universal Monsters were the X-Men!

Jon Malin (Jawbreakers) and Mark Poulton (Hawkman) bring you the next chapter in  GRAVEYARD SHIFT as the team returns to Earth only to find a werewolf infestation has terrorized the world in their absence. Surrounded by enemies everywhere, they join forces with the dimension hopper BRAM and his commando unit of super-powered monsters. Welcome aboard Aaron Alfeche (Jawbreakers) as the new interior artist!

 

GRAVEYARD SHIFT VOL III

50 pages

ALL HAIL THE WOLF KING!

Mark Poulton (Writer) Aaron Alfeche (Art) Anthony George AKA Zee (Colors)                           Eric Weathers (Letters)

SUPPLEMENTAL

40 pages total (two- 20 page stories, RUINER & NIGHTWALKER) will add more pages provided stretch goals are met.

RUINER

The last of his people, Genoa comes to EARTH to stop a genocide.

20 pages

by Jon Malin (Story) and Rob Willis (Art) Anthony George AKA Zee (Colors)                               Eric Weathers (Letters)

NIGHTWALKER

Top Cop by day, Superhero by night! The Nightwalker, a lone vigilante, highly respected and trusted by the people of Los Angeles, is going to shine a light into the city's darkest corners and take it back.

20 pages

By Rob Arnold (Story) Joe Ball (Art) Anthony George AKA Zee (Colors)                                        Eric Weathers (Letters)

 

Ethan Van Sciver Variant Cover! Colors by Kyle Ritter!!

Shane Davis Variant Cover! Colors by Kyle Ritter!!

LIL GRAVEYARD SHIFT (ASHCAN)

20 pages of kid friendly shenanigans!

Mark and Chase Poulton (Story) Keung Lee (Art) Anthony George AKA Zee (Colors)              Eric Weathers (Letters)

 

GRAVEYARD SHIFT Collected  Edition

96 pages

Catch up with this collected volume! Collects VOL I&II

Mark Poulton (Story) Jon Malin (Art) Anthony George AKA Zee (Colors)                                      Eric Weathers (Letters)

 

 

Any questions or concerns please contact us at Koniwaves@Gmail.com.

When the campaign closes, all sales are considered final so we can get our teams in action and produce these high quality books! All refunds during the 60 day campaign are welcome and will be honored!

$50,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED* Writers and Artists will receive a performance bonus.

$100,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED*! We will host an upcoming fan art contest, 1st place will receive $500 and the winning piece will be featured as a full page spread in GRAVEYARD SHIFT VOL III!" Writers and Artists will receive a 2nd performance bonus.

$120,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED* A GRAVEYARD SHIFT print by Ireland's "King" Karl O'Rowe, for all backers!

$130,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED* We will upgrade the LIL GRAVEYARD SHIFT VOL II from an ashcan into a full size floppy!

$140,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED*- TRADING CARD! "YOU Get a trading card and YOU get a trading card!" Everyone will receive a trading card, unique from the one built into the tiers.

$150,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED* Writers and Artists will receive a 3rd performance bonus.

$160,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED* All backers receive a GRAVEYARD SHIFT print by Kelsey Shannon!

$170,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED*- Another TRADING CARD! "YOU Get a trading card and YOU get a trading card!" Everyone will receive a trading card, unique from the one built into the tiers.

$180,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED* Fan art contest 1st prize will receive an additional $250, 2nd place prize will be added and awarded a set of steak knives....just kidding, 2nd prize will also receive $250 and a partial page in VOL III for their piece!

$200,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED*- Adding 10 pages to the Supplemental. Writers and Artists will receive a 4th performance bonus.

$225,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED* All backers receive a GRAVEYARD SHIFT print by comic book icon Dan fraga!

$240,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED* Art contest 1st prize will receive an additional $250, 2nd prize will receive an additional $250, 3rd place prize will be added and receive $250 and a partial page for their piece!

$253,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED*- Special "BEAT THE BAT" Stretch goal! It's a celebration! GRAVEYARD SHIFT will move forward on production for VOL IV, to have materials ready to print by end of next campaign. This will dramatically shorten delivery time.

$265,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED* Adding a new print for all backers by comic book great Kenneth Rocafort!

story:
My name is Gary Shipman, and welcome to the TITAN - Mouse of Might hard cover campaign. TITAN is a mouse from the world of Pakkins' Land, and his epic story is about to be told.
 

The print for the "DEW IT Special" perk is at the printer! All backers of the "DEW IT Special" perk will be getting the signed Titan Mouse of Might print. Plus: I will be throwing the original art in one of the backers packages.

 

Titan is an extraordinary mouse that has been endowed with powers beyond that of a normal mouse. He has taken on the appearance of a Dark Flyer, the mortal enemy of his kind. Titan is originally from another world were the animals are intelligent (see the Pakkins’ Land Omnibus). After triggering an explosion in his world Titan is transported to the world of man. Issue One: Titan sets out on a rescue mission to save another of his kind from the evil Ryan Research Center (RRC)...And that is only Act 1 of 3.

Join me on my YouTube channel where I show my working process https://www.youtube.com/user/MrGship. 

You can join in to the daily conversation on my Discord. https://discord.gg/w4q6A44

 For the first time, I am crafting a graphic adventure worthy of the true fans of Pakkins' Land in a multi-book set! Starting with the EPIC TITAN - Mouse of Might #1, a 48-page large format 8" x 11" Hard Cover, presented in classic black and white.  

 

 (Sign up for the Titan mailing list so you don't miss a thing. http://eepurl.com/gKHcd1)

Here is a 6 page preview.


My last Indiegogo campaign was for my comic book called Pakkins' Land, and my backers blew me away by providing $20K in funding! Together, we were able to make a 519-page hard bound, giant book, an over-the-top set of 14 trading cards, and a dust jacket by Mike Miller.

With your help we can make TITAN - MOUSE OF MIGHT a beautiful volume that is a work of art unto itself, one that you can display on the coffee table. This story will reveal mysteries and plots that weave through the Pakkins' Land lore!
 

Cool TITAN Merch!

 

STRETCH GOALS:

$2K!  UNLOCKED! EVERY Book Backer gets the Titan trading card #1 - the Hero! 
$5K!  UNLOCKED! EVERY Book Backer gets the Titan bookmark! 
$6K!  UNLOCKED! the TITAN Fan Art Contest! The winner will be printed in the Deluxe Edition and their art will be used in the deluxe perk bookmark. 

$7K!  UNLOCKED! EVERY Book Backer gets the Titan trading card #2 - the Villain!


$8K!  UNLOCKED! EVERY Book Backer gets the Titan sticker! 

$9K!  UNLOCKED! Add 5 more pages to the Titan story, from 48 to 53 pages!
$10K!   UNLOCKED! Add 5 more pages to the Titan story, from 53 to 58 pages!
$15K!   UNLOCKED! Add 5 more pages to the Titan story, from 58 to 63 pages!

$25K!   UNLOCKED! Every Book Backer gets the Titan patch!
$26K!  UNLOCKED! Every Book Backer gets the Titan #1 postcard!

$27K! UNLOCKED! Every Book Backer gets the Titan #2 postcard!

$28K! UNLOCKED! Every Book Backer gets the Titan #3 postcard!

$1M!  TITAN - Mouse of Might Animated Show!

Titan is a story that will add a new dimension to the world of Pakkins' Land in ways never seen before! I wish to share all the thrills and adventure with all of you.  You are the biggest part of what I am doing, my expression in story and art mean nothing without your contribution.  I do what I do for you. 

TITAN - Mouse of Might - Fan Art Contest! 

TITAN wants you! Get your pencils and paper out! Warm up your drawing tablets! It's draw'n time!

Here's how it works:
You draw the best TITAN - Mouse of Might drawing you can. (keep it clean. There are kids watching). Make TITAN proud!
Then submit your work of art by posting it on social media with hashtag #TitanMouesofMightFanArt.

The deadline for entry's is March 16th.

The pieces will be reviewed on the MrGship channel on a live stream were the winner(s) will be picked. Winner(s) will then by printed in the TITAN - Mouse of Might Deluxe Edition and their art will be used for the deluxe perk bookmark.
The best of luck to you all. 

Here are the first pieces of fan art. 

What We Need & What You Get

My goal is to provide a quality product for you and I hope that you are as excited about this campaign as I am. We need enough for the printing, distribution, and fees to create the Titan Mouse of Might comic book.  Anything beyond that will help to make it possible for me to focus on creating new story and art in the future.

We're keeping the perks simple. Just click on a perk on the right to open its details.

Ways You Can Help

Please share and get the word out! Make some noise about the Titan Mouse of Might comic book campaign.  Just hit the Indiegogo share buttons at the top!

Thank you for taking the time to look things over here.

We are Titans,

Gary Shipman

story:
Hello, my name is Marc Anthony Brown and I would like to thank you all for stopping by and checking out my campaign. Growing up, I always wanted to tell stories; to add my mark to the ever growing list of fictitious tales that has spanned back for generations. I have read dozens of comics over the years with the goal of one day of creating my own; and now that day has arrived. 

"The Outrider" comic follows Marcel Lozada, a 19-year-old college student attending the fictitious Alden State University. Marcel is the first superhuman in existence, and with that, he is continuously faced at a crossroads deciding what type of person he wants to be? This series aims to show the reality of being a student in a university setting, tackling themes and situations many college students face.

Alongside Marcel is his best friend, Andrea "Andi" Negrón. A fellow undergrad at ASU, she carries her own baggage as the granddaughter of an ex-assassin. Years of training and situations have left Andi physically and mentally scarred, leading to her new aspiration to make college memories, sometimes being an opposing force to Marcel's enthusiasm for super-heroics.

I have backed campaigns in the past with Indiegogo and with the help of my awesome team, we are trying to get my creation up off the ground. With backing this first issue a wide variety of perks based on ranking [See list below]. I was always hesitant to release a comic, unsure if my stories should be told. However, after the 2020 Coronavirus pandemic I felt inspired, to do things I never thought I could do. And with this being my first comic there is an understanding that there won't be an extreme gain of profit. But that is okay, my team and I are just out here to share the stories we want told. Once again, thank you for checking out my campaign and remember #BeTheOutrider! Update: Follow @the.kfsmab on instagram to keep up to date with updates! 

Undergrad $4

Digital Comic Book 

Name in Comic Book 

 

Vigilante $5

Comic Book 

Name in comic 

 

Crusader $10

Comic Book

story:
List of Add-ons that are available during checkout!

Availability may vary depending on what perks are selected. Simply select your perk and select the add-on at the bottom of the checkout window.

  • Mighty Mascots #1 -- $5
  • Mighty Mascots #2 -- $5
  • Mighty Mascots #3 -- $5
  • Mighty Mascots 100 Page Giant --$10
  • Mighty Mascots NEW Storyline #4,5,6 -- $15
  • Captain HoneyFlakes Enamel Pin -- $10
  • Mondo Martian Enamel Pin -- $10
  • Mighty Mascots T-Shirt -- $25
  • Jorge Pacheco Variant Cover for #6 -- $5
  • Chris Gugliotti Variant Cover for #5 -- $5
  • Matt Parton Variant Cover for #5 -- $5
  • Jesse Lundberg Variant Cover for #4 -- $5
  • Ed Smith Variant Cover for #6 -- $5
  • Chris Giarusso Variant Cover for #4 -- $15​

Campaign ending on 10/23

Hello everyone, i'm planning on ending the campaign on 10/23. I plan on starting to ship out the early issues and the giant issue to backers and I either want us to hit the final stretch goal before I start shipping or to end the campaign before that happens. I would hate to start shipping out perks and then have to re-ship the one item at a later date. please note that I will only be shipping out perks that contain issues 1,2,3 and the giant issue. The new issues 4,5,6 are still being worked on and should ship out early next year. if you have any questions please message me or hit me up on twitter. Thanks everyone!!

Perks are starting to come in!!

All the stretch goals and backer bonuses are starting to come in!! The 3 character sticker set! Bookmark! and 8 piece pin set!

Very Cool Backer Update

I have decided to go the extra mile for the trading card set! Every backers set will come packaged in an old school wax package just like Topps used to do back in the day. Just extra special thank you for backing this campaign! Here's a picture of the wrappers, I should be getting these soon! Remember every perk level will have this set included!

A Closer Look at the Cereal Box Available with the Featured Perk!!

One of the exclusives for the campaign is the Mighty Mascots Cereal Box! This is available in the Featured Perk the breakfast club member! Artwork by Frankie B. Washington!

The Chris Giarusso Cover is Revealed!

Overview

Hello, my name is Keith Gleason and I’m the creator and writer of the Mighty Mascots. Welcome to my campaign! The series started in 2019 with Alterna Comics and was a great success (it was the tenth best seller in Alterna comics history!) Now, the Mascots and I are back with the next story, and I'm asking the fans for some help!

For those new to the comic, The Mighty Mascots are a super-group formed from a freak 3D printing accident. Together, they fight the evil Al-Chem group that is bent on taking over the world by using an army of corrupted and twisted versions of beloved brand mascots and characters.

Mighty Mascots Bowl Call

The series was inspired by my love of Saturday Morning Cartoons and my passion for silver age comic books! Joining me in my crusade to bring the Mascots to life is the incredible art team of Ian Waryanto (Doorkickers) and Anton Bandi (Jawara)! Both of these artists are seasoned professionals in the field and their work is top notch. They have helped to give the series its signature look! 

Mock fruit pie ad that ran in the Alterna Books

Mighty Mascots Volume 1 art by Ian Waryanto colors by Anton Bandi

Indiegogo Exclusives!!

I have completed writing for all three issues of this new story and now I just need to gather the funding to pay my artists to bring it to life. In order to do this I’m offering some exciting exclusives that are only available through this campaign! We have 5 Indiegogo exclusive covers by a group of very talented comic book artists and a sixth cover by Chris Giarusso (Mini-Marvels, G-Man, Hashtag Danger) it will be revealed once we reach 100 backers! We also have original artwork, T-Shirts, Cereal Boxes, and many other exciting collectibles waiting to be unlocked!!

Storyline

The new story arc (Issues 4,5,6) titled "Byte the Dust" introduces us to a new villain named Jordan Tecmo. He is charged with finding a powerful energy source for the corrupt Al-Chem Group. Setting up in an old abandoned arcade he brings to life a group of sinister 16-bit video game characters using the tainted 3D Printing formula! The Mighty Mascots are once again called to action, but their leader Captain Horatio HoneyFlakes is distracted and suffering from a troubling dream he keeps having about an old breakfast commercial. Will the mascots be able to save the day and once again stop Doctor Baneful and the Al-Chem group from destroying the city?

Various Perks Available With This Campaign!

Stretch Goals!

Risks & Challenges

Since this is a 100% independently made comic book, all production costs fall on the creator's shoulders.

All of the money raised with this campaign will first go towards paying the artists for their hard work. Any additional funds raised after they are paid will be funneled into creating future issues, reward perks, additional stretch goals, shipping, fees, convention appearances, etc.

This will be my third crowd funding campaign and my first on Indiegogo. In previous campaigns I have delivered on all my rewards, and I am committed to making the perks and stretch goals of this campaign everything a comic book fan could ask for!

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word on social media if you can! Any help is greatly appreciated!! I'm also available for interviews on Podcasts, You Tube Streams, etc. Message me through the campaign.
story_txt:
List of Add-ons that are available during checkout!
Availability may vary depending on what perks are selected. Simply select your perk and select the add-on at the bottom of the checkout window.

Mighty Mascots #1 -- $5
Mighty Mascots #2 -- $5
Mighty Mascots #3 -- $5
Mighty Mascots 100 Page Giant --$10
Mighty Mascots NEW Storyline #4,5,6 -- $15
Captain HoneyFlakes Enamel Pin -- $10
Mondo Martian Enamel Pin -- $10
Mighty Mascots T-Shirt -- $25
Jorge Pacheco Variant Cover for #6 -- $5
Chris Gugliotti Variant Cover for #5 -- $5
Matt Parton Variant Cover for #5 -- $5
Jesse Lundberg Variant Cover for #4 -- $5
Ed Smith Variant Cover for #6 -- $5

Chris Giarusso Variant Cover for #4 -- $15​


Campaign ending on 10/23
Hello everyone, i'm planning on ending the campaign on 10/23. I plan on starting to ship out the early issues and the giant issue to backers and I either want us to hit the final stretch goal before I start shipping or to end the campaign before that happens. I would hate to start shipping out perks and then have to re-ship the one item at a later date. please note that I will only be shipping out perks that contain issues 1,2,3 and the giant issue. The new issues 4,5,6 are still being worked on and should ship out early next year. if you have any questions please message me or hit me up on twitter. Thanks everyone!!
Perks are starting to come in!!
All the stretch goals and backer bonuses are starting to come in!! The 3 character sticker set! Bookmark! and 8 piece pin set!

Very Cool Backer Update
I have decided to go the extra mile for the trading card set! Every backers set will come packaged in an old school wax package just like Topps used to do back in the day. Just extra special thank you for backing this campaign! Here's a picture of the wrappers, I should be getting these soon! Remember every perk level will have this set included!



A Closer Look at the Cereal Box Available with the Featured Perk!!
One of the exclusives for the campaign is the Mighty Mascots Cereal Box! This is available in the Featured Perk the breakfast club member! Artwork by Frankie B. Washington!


The Chris Giarusso Cover is Revealed!

Overview
Hello, my name is Keith Gleason and I’m the creator and writer of the Mighty Mascots. Welcome to my campaign! The series started in 2019 with Alterna Comics and was a great success (it was the tenth best seller in Alterna comics history!) Now, the Mascots and I are back with the next story, and I'm asking the fans for some help!
For those new to the comic, The Mighty Mascots are a super-group formed from a freak 3D printing accident. Together, they fight the evil Al-Chem group that is bent on taking over the world by using an army of corrupted and twisted versions of beloved brand mascots and characters.

Mighty Mascots Bowl Call

The series was inspired by my love of Saturday Morning Cartoons and my passion for silver age comic books! Joining me in my crusade to bring the Mascots to life is the incredible art team of Ian Waryanto (Doorkickers) and Anton Bandi (Jawara)! Both of these artists are seasoned professionals in the field and their work is top notch. They have helped to give the series its signature look! 
Mock fruit pie ad that ran in the Alterna Books

Mighty Mascots Volume 1 art by Ian Waryanto colors by Anton Bandi

I have completed writing for all three issues of this new story and now I just need to gather the funding to pay my artists to bring it to life. In order to do this I’m offering some exciting exclusives that are only available through this campaign! We have 5 Indiegogo exclusive covers by a group of very talented comic book artists and a sixth cover by Chris Giarusso (Mini-Marvels, G-Man, Hashtag Danger) it will be revealed once we reach 100 backers! We also have original artwork, T-Shirts, Cereal Boxes, and many other exciting collectibles waiting to be unlocked!!

The new story arc (Issues 4,5,6) titled "Byte the Dust" introduces us to a new villain named Jordan Tecmo. He is charged with finding a powerful energy source for the corrupt Al-Chem Group. Setting up in an old abandoned arcade he brings to life a group of sinister 16-bit video game characters using the tainted 3D Printing formula! The Mighty Mascots are once again called to action, but their leader Captain Horatio HoneyFlakes is distracted and suffering from a troubling dream he keeps having about an old breakfast commercial. Will the mascots be able to save the day and once again stop Doctor Baneful and the Al-Chem group from destroying the city?



Various Perks Available With This Campaign!




Stretch Goals!












Risks & Challenges
Since this is a 100% independently made comic book, all production costs fall on the creator's shoulders.
All of the money raised with this campaign will first go towards paying the artists for their hard work. Any additional funds raised after they are paid will be funneled into creating future issues, reward perks, additional stretch goals, shipping, fees, convention appearances, etc.
This will be my third crowd funding campaign and my first on Indiegogo. In previous campaigns I have delivered on all my rewards, and I am committed to making the perks and stretch goals of this campaign everything a comic book fan could ask for!
Other Ways You Can Help
Spread the word on social media if you can! Any help is greatly appreciated!! I'm also available for interviews on Podcasts, You Tube Streams, etc. Message me through the campaign.

story:
Everything I loved about the magic of Saturday mornings, comic books, Anime and cinema. 

Best described as STAR WARS meets JOHN CARTER meets JACK KIRBY!

All hope for Humanity is gone... or so we thought! Jon Malin (JAWBREAKERS, GRAVEYARD SHIFT) returns to reinvigorate the American superhero genre!

10,000 years from now a new Dark Age is upon us. One Man, haunted by visions of a bygone age and a mythical world known as "EARTH" must remember his past to save the last of Humanity on a distant, dying world. In an age where magic and super science are one, to kill a God, a champion must become GODLIKE!

 

"GROUNDBREAKING" - Shane Davis (STARLIGHT CATS/INGLORIOUS REX)

 

GODLIKE- THE ROMULUS SAGA

VOL I: EXTREMIS

48+ full color pages

Jon Malin (Writer/Artist)  Dash Martin (Colors) Eric Weathers (Letters)

He's not even over 9000... yet.

GODLIKE- SUPPLEMENTAL

VOL I: IN DARKNESS WE DWELL

48+ full color pages

VON KLAUS(Monster MD) and MARK POULTON(Graveyard Shift) bring you two two-fisted tales of the Romulus, 24 pages each. Art by Shelby Robertson and TBA. Cover by Jon Malin.

VISIONS #2 (VIRGIN)

32+ pages

"Ghost Tiger" (STARBLADES) by Kyle Ritter

VARIOUS Artists. Each artist will draw their own femme fatale protagonist from their respective projects in a sexy pinup. Discover a whole new world of talent and characters!

 

$115,000 *UNLOCKED* All Backers will receive a print from Jose (LUMINA VHOX) Garcia!

$120,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED*- TRADING CARD! "YOU Get a trading card and YOU get a trading card!" Everyone will receive a trading card, unique from the one built into the tiers.

$125,000 *UNLOCKED* We will host an upcoming art contest, 1st place will receive $500 and the winning piece will be featured as a full page spread in GODLIKE!"

$135,000 *UNLOCKED* We're adding 8 more pages to VISIONS #2! 

$145,000 *UNLOCKED* A new and unique TRADING CARD for all backers! 

$150,000 *UNLOCKED* All New print by Keung Lee for all backers PLUS a unique Foil TRADING CARD for everyone that backs a Secret tier(Creators Signature Tier or GODLIKE GEAR)!

$160,000 *UNLOCKED* Art contest upgrade!  1st place will receive an additional $500 for a total of $1000!

$170,000 *UNLOCKED* All backers receive a GODLIKE print by Clayton (KOZOR) Barton!

$180,000 *UNLOCKED* All backers receive a GODLIKE sticker and a new TRADING CARD!

$190,000 *UNLOCKED* Art contest upgrade! First place will receive an additional $500 for a total of $1500, plus a new print for all backers(Artist TBD)!

$210,000 *UNLOCKED* All backers receive a new PRINT from series creator JON MALIN!

$220,000 *UNLOCKED* Art contest upgrade! First place will receive an additional $500 for a total of $2000!

$230,000 *UNLOCKED* A New GODLIKE TRADING CARD for all backers!

$250,000 *UNLOCKED* A New GODLIKE PRINT(Artist TBD) for all backers! Art contest upgrade! First place will receive an additional $1000 for a total of $3000!

$266,000 *LOCKED* DEFEAT THE EVIL! We will add 10 story pages to the Supplemental book!

$285,000 *LOCKED* We will add an all new 20 pages to the Supplemental, assigning fresh jobs and an all new creative team(Writer, Artist, Colorist) and an additional $500 towards the art contest for 1st place(Total of $3500)

$300,000 *LOCKED* All backers will receive a 20 page GODLIKE #0 issue!!

Any questions or concerns please contact us at Koniwaves@Gmail.com.

When the campaign closes, all sales are considered final so we can get our teams in action and produce these high quality books! All refunds during the 60 day campaign are welcome and will be honored!

Final artwork may vary.

story:
TaleEnd Comics Presents:
COBALT: Atlanta's Thrashing

  • Mixing genre's of cyberpunk, neo-noir, hard-boiled, and suspense this 32 page issue begins with Jesse Jensen/Cobalt trying to make this months rent when he, reluctantly, finds himself having to play hero. Little does he know, this encounter will launch Cobalt into one hell of an ordeal. Since, Esmeralda Blasco and her cartel were dismantled, all the gangs around Atlanta are moving to take the top spot and the Atlanta P.D. aren't keeping up. Can one person help turn the tide? He's sure as hell gonna try in Cobalt: Atlanta's Thrashing!
  • Working on the continuing story of Jesse Jensen and his circle of family/friends has been one in the making for quite sometime. I wanted to bring the readers a character that is struggling to balance his responsibilities to his younger brother, Isaac, and becoming the hero the city of Atlanta needs. The inner turmoil of wanting to don the mask and help clean up Atlanta's filth is met with the longing to just get back to a normal life and take care of his little brother. What will be his decision? And what will it cost? 
  • Starting with COBALT: Atlanta's Thrashing you'll be helping the brand of TaleEnd Studio to grow and bring more content down the road! TaleEnd will become more productive in bringing you, the reader, more stories at a quicker pace. Not only will we tackle street level super-hero action, but also mythology, intergalactic travel, and a magnitude of story-telling unmatched by the mainstream. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • I'm asking for $3,000 as a fixed goal for the comeuppance of COBALT: Atlanta's Thrashing. Anything after that is going to be put back into TaleEnd Studio for future projects! 

  • ​​FREE SHIPPING in The U.S.!!!! Shipping has been included in the tier(s), so you won't get that extra charge at checkout!

  • Not only are you backing a badass comic , but you'll see the rewards are just as epic! Each art piece is done by a different artist and exceptionally well! I love each piece these individuals have done, and wanted to find a way to put more eyes on "Not-so-well-known" artists. Their name or handle will be given at the tier levels that way, if you enjoy their work as much as I do, you can go get in touch with them about your project(s)!
  • Whether a success or not, the funds raised will be focused on bringing this issue of COBALT to fruition. That's how much I want to bring this character and his story to you!

     

Stretch Goals:

After we meet our goal of $3,000 every extra $1,000 will be unlocking a new tier:

1. Embroidered Patch of the TaleEnd Comics Logo


2. A Trading Card by interior artist Erwin J. Arroza


3. The Original 7-Page Origin Story Added to COBALT: Atlanta's Thrashing


4. COBALT T-SHIRT w/ Art by Erwin J. Arroza

Risks & Challenges

All pages are drawn and inked. I am now going over the panels and restructuring some dialogue before I put my letterist to work.  Unlocking upgrades & new content may add some production time but not much, Also the Covid situation is affecting everyone & everything but you can be assure that you will get your book. This is my second campaign, my first, that I was a part of, being Super-Abled Comics on KS. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Make some noise about this campaign by sharing the URL or posting a link!
  • Share some of the art from either my Twitter or Instagram (TaleEndStudio)

Catch you guys on the flipside!

story:
A 25 paged Action-thriller, The VeilWalker #1 introduces us to a world of horrors ruled from the shadows by an ancient institution of magicians called The Order Of The Veil Guard. Readers will follow the exploits of this orders most decorated Inquisitor, Alexander Salvador Infamously known as The VeilWalker.

 

WIP pages and Panels for issue #1: Not in order

​

Page pending letters*

Original proof of concept: Issue 0

Index:

  • About the VeilWalker
  • Why Indiegogo
  • Holofoil Cover vids
  • The team
  • Stretch Goals
  • Risk and Challenges

Lore: The VeilWalker takes place in a world where a small percentage of the population is born with The Gift, which allows those granted with it to use their mana to cast all kinds of spells. To protect those aforementioned from not only the ignorance of man, but also the evil spawn of the Veil, The Order Of The Veil Guard was established in the late middle ages. For centuries The Order has balanced the study of the Veil and maintained not just its secrecy but that of the Gifted population as a whole. The Veil and why it has weakened at an exponential rate still remains shrouded and in the days to come Alexander will witness the Veil ripped asunder like never before. 

 

The Set up: After the disappearance of an urban explorer is seen on live stream, The head of the Veil Guards Inquisitors branch is tasked with investigating for potential VeilSpawn involvement. However, Alexander soon finds that the greatest challenge he will face tonight was one he thought long subdued. This story will push Alexanders and his skills to their limits, Ultimately placing the fate of the world on his ability to find answers he has spent a lifetime searching for.

 

Why Indiegogo: The art has already been funded, pencils and inks are done, colors have just started. The reason I'm asking for your support on Indiegogo is to begin the funding process for Issue two, but primarily I would love to give you all the ability to join The VeilGuard as our fight is just beginning. I truly believe The VeilWalker belongs on Indiegogo, I hope you do to. <3

 

Holofoil Covers:

 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We've tried to mitigate any potential lateness with this book by beginning production months ago. We will ideally ship all books by the end of October, but set our delivery deadline to November 2021. We've done this to ensure that we deliver your rewards on time or EARLY. We've learned the hard way; with experience, that delays CAN happen and sometimes there's not a thing we as publishers can do about it. We strive to give our Artist enough time to do their best work and accommodate their needs especially around these trying times. We make sure that regardless of any delay, we give consistent updates throughout the process, often with examples of work-in-progress (WIP) pages. We love what we do, and we always finish what we start with quality and longevity in mind. At Oasi Comics we understand the care, the quality, and the craft that comics deserve. We love comics and overall great story telling, so making them is a dream come true for us. Thanks to all of our backers for helping us tell these stories.

story:
Overview

GRANDPA Issue#1 is a Steampunk/Fantasy 44 page full color comic that is filled with striking biblical battles and dark humor.

God's daughter Divinia battles the horrific armies of Hell for her planet of gods, Arbiter. But she is getting weaker... To exploit this weakness, the Devil sends a demonic cowboy named Razorous after Divinia.

Will he drag her soul to Hell?

Choose a reward to find out!

REWARDS

Bronze($15): Digital thank you letter/Digital comic.

Silver($25):  Digital thank you letter./Digital comic./Physical comic.

GOLD($65): Digital thank you letter./Digital comic./Physical comic./Digital comic narration./Exclusive profile picture./Variant cover of your choosing./Inside look at the script./Pin/Bookmark./Free US shipping./*SECRET REWARD

PLATINUM($200): Digital thank you letter./Digital comic./Physical comic./Digital comic narration./Exclusive profile picture./Variant cover 1./ Variant cover 2./Inside look at the script./Free Worldwide shipping./Desktop wallpaper./Phone wallpaper./Poster./Pin./Bookmark./T-Shirt./Name in the book./*SECRET REWARD

story:
What is Shyft about?

Shyft is the first comic from creator Connery Cateni and his brand, Dragon Multimedia LLC. Welcome to the fantastical world of Sheobia, a world of anthropomorphic beings and humans living together in harmony, and the world of Shyft. 

Meet Sunny, to most inhabitants of Sheobia, she is a normal girl, but Sunny has a secret... She has a passion for adventure, and is a one of a kind shyfter.
Adventure always comes crashing, and Sunny learns this the hard way. Unexpectedly attacked at her work, Sunny must quickly shyft into the hero she always wanted to be. But is she fully prepared for what's to come?

What is a Shyfter? Well shyfter's are an alien race that can shyft their forms to a more animalistic version of themselves. For some this power comes with a calling to dispense justice, like Sunny's father, The Great Dragon Karza! Sunny has trained her whole life for the opportunity to be a hero, but now that opportunity's come a knocking, it's quite different than she had imagined it. Find out more in the pages of Shyft!

Who is working on the book?

Dragon Multimedia LLC has collected a team of up-and-coming hotshot creatives to make this book the best it can be. While the concept of this book was pioneered by Dragon Multimedia LLC founder, Connery Cateni (Creator of Shyft, Writer of Kristin Konkle Short Film Series, Eric in Space, Oscar and Otto Reborn, and upcoming San Dalston), he has brought on 9 Realms Publishing's writing star: Michael Oden (Elysian Fields, The Embrace, American Bliss) to craft Shyft's script and narrative to deliver a quality story that engages the audience. Connery has workshopped this concept with several different artists before finding the perfect pairing in up-and-coming Digital Sensation Riggo (Team Sea3on, Sonic the Hedgehog Online) and his colorist Laura Adams on to bring the world of Sheobia to life!

WHY ARE WE HERE:

Dragon Multimedia LLC is an up-and-coming entertainment brand dedicated to producing quality content at a great value. However, no start-up can get off the ground without consumers and Indiegogo has proven itself to be a prime market for crowdfunding and establishing a base. So Why ARE WE HERE? because YOU are here and we value YOU, the fans, and because we want YOU to be the first to get in on this start of an IP that we feel could be the next Sonic. 

 

What do I get for backing the campaign?

Well outside of our undying appreciation, you get a book with a 28-32p page count with the top production quality that we can provide. However, as the campaign persists and we reach our collective stretch goals, we will be adding sweet extras that will make the experience all the more worth it! 
 

Main Book:

 

Deluxe Edition Wraparound Variant:

 

T-Shirt:

Plushie:

Get them all in our Featured Tier:

Stretch-goals: 

Funding: Buttons! 

$5,000 USD: Mini Prints! 

$6,000 USD: Trading Cards!

$8,000 USD:  Holofoil Deluxe Upgrade
 

WHAT COULD POSSIBLY GO WRONG?!?

Well, the most obvious issue that we could potentially run into is not funding, and as a result not being able to produce the book. This would obviously not feel great, but we are going to be doing a flexible goal on this first campaign, and so no matter what happens, the backers of this book WILL receive their books. We are hopeful that this will not be a problem as, well, just look at how great this book looks! 

Support Can Come From More than a Dollar! 

The past 2 years have been a turbulent time, and since Dragon Multimedia is an up and coming company that has not yet been tested, we understand if you aren't able to chuck a buck our way, but that's not the only way you can support us! Help us by sharing this link around, Like us on Facebook, follow us on Twitter @DragonMultiLLC, and if you know a promoter that hasn't checked us out, point them in our direction because we need all the help we can get! Every click to this campaign is a potential backer!

story:
Issue #1 of NINA & ARIEL - a post-apocalyptic sci-fi tale, and first creator-owned project by fan favorite artist ED BENES: Everything you already saw with some additional news!

This is a passion project over 14 years in the making! First conceived back in 2004 during his work on Birds of Prey, NINA AND ARIEL is a post-apocalyptic sci-fi series inspired by my love of Heavy Metal Magazine and similar European comics of the time, and also the work of Frank Frazetta (Fire & Ice, etc).  For years, Nina & Ariel has had to take a back seat to my regular professional deadlines - and now, I'm has finally dedicated myself to giving these characters the attention that they deserve!

Me and my team of artists need help to get this gorgeous #1-issue a post-apocalyptic sci-fi tale get some extra traction!

The Indiegogo campaign is going to help us cover all print costs, and will also allow us to pay the creators, and to get issue 2 into production as soon as possible!  With your help, this will only be the beginning for Nina & Ariel!

Nina & Ariel was successfully funded via Kickstarter earlier this year. We believe that # 1 edition can still offer much more than it has been offered. We started a new campaign with extra material and news that we would like to share with you. This new campaign will be our "golden goose" and now we have 100% autonomy throughout the process. We all know practice makes perfect so our intention is to create a strong project and make you happy to continue with us on the journey to launch Nina & Ariel # 2. SPOILER ALERT: It's almost ready for launch!

NINA & ARIEL: BEHIND THE BACKGROUND

In this scenario we find our heroines:

Nina – 19-year-old girl who grew up in a banker out of war and not knowing what the world was becoming. She was tutored by a man with oriental origin who is paraplegic and has a past that will converge with the story of the young girl.

Ariel – 27’s former military woman trained to survive to most diverse conditions and fought in the Great War. Her platoon was responsible for great victories. She was kicked out from the army and after that she was sentenced to live in the remnants of the postwar world. She carries a katana as a faithful companion who is a witness to what Ariel was before the army and the war.

WHAT IS THE BACKGROUND?

The negligence of mans with the natural resources offered by the planet had serious consequences for the future. A world war for territories that still had resources was established; while the war was being fought between the soldiers the scientists found out an escape route thus emerging the NEW EDEN. It’s become a hope for humanity the New Eden was real for all those who were of really importance to the continuation of the species or had enough possessions to pay for this new world, leaving behind the scum of humanity and living on a destroyed planet by war and almost without resources for survival.

In this first edition our heroines are presented and we’ill follow the exact moment they meet each other and start their adventures  in this chaotic scenario where we can feel the climate of violence and tension.

PREVIEW

THE TEAM

ED BENES (writer, artist) is a well-known artist in the comic book market that drew up titles such as Gen¹³, Birds of Prey, Supergirl and Superman . In 2006 Ed was commissioned to illustrate writer Brad Meltzer's script for the Justice League, a title Ed drew up until 2009. He later contributed to Batman and Birds of Prey , Steel, and countless others. Ed is the holder of the title of brazilian with the largest number of pages published by DC Comics. To this day he continues to work with DC as well as eventual cover work for Dynamite, Zenescope, etc. He also recently made a 100-page graphic novel for Legendary. Cataloging everything Ed Benes has ever done in his career to this date is almost impossible. Now Ed is giving up some work with the US market to devote himself to NINA & ARIEL an authorial project that comes to life and strength right here and right now!

DINEI RIBEIRO (colorist) – He has graduated in Social Communication from Universidade Pontifícia Católica de Minas and worked with various advertising agencies until starting his own studio in 2008. Since then, he has worked with several clients producing illustrations and he is always coloring comics for publishers like Dynamite, Legendary and Dark Horse in several titles like Vampirella, Lone Ranger, Warlord of Mars, Axiom. Back to 2015 Dinei joined forces with longtime friend and teacher Ed Benes to work for DC Comics on franchises, including iconic Justice League characters, Suicide Squad, Green Lantern, Superman, etc. She is currently working in Hal Jordan colors and has done extensive work for DC Comics, most recently on New Challengers, Deathstroke, Teen Titans, and Green Lanterns.

DIEGO BERNARD - Hailing from Brazil, Diego Bernard is one of the hottest young talents in comics!  He launched his work on the market early and by being mentored by Ed Benes and was one of the first designers to land at Ed Benes Studio. Diego first made his mark with an 18-issue run on Top Cow's flagship title Witchblade, and quickly followed that up with three years at Valiant Comics, where he helped shape such popular core characters as X-O Manowar and Ninjak, among others!  Shortly thereafter, Diego worked on a few issues of X-Men: Gold prior to assuming his current role as the regular artist on Lady Death!

FRED BENES – He has made his career as an amazing pin up comic artist and holds records of sales for nothing less than years! Fred Benes is yet another prodigy of the Benes family and anyone who saw his work knows the uniqueness of his art. He has worked as an art finalist on titles such as Witchblade, Disciples A.D., and Neanderthal Rising, and with his brother Ed Benes produced incredible arts. Just google: Fred Benes!

VINICIUS TOWSEND - Emerges as a new promise for the colorist market. Born in Rio de Janeiro and graduated in Fine Arts from Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro. He works as a colorist for 8 years now and has participating in publications such as IDW, Dynamite, among others. Currently participates as a freelancer in publications in the national and international independent market.

HUMBERT CÉDRIC - live in France and started digital coloring 10 year ago. His real job is juggler he work on photoshop and in a Wacom cintiq tablet doing amazing colors in his free time.

JORGE VIEIRA (letters) - has worked on several creator-owned project, in addition to his role as manager of the Ed Benes Studio through more than a decade. In 2014 he began to study the structure and composition for comic’s letters and soon came the works. Since then he continues to put letters on comic pages. He has done various work for the US market and he is now interested in the national market. Participated in some projects such as Força BR, Gaspar Vianna - O legado de um Heroi, some tittle from Argo Comics like Lauren Order, Monster Island, etc.

WHAT’S NEW ON THE NEWST CAMPAIN OF NINA & ARIEL #1

DIRECTOR'S CUT PREVIEW

story:
OVERVIEW

THE ULTIMATE CRUSADERS is a 36-page sci-fi, action-adventure comic book series based on the mid 90's and early 2000's television shows and comic books. The story revolves around a young, socially awkward boy genius named Orion Williams and his best friend, Claire Rosemary, who work together to build a massive mechanical suit in the hopes of discovering the whereabouts of Orion's father, who has been lost in space for nearly three years.

In the midst of their constant failures; however, the duo witnesses a space shuttle crash into Earth's surface, revealing a mysterious, but powerful artifact inside. Soon after this discovery, they are relentlessly tracked down by a savage alien race known as, The Blackened, who have laid waste to multiple planets across the galaxy.

Now, with the artifact in tow, the duo is forced to join a ragtag group of alien freedom fighters known as THE ULTIMATE CRUSADERS in an effort to prevent The Blackened from destroying every other race except their own, while uncovering the mystery of Orion's father's disappearance.

 

VARIANT COVER #2 by Kevin Shah

 

 

VARIANT COVER #1 by Domenic Serena

 

 

MAIN COVER by Ed Jimenez

 

 

CHARACTER STICKERS

 

 

 

INTERIOR ARTWORK

 

 

CHARACTER SHEETS

 

 

THE FUNDING AND GOALS

The first issue will be a 36-page book, which will also be available in stores after the campaign has ended, published by SCOUT COMICS.

The $5,000 goal will cover the funding of the book as well as the printing cost.

If we receive an amount higher than the main goal, we will be offering some stretch goals as well!

 

 

 

RISKS & IMPACT

Obviously, there are several risks involved, given this is my very first comic book ever to be published, but I have written for several years of my life and I firmly believe that this is a story worth telling.

 The books' primary focus is to emphasize and connect with readers who are uniquely different than those who they try to mimic, while also diving into the mysteries of the universe and the strange, otherworldly beings that dwell within it.  This will be the most ambitious project that I have ever made, so I am 100% committed to delivering on any and every promise spoken in this campaign.

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

If, for any reason, you can't contribute at this time, please share our book on Twitter, Facebook, or any other social media website that you think would like our book!

story:
When an ancient evil is awakened, only ancient power can stop it!

Young Will Wryneck, a rookie cop, comes across an Egyptian relic, and he is granted the power of the SUN!

This is part one of an epic series where you will follow our hero to find godly power, archaic enemies, and dark secrets!

Back this hand crafted, fully colored, 24 plus page comic book now! And bring this universe to life!

 

WIP PAGES

(This means "Work In Progress." I will replace these and add new pages as I work on them.)

 

 

 

 

BACK THE FIRST EVER APPEARANCE OF BLUE PHOENIX!

 

 

This is a character that I want to build a world around and create more stories with in the future, and I have some HUGE ideas. Be a part of the birth of a brand new superhero!

Hi! My name is Joe Archey. I've been creating art my whole life and went to art school after my time in the Army. Creating action packed stories and building worlds is what I came here to do.

I'm a stickler for getting projects done on time and delivering. I want to entertain you with this book, and keep you as a customer. You'd better believe I will treat you with the respect you deserve as a backer. I'm in this for the long run.

 

FREE TRADING CARDS!

Drawn/ Inked by Rob Archey, Colored by Joe Archey

Happy Trading Card

 

"The Professor" Trading card. COLOR COMING SOON.

THE PRINT

 


This is a LIMITED EDITION NUMBERED fine art print. Art by Rob Archey. COLOR COMING SOON!

 

 

NEW BOOKMARK BY LUKE ARCHEY

(Nice scan and colors coming soon.)

You'll get this FREE book mark with every order!

 

 

STRETCH GOALS:

 

FREE TRADING CARDS: at $1000       GOAL MET!!!!!!!

 

FREE LARGE SHOULDER PATCH: $1500

 

THE PATCH

(CONCEPT)

 

 

 

 

 

NEXT GOAL REVEALED AFTER PATCH GOAL IS MET!!!!

 

 

 

"BUT JOE, YOU'RE A NOOB IN COMICS! HOW CAN I TRUST YOU TO DELIVER?"

Woah there friend! This may be my FIRST comic book, but I've been both an art student and freelance artist for years now and have been expected to deliver on deadlines. I take pride in always meeting my deadlines and delivering QUALITY. I've always loved comics and am naturally drawn to them as an art form. I will not let you down! 

 

 

WE CAN DO THIS!

 

All I'm asking for is $500 to print the first batch! That's it! OF COURSE there will be multiple stretch goals set later. I'm already talking to artists about trading cards, figurines and other things but that's down the line. My goal is to fund this comic and get it into your hands!

 

WHEN WILL I GET IT?

I have the campaign "estimated delivery" set for this time next year, but don't worry! I'm shooting to have this book in your hands before APRIL of 2021, just in time for "For The Fans Fest"!

 

Risks & Challenges

I'm a one man team right now, that means two things.

THE BAD: I bear the entire workload of the comic.

THE GOOD:  I don't need to rely on anyone else for work to be delivered on time. I already have about 6 pages completed.

The challenge is the time it takes to do this. BUT as I've already started the art and am probably drawing as you read this, the book is well on its way to completion.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't have the funds right now to back, that's totally fine! You can still help me by sharing this campaign all over social media! Have a friend or family member who like comics? Tell them! Heck, maybe they'll order one for you too!

 

BACK NOW AND BE A PART OF THE RISE!
story_txt:
When an ancient evil is awakened, only ancient power can stop it!Young Will Wryneck, a rookie cop, comes across an Egyptian relic, and he is granted the power of the SUN!This is part one of an epic series where you will follow our hero to find godly power, archaic enemies, and dark secrets!Back this hand crafted, fully colored, 24 plus page comic book now! And bring this universe to life!
 
WIP PAGES
(This means "Work In Progress." I will replace these and add new pages as I work on them.)
