story:
6 FREE GARTH ENNIS DIGITAL COMICS FOR ALL SUPPORTERS!

We're closing in on the end of The Boys Limited Edition Virgin Art Variant Covers program on IndieGoGo!  There's only six days left and when it is over, its really over.  We're not going In Demand with this project.  So to celebrate the last six days this is open, we're giving EVERY SUPPORTER 6 FREE DIGITAL GARTH ENNIS COMICS!  Its an extra special thank you to everyone that helped to make this project a big success.

These are the issues:

A Train Called Love #1

Battlefields Dear Billy #1

Battlefiels Tankies #1

Battlefields Night Witches #1

Red Team #1 

The Boys Dear Becky #1

Plus, don't forget, everyone also gets a free digital pdf copy of Jennifer Blood #1 that we announced last week.  That's actually seven free digital comics as our thank you to every supporter!  

We hope you are enjoying The Boys Season 2 on Amazon and are ready for the final episode coming up!  Please share our IndieGoGo project with your comic book reading family and friends.  Every share matters and we can't wait to get these awesome collectibles to you!

 

 

Free Digital Garth Ennis Comics For Everyone!

We're so thankful to every one of you that has helped to make this program a success that we wanted to give you even more free stuff to enjoy for being a part of this event!  Every backer to The Boys Limited Edition Virgin Art Covers will receive a FREE DIGITAL COPY OF GARTH ENNIS' JENNIFER BLOOD #1!  

We think all The Boys fans will be blown away by Garth's work on Jennifer Blood and we're thrilled to have a chance to share this first issue with everyone!  

In fact - every supporter at $150 level and above will receive FREE DIGITAL COPIES OF JENNIFER BLOOD #1-6!  You will get the full first story arc to enjoy as an extra thank you for helping us make this project a success!  We're so thankful for your generous support that we want to give back to you for making this entire program possible!

The Full 6 Issue Arc in One Digital Trade Paperback!

Thanks to each and every supporter that helped us achieve the goal of this fund raiser!

 

Thank You! Free Premium The Boys Comics For Everyone!!!

We have been so thrilled to see the level of support that Garth Ennis and Darick Robertson's The Boys project has gotten here on IndieGoGo.  It has been really wonderful to see how many people love the comics and are enjoying Season 2 of the TV show on Amazon.  We wanted to find a way to thank everyone who is making this project such a huge success and we decided the best way to do that is with some awesome premium editions FREE for our supporters! 

EVERYONE that supports The Boys Virgin Limited Edition Variants program at the print level will receive a Free The Boys Dear Becky #2 Line Art Comic Retailer PREMIUM Incentive book as an extra thank you for helping to make this a success!  These books were very rare, only a few of them got out into the wild and we've reserved one for you!

And as an added bonus, every supporter at the $150+ level will ALSO receive a FREE The Boys Dear Becky #2 Virgin Art Comic Retailer  PREMIUM Incentive comic! If you support at this level, ready for this? You get BOTH of them for being a mega supporter!  This very rare edition will go perfectly with your copies of The Boys Virgin Art Limited Edition comics!  

Thank you for making this project a big success!  We appreciate your support and make sure you catch The Boys Season 2 on Amazon!  

 

 

New Reward Perks Added - THE BOYS DEAR BECKY SIGNED & REMARKED EDITIONS!

Darick Robertson has agreed to sign a limited number of copies of The Boys Dear Becky #1 Black & White Limited Edition and to remark with original hand-drawn sketches on copies of The Boys Dear Becky #1!  This is HUGE!  Now we can give fans who want to add original sketch art to your collections of The Boys the perfect option.  Darick is doing four different hand-drawn versions of remarked covers - Butcher, The Female, Hughie, and Homelander for just $90 each.  If that is too hard of a decision to make - YOU CAN GET ALL FOUR at a special value rate of only $300 (a $360 value)!   

Remarked Covers Available as Single Characters or Buy All For at a Value Price!

 

 

WELCOME TO GARTH ENNIS & DARICK ROBERTSON'S:  THE BOYS!

if you are a comics fan - you've seen people talking about the groundbreaking series - THE BOYS.  Garth Ennis and Darick Robertson developed a world where superheroes exist, but they don't fight for truth, justice, and whatever...they are the world's biggest celebrities and their behavior is like that of the biggest irresponsible celeb times a million.  What stands between the wanton destruction of these supes and the common person?  Why The Boys, of course.  Butcher and his mates are on the case and confronting the out of control celebrity supes with extreme prejudice.  

 

If your first exposure to THE BOYS is through the incredible Amazon Prime series, there is a whole new world of stories and source material for you to discover in the pages of the comics and omnibus trade paperback collections which inspired the live action show!  

 

To celebrate the new season of THE BOYS we have put together three awesome limited edition commemorative editions featuring the glorious virgin cover art of Darick Robertson!  

 

 

THREE VERY SPECIAL ISSUES - KILLER VIRGIN ART COVERS!

 

We selected these three key issues for this groovy commemorative project for a special reason! Each one is limited to what we sell through crowd funding making this an extremely low printing and highly collectible copies.  These editions will be perfect for collecting, getting autographed, or slabbing with CGC!  

 

THE BOYS #1 

The premiere issue!  Garth Ennis and Darick Robertson's introduction to THE BOYS got everyone's attention!  The dark world and even darker story was so riveting that it caught on from the start.  

 

THE BOYS #3

The introduction of Starlight was a turning point for the story and the premiere of a fan favorite character!  

 

THE BOYS #7

As THE BOYS found their new home at Dynamite, the second story arc begins here!  

 

Choose the issue you want or pre-order ALL 3 and save! If you wish to receive more than one copy of the same issue, simply select your desired cover and increase your total pledge by the amount shown below. You will be asked to confirm your "add-on" items by survey, following the end of the campaign.

 

THE COMPLETE STORY THUS FAR IN OMNIBUS FORMAT 

 

Read the whole story from the beginning with SIX volumes containing all 72 original issues! All volumes are available with either a "PHOTO" (Amazon show) or "ART" cover (comic).

 

SPECIAL BONUS - GARTH ENNIS AUTOGRAPHED VOL 1 ART & VOL 1 PHOTO OMNIBUS EDITIONS IN THE SETS!

 

We are so excited to offer this special reader reward to all the fans of THE BOYS. Garth Ennis himself signed a limited number of The Boys Omnibus Vol 1 (75 of the Art and 25 of the Photo cover editions) that we are offering out to readers that purchase a set of The Boys Omnibus editions at the discounted price of $150 for all six volumes. Check out the reward levels to see how many of the limited sets remain and add the scribe's signature to your collection of The Boys Omnibuses today!

 

COMPLETE YOUR COLLECTION WITH THE BOYS COLLECTIBLES

 

Wear the iconic cover of THE BOYS #1 with this high quality T-Shirt:

 

THESE UNIQUE COLLECTIBLES ARE CREATED USING REAL, UNCIRCULATED U.S. CURRENCY.

 

 

 

ORDER YOUR LIMITED EDITION COPIES SLABBED AND GRADED AT CGC AT 9.8 OR HIGHER.

ORDER THEM ON THEIR OWN OR ADD THEM TO YOUR COMIC ORDER BY INCREASING YOUR TOTAL PLEDGE BY THE AMOUNT SHOWN BELOW. YOU WILL BE ASKED TO CONFIRM YOUR ADD-ONS BY SURVEY, FOLLOWING THE END OF THE CAMPAIGN.

 

GARTH ENNIS SIGNED COPIES

"THE BOYS: DEAR BECKY" SERIES

 EXPERIENCE THE BOYS THE WAY IT WAS MEANT TO BE READ

We're thrilled to be able to give Garth and Darick's worldwide fans an opportunity to experience THE BOYS comics and trade collections.  You can read every bloody page and get a deep understanding of the mature readers extravaganza while watching the new season on Amazon.  We will do our best to fill this project as soon as it is complete.  Its our intention to have the books in your hands to enjoy as quickly as possible.

story:
Hello Potential IndieGoGo Backers!  Welcome to the campaign to fund CYBERFROG 2: REKT PLANET!


HERE'S THE STORY: 

It's 2018, twenty years after the VYZPZZ invasion.  CYBERFROG has reunited with his friend HEATHER SWAIN, who is surviving in the New Jersey Pine Barrens with her ten year old daughter LILY and others.

They live by these four rules:

1. STAY IN THE TREES: The Vyzpzz have demonstrated that they have trouble maneuvering in the forest.

2. STAY NEAR THE SMOKE: Survivors keep bonfires going constantly.  The Vyzpzz are repelled by smoke and fire.

3. STAY CALM: The Vyzpzz are intoxicated by panic and fear.

4. ALWAYS WEAR RED: The Vyzpzz can't see the color red.  Wearing red cloaks makes you invisible to them.

The survivors believe that they are safely hidden, and have been living in relative safety for years.  But the return of CYBERFROG brings trouble.  Big trouble.

 

CYBERFROG 2: REKT PLANET is the long awaited sequel to CYBERFROG: BLOODHONEY!  It will be 48 pages long, and if we can reach $100,000 in funding, it'll also have the same beautiful chromium cover that BLOODHONEY sported!  We can do it!

Art and story by me, Ethan Van Sciver.

Colors by Kyle Ritter

Lettering by SOMNI

And look at that fantastic cover by the legendary JAE LEE!

ALL BACKERS OF CYBERFROG 2: REKT PLANET will now receive:

 

1. Your Chromium variant of REKT PLANET!

2. BONUS CYBERFROG: HEARTSICK HORROR comic!

3. SALAMANDROID COLOR ZINE classic reprint comic!

4. SIX TRADING CARDS!

5. TWO GIANT DAZZLING STICKERS!

6. CYBERFROG KEYCHAIN!

7. CYBERFROG PVC TOY!

 

All thanks to the many backers who built this campaign into the success that it's become!  Now EVERYONE gets all of these bonuses!

Here's a look at the finished SALAMANDROID PVC TOY!  Look how beautiful it is!  You can back it now all by itself, or you can use the ADD ON feature at check out to get one for a discount on shipping!  

 

 


SALAMANDROID: DEATH'S STING

Salamandroid gets a SPIN OFF book!

Everyone seemed to love Sal, and lots of people asked me if he might get his own title.  Well, sure!  This 32 page comic will tell the story of what happened to SALAMANDROID during the Vyzpzz invasion of 1998, and the fate that befell this lovable giant.

It ties directly into CYBERFROG: REKT PLANET.  

Is it necessary to understand REKT PLANET?  Nnnnnooo.....

But will it enhance your reading experience?  Big time!  And if you don't back it here, you'll find yourself looking for it later!  

NO SPOILERS, so let's talk about the content.  I've drawn and written it.  It will have a wraparound GLOW IN THE DARK cover!  20 pages of art and story, with a bonus ROGUES GALLERY of pin up art and information about all of their villains!

There's a handy option to back both REKT PLANET and DEATH'S STING, and that'll give you the WHOLE STORY!

 

THE PERKS!

 

THE EXECUTIVE HONEYCOMB BOX SET!

 

SOLD OUT!!

This is the ULTIMATE way to enjoy CYBERFROG 2: REKT PLANET! 

It's a sturdy portfolio with a magnetic seal covered with honeycomb material printed on the outside, and beautiful splash art of our heroes inside!  It's a great way to protect and display your CYBERFROG collection on your bookshelf!

But that's just the box!  Inside, you'll receive:

1. One copy of Jae Lee's REKT PLANET variant cover!

2. One copy of SALAMANDROID: DEATH'S STING

3. One copy of CYBERFROG: HEARTSICK HORROR, a bonus comic with art by E.J. Morges!

4. The EXCLUSIVE gold foil and embossed ULTIMATE BLOODHONEY!  This will only be available with THIS PERK.  I've taken the story content of CYBERFROG BLOODHONEY and added 1998: THE DIARY OF HEATHER SWAIN, reprinted at full size.  80 pages total, this book will be printed on heavy gloss paper, perfect bound with a spine.  The cover will be gold foil, with the sculpted classic "jumping" image of CYBERFROG on it!  Absolutely gorgeous, this edition is truly the jewel of your CYBERFROG collection!  It'll be printed to match the orders of the EXECUTIVE HONEYCOMB BOX SET!

5. One Copy of AMPHIBIONIX #2, an ashcan reprinting a story from 1998 in full color!

6. One Copy of CYBERFROG: REKT PLANET "OUR HEROES" Chromium variant

7. One Copy of CYBERFROG: REKT PLANET "VILLAINOUS SCUM" Chromium variant

8. One Copy of CYBERFROG: REKT PLANET "I SPIT ON YOUR HIVE" Exclusive Chromium variant

9. One EXCLUSIVE CYBERFROG Wall Calendar

10.  One of EVERY ADDITIONAL regular perk and achievement that this campaign sees from here!  You won't miss any of the ashcans, cards, stickers, whatever...it'll all be found in your Executive Honeycomb box!  Consider this a subscription to the campaign!

(Note: This doesn't include the 24 hour limited IDES OF MARCH variant. Make sure to grab that while it's available!)

 

ORIGINAL ART!

 

You can purchase a page of original hand drawn art from either CYBERFROG 2: REKT PLANET or SALAMANDROID: DEATH'S STING!  There are 48 pages available for CYBERFROG, and 20 pages available for SALAMANDROID.  If both sell through, pages will be granted randomly to backers!  There are no bad pages...everything rocks!  

 

BE A SURVIVOR!  JOIN THE CAST!

 

Only 5 opportunities are available here!  If you back this tier, you, or someone you love, will be drawn into the book as a cast member!  Not just a background player...you will be name-checked and play a significant role in the story!  

I will ask you for photo reference and a little bit about yourself, and you'll either join the cast of survivors in the Pine Barrens...or the cast of survivors in Merchantville.  In either case, you'll interact with other characters and MAYBE just survive to appear in CYBERFROG 3 too!

 

CHIK-N-FRY SHIPPING BOX

 

Order two books or more, and your perks will be shipped in this replica of the take out boxes from the fast food restaurant that Heather Swain used to work at after school, and CyberFrog's favorite place to eat!  CHIK-N-FRY!  Your books will be protected by a foam layer with this delicious looking image of fried chicken, to complete the fun!

NOTE: These are shipping containers, and no guarantee that they'll arrive in mint condition!  But they're pretty durable and tough!  

 

STRETCH GOALS!

 

CYBERFROG: BLOODHONEY had some terrific bonuses, and since it was such a successful campaign, we made the most of it!  For CYBERFROG: REKT PLANET, I'd like to start off like this:

At $100,000: All versions of CYBERFROG: REKT PLANET will have chromium covers:  MET!  ALL REKT PLANET BOOKS ARE NOW CHROMIUM COVERS!

 

At $150,000: All backers of SALAMANDROID: DEATH'S STING or the HONEYCOMB BOX will receive an AMPHIBIONIX #2 ashcan, colored by Kyle Ritter, free!  MET!!  All backers of SALAMANDROID: DEATH'S STING will receive a copy of AMPHIBIONIX #2 ASHCAN!!

At $200,000: All backers of CYBERFROG REKT PLANET will receive a copy of CYBERFROG: HEARTSICK HORROR, a 32 page comic book with art by EJ MORGES!  MET!  ALL REKT PLANET BACKERS WILL NOW RECEIVE A FREE COPY OF CYBERFROG: NUMB! 

 

AT $250,000, ALL BACKERS will receive a promo trading card called "FAMILY." MET!  ALL BACKERS WILL RECEIVE THE "FAMILY" TRADING CARD!

 

AT $300 ALL BACKERS will receive a promo trading card called "SPITE".  MET!!!  ALL BACKERS WILL RECEIVE THE "SPITE" TRADING CARD!

 

Let's do a CHROMIUM CYBERFROG TRADING CARD once we pass $400K!

 

At $425K, let's do a CHROMIUM SALAMANDROID TRADING CARD!

 

At $450K, let's do a CHROMIUM HEATHER SWAIN TRADING CARD!

 

AT $500K ALL EXECUTIVE HONEYCOMB BOXES will contain a 2021 CYBERFROG WALL CALENDAR with art by CAANAN WHITE, EJ MORGES, JON MALIN, KARL O'NEILL, KELSEY SHANNON and ETHAN VAN SCIVER!  

 

 

 

 

 

If we meet these goals, I'll add more achievements!  I'd love to do more trading cards, stickers, and posters!

TIMELINESS!!

 

This is VERY important.  The first campaign was a struggle.  Finishing the books, getting the printing issues worked out, fulfillment...all caused massive delays that were based on my NOT BEING PREPARED.

I've gained a quick education from this experience, and feel like I can get these books finished, printed and in the mail before Christmas of 2020.  But I've set a shipping date of May of 2021 just to be able to exceed expectations this time.

I've got my printers lined up, fulfillment plan, and most of all, I'm anxious to do this project.  CYBERFROG has been a dream job for me, and the story is bursting to be told.  

I will not be late this time.  That's a promise.  If this book is delayed, it'll be because we were invaded by giant alien wasps.  Outside of my control.  But this frog needs to keep jumping, and I appreciate your continued support!

THANK YOU for joining ALL CAPS COMICS on this journey!  Without further ado, here's a non-spoiler look at the comic!
story_txt:
Hello Potential IndieGoGo Backers!  Welcome to the campaign to fund CYBERFROG 2: REKT PLANET!HERE'S THE STORY: It's 2018, twenty years after the VYZPZZ invasion.  CYBERFROG has reunited with his friend HEATHER SWAIN, who is surviving in the New Jersey Pine Barrens with her ten year old daughter LILY and others.They live by these four rules:1. STAY IN THE TREES: The Vyzpzz have demonstrated that they have trouble maneuvering in the forest.2. STAY NEAR THE SMOKE: Survivors keep bonfires going constantly.  The Vyzpzz are repelled by smoke and fire.3. STAY CALM: The Vyzpzz are intoxicated by panic and fear.4. ALWAYS WEAR RED: The Vyzpzz can't see the color red.  Wearing red cloaks makes you invisible to them.The survivors believe that they are safely hidden, and have been living in relative safety for years.  But the return of CYBERFROG brings trouble.  Big trouble. CYBERFROG 2: REKT PLANET is the long awaited sequel to CYBERFROG: BLOODHONEY!  It will be 48 pages long, and if we can reach $100,000 in funding, it'll also have the same beautiful chromium cover that BLOODHONEY sported!  We can do it!Art and story by me, Ethan Van Sciver.Colors by Kyle RitterLettering by SOMNIAnd look at that fantastic cover by the legendary JAE LEE!ALL BACKERS OF CYBERFROG 2: REKT PLANET will now receive: 1. Your Chromium variant of REKT PLANET!2. BONUS CYBERFROG: HEARTSICK HORROR comic!3. SALAMANDROID COLOR ZINE classic reprint comic!4. SIX TRADING CARDS!5. TWO GIANT DAZZLING STICKERS!6. CYBERFROG KEYCHAIN!7. CYBERFROG PVC TOY! All thanks to the many backers who built this campaign into the success that it's become!  Now EVERYONE gets all of these bonuses!
Here's a look at the finished SALAMANDROID PVC TOY!  Look how beautiful it is!  You can back it now all by itself, or you can use the ADD ON feature at check out to get one for a discount on shipping!    SALAMANDROID: DEATH'S STINGSalamandroid gets a SPIN OFF book!Everyone seemed to love Sal, and lots of people asked me if he might get his own title.  Well, sure!  This 32 page comic will tell the story of what happened to SALAMANDROID during the Vyzpzz invasion of 1998, and the fate that befell this lovable giant.It ties directly into CYBERFROG: REKT PLANET.  Is it necessary to understand REKT PLANET?  Nnnnnooo.....But will it enhance your reading experience?  Big time!  And if you don't back it here, you'll find yourself looking for it later!  NO SPOILERS, so let's talk about the content.  I've drawn and written it.  It will have a wraparound GLOW IN THE DARK cover!  20 pages of art and story, with a bonus ROGUES GALLERY of pin up art and information about all of their villains!There's a handy option to back both REKT PLANET and DEATH'S STING, and that'll give you the WHOLE STORY! THE PERKS! THE EXECUTIVE HONEYCOMB BOX SET! SOLD OUT!!This is the ULTIMATE way to enjoy CYBERFROG 2: REKT PLANET! It's a sturdy portfolio with a magnetic seal covered with honeycomb material printed on the outside, and beautiful splash art of our heroes inside!  It's a great way to protect and display your CYBERFROG collection on your bookshelf!But that's just the box!  Inside, you'll receive:1. One copy of Jae Lee's REKT PLANET variant cover!2. One copy of SALAMANDROID: DEATH'S STING3. One copy of CYBERFROG: HEARTSICK HORROR, a bonus comic with art by E.J. Morges!4. The EXCLUSIVE gold foil and embossed ULTIMATE BLOODHONEY!  This will only be available with THIS PERK.  I've taken the story content of CYBERFROG BLOODHONEY and added 1998: THE DIARY OF HEATHER SWAIN, reprinted at full size.  80 pages total, this book will be printed on heavy gloss paper, perfect bound with a spine.  The cover will be gold foil, with the sculpted classic "jumping" image of CYBERFROG on it!  Absolutely gorgeous, this edition is truly the jewel of your CYBERFROG collection!  It'll be printed to match the orders of the EXECUTIVE HONEYCOMB BOX SET!5. One Copy of AMPHIBIONIX #2, an ashcan reprinting a story from 1998 in full color!6. One Copy of CYBERFROG: REKT PLANET "OUR HEROES" Chromium variant7. One Copy of CYBERFROG: REKT PLANET "VILLAINOUS SCUM" Chromium variant8. One Copy of CYBERFROG: REKT PLANET "I SPIT ON YOUR HIVE" Exclusive Chromium variant9. One EXCLUSIVE CYBERFROG Wall Calendar10.  One of EVERY ADDITIONAL regular perk and achievement that this campaign sees from here!  You won't miss any of the ashcans, cards, stickers, whatever...it'll all be found in your Executive Honeycomb box!  Consider this a subscription to the campaign!(Note: This doesn't include the 24 hour limited IDES OF MARCH variant. Make sure to grab that while it's available!) ORIGINAL ART! You can purchase a page of original hand drawn art from either CYBERFROG 2: REKT PLANET or SALAMANDROID: DEATH'S STING!  There are 48 pages available for CYBERFROG, and 20 pages available for SALAMANDROID.  If both sell through, pages will be granted randomly to backers!  There are no bad pages...everything rocks!   BE A SURVIVOR!  JOIN THE CAST! Only 5 opportunities are available here!  If you back this tier, you, or someone you love, will be drawn into the book as a cast member!  Not just a background player...you will be name-checked and play a significant role in the story!  I will ask you for photo reference and a little bit about yourself, and you'll either join the cast of survivors in the Pine Barrens...or the cast of survivors in Merchantville.  In either case, you'll interact with other characters and MAYBE just survive to appear in CYBERFROG 3 too! CHIK-N-FRY SHIPPING BOX Order two books or more, and your perks will be shipped in this replica of the take out boxes from the fast food restaurant that Heather Swain used to work at after school, and CyberFrog's favorite place to eat!  CHIK-N-FRY!  Your books will be protected by a foam layer with this delicious looking image of fried chicken, to complete the fun!NOTE: These are shipping containers, and no guarantee that they'll arrive in mint condition!  But they're pretty durable and tough!   STRETCH GOALS! CYBERFROG: BLOODHONEY had some terrific bonuses, and since it was such a successful campaign, we made the most of it!  For CYBERFROG: REKT PLANET, I'd like to start off like this:At $100,000: All versions of CYBERFROG: REKT PLANET will have chromium covers:  MET!  ALL REKT PLANET BOOKS ARE NOW CHROMIUM COVERS! At $150,000: All backers of SALAMANDROID: DEATH'S STING or the HONEYCOMB BOX will receive an AMPHIBIONIX #2 ashcan, colored by Kyle Ritter, free!  MET!!  All backers of SALAMANDROID: DEATH'S STING will receive a copy of AMPHIBIONIX #2 ASHCAN!!
At $200,000: All backers of CYBERFROG REKT PLANET will receive a copy of CYBERFROG: HEARTSICK HORROR, a 32 page comic book with art by EJ MORGES!  MET!  ALL REKT PLANET BACKERS WILL NOW RECEIVE A FREE COPY OF CYBERFROG: NUMB!  
AT $250,000, ALL BACKERS will receive a promo trading card called "FAMILY." MET!  ALL BACKERS WILL RECEIVE THE "FAMILY" TRADING CARD! 
AT $300 ALL BACKERS will receive a promo trading card called "SPITE".  MET!!!  ALL BACKERS WILL RECEIVE THE "SPITE" TRADING CARD! Let's do a CHROMIUM CYBERFROG TRADING CARD once we pass $400K! At $425K, let's do a CHROMIUM SALAMANDROID TRADING CARD! At $450K, let's do a CHROMIUM HEATHER SWAIN TRADING CARD! AT $500K ALL EXECUTIVE HONEYCOMB BOXES will contain a 2021 CYBERFROG WALL CALENDAR with art by CAANAN WHITE, EJ MORGES, JON MALIN, KARL O'NEILL, KELSEY SHANNON and ETHAN VAN SCIVER!       If we meet these goals, I'll add more achievements!  I'd love to do more trading cards, stickers, and posters!TIMELINESS!! This is VERY important.  The first campaign was a struggle.  Finishing the books, getting the printing issues worked out, fulfillment...all caused massive delays that were based on my NOT BEING PREPARED.I've gained a quick education from this experience, and feel like I can get these books finished, printed and in the mail before Christmas of 2020.  But I've set a shipping date of May of 2021 just to be able to exceed expectations this time.I've got my printers lined up, fulfillment plan, and most of all, I'm anxious to do this project.  CYBERFROG has been a dream job for me, and the story is bursting to be told.  I will not be late this time.  That's a promise.  If this book is delayed, it'll be because we were invaded by giant alien wasps.  Outside of my control.  But this frog needs to keep jumping, and I appreciate your continued support!THANK YOU for joining ALL CAPS COMICS on this journey!  Without further ado, here's a non-spoiler look at the comic!

story:
THE GODS FEAR ME: Book One is a 32-page post-invasion scifi/horror epic set hundreds of years after the fall of the human race! This gargantuan tale is brought to you by Mike Murphy (writing) and Kristian Rossi (art). All copies will be signed by Mike Murphy.

They invaded.

We died.

The Ancient Ones brought the human race to near-extinction. Now, the android Kedzie fights to reclaim our world and protect a young boy who might be the key to our salvation.

 

THE GODS FEAR ME (the first of three planned installments) is 32 full-color pages of sci-fi action and horror with Lovecraftian overtones, featuring stunning art by Kristian Rossi (Alterna's Trespasser and Voidwalker)!

 

STRETCH GOALS!

8k- Trading Card by Ethan Van Sciver and 2 Postcards by Karl O'Rowe for ALL physical backers! UNLOCKED!!!

10k- Full color interiors. UNLOCKED!!!

12k- Donal DeLay main cover. UNLOCKED!!!

story:
Life On Cora is a series of short stories set in the world of Cora, following the creatures of all kinds in their daily lives and adventures.

Together with the reader we explore this improbable world in an all-ages, narrative way that is as unique as the world itself as it is approachable.

Cora is a gigantic ball making its way through space, with continents orbiting it like planets around a sun, a single cloud provides the water the creatures require to survive on this world, and somehow life thrives.

 

In Life On Cora #4 - Inner Talents, we follw the Misyus, who live in the deep sea. Their society is a strict one, their inner talent defining their entire person, their friends and contacts, their place in life.

But if you're like Calais and disagree... What then?

 

 

Main cover

 

Purple variant - Nina Daisy Aberlein

 

Black and White - Rich Perotta

 

Internal art

 

 

 

All stretch goal rewards are for physical backers only!

 

Shipping prices:

US: €8

UK: €8

European Union: €8
Netherlands: FREE

Tail-less / Life On Cora collaboration!
 

Very soon Tail-Less by Aria Black will be launching on Indiegogo as well! And we've got something cool for you as a free extra if you back both projects!

When you back both Life On Cora #4 - Inner Talents, and The Adventures Of Tail-Less In Outer Space, you will receive a free print with your Life On Cora package. And a free trading card with your package from Tail-Less!


That's right, double the fun and double the exclusives!

Sign up for the campaign here! Or check it out once it's live!

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-adventures-of-tail-less-in-outer-space/coming_soon/x/23366240

story:
Welcome to ANOTHER CASE for the LITTLEST UMBRELLA, the second comic featuring the brand new adventures of ThatUmbrellaGuy and LittleUmbrellaGirl!

With ANOTHER CASE for the LITTLEST UMBRELLA, we are excited to bring you a 40-page, FULL COLOR all-ages adventure featuring our beloved Detective and his Littlest Sidekick as they endeavor to stop an ANCIENT EVIL threatening to destroy the world. 

For this project, we've added:

1. ANOTHER CASE for the LITTLEST UMBRELLA, featuring a CAMPAIGN EXCLUSIVE COVER by S.K.Bennett! (Cover A)

2. ANOTHER CASE for the LITTLEST UMBRELLA, featuring cover art by LittleUmbrellaGirl (LUG) herself for the FIRST TIME EVER! (Cover B)

3. FROM the Case Files of the Littlest Umbrella , a BRAND NEW ashcan featuring art by SIX AM COMICS! 

4. Case of the Littlest Umbrella, (book 1), with an CAMPAIGN EXCLUSIVE COVER (limited to THIS campaign ONLY)! 

PLUS amazing additions like: ORIGINAL ART PAGES for SALE,

Being featured IN THE BOOK as a prison guard, a villager, the village mayor,

AND MORE!

NEW STRETCH GOAL!: At 140,000, I will be adding the KEUNG LEE poster, absolutely FREE,  (image below)

STRETCH GOALS: At 40,000 we will be adding AN EXCLUSIVE TRADING CARD. 

At 60,000 we will be adding  ANOTHER EXCLUSIVE CARD, to build our set!  That's TWO CARDS added just for backing!

At 80,000 we will be adding a postcard paying homage to SILENT HILL! "In my restless dreams..."

AT 100,000 we will be adding to the project itself. BETTER page stock. BETTER cover stock. UPGRADES all AROUND because YOU deserve THE BEST.

NOTE: IF the campaign's 30 days close at 110,000 or above, we will also be adding a STICKER. 

COVER A by S.K.BENNETT: 

COVER B with LittleUmbrellaGirl's (LUG) ARTWORK! 

The BOOK:

We start with an ESCAPE: 

REVEALING A LOOMING THREAT:

Bringing in our beloved specialists:

And SO MUCH MORE: 

--SKIPPING PAGES to KEEP THE PLOT SECURE (this is page 8)

SKIPPING AGAIN to SECURE THE PLOT (this is page 9)

SKIPPING AGAIN to SECURE THE PLOT (this is page 11)

 FROM the Case Files of the Littlest Umbrella  

Our BRAND NEW ashcan, featuring art by SIX AM COMICS , that follows ThatUmbrellaGuy and LittleUmbrellaGirl in an all-new adventure! 

ART sample from SIX AM COMICS! (not finalized art)

PAGE CREATED by SIX AM COMICS! (NOT from the ashcan)

CASE of the LITTLEST UMBRELLA also RETURNS, with a CAMPAIGN EXCLUSIVE COVER! 

TIMELINESS: 

The date added to the campaign, 05/2021, is NOT the "anticipated by" date. We expect to be done MUCH soon. However, due to recent issues that impacted industry worldwide, we are including this date so to deliver in a timely manner.

story:
Starlight Cats: Merlion Rising

Starlight Cats is an intergalactic action-adventure 48 pages graphic novel that chronicles the exploits of a little girl named Rebecca and the street cat Barnaby. The vicious rat-like aliens known as the Verkins are bent on conquering Earth, and only Rebecca and an elite team of cosmic-powered cats known as the Starlight Cats stand between them and universal infestation.

 

Starlight Cats is a project that Shane Davis and Yanzi Lin have been planning to work on since 2017. Shane brings to this project almost 20 years of experience as a professional comic book penciller and writer on projects such as DC Comic's Superman: Earth One, Batman, New Gods and more. He also co-created almost every member of DC Comic's Red Lanterns, including the world famous fan-favorite cat Dex-Starr the Red Lantern.

 

Update: Lunch Box & Baseball T-Shirts Now Available!

 

Stretch Goals

UNLOCKED! $40,000: The interior pages for the main Graphic Novel will have a heavier, better quality paper stock!
UNLOCKED! $50,000: All Graphic Novels will now be SIGNED by both Shane Davis & Yanzi Lin!
UNLOCKED! $60,000: The interior pages for the Story Ashcan/Making-of Book will now be in FULL COLOR!
UNLOCKED! $70,000: Every backer gets an Exclusive Salty Trading Card. One card per book backer!
UNLOCKED $80,000: More book upgrades - better quality cover stock and all Graphic Novels will now be perfect-bound! Also, every backer gets an Exclusive Catimus Prime Trading Card. One card per book backer!
UNLOCKED! $90,000: Every backer gets an Exclusive Barnaby Trading Card and an Exclusive Rebecca Trading Card. One of each card per book backer!
UNLOCKED! $100,000: Every book backer gets an Exclusive 'Hang in There!' Salty Fold-Out Poster!
$110,000: Every book backer gets an Exclusive 'Project Rex' (our next comic project) Mini Print/Postcard!

The Cast

REBECCA CHOW


Little Singaporean girl Rebecca is on the adventure of her lifetime when her grandmother's heirloom necklace turned out to hold the final Starlight Jewel, and it gets impossibly stuck to her. Now she finds herself to be the newest member of the Starlight Cats, which is led by...

 

BARNABY


Barnaby is the leader of the Starlight Cats. Tasked with locating the final Starlight Jewel, he finds himself on the streets of Singapore and inexplicably drawn to Rebecca. He would soon find himself responsible for Rebecca's well-being as he bring her before...

 

PRINCESS L'AMOUR


Princess L'Amour is a member of the Catz royalty, an alien cat-like species. She finds herself torn between her obligations to her people and the need to save her friends, which includes...

 

SALTY


Salty is an American celebrity cat for the world famous cat treats, Salty Balls™. No one knows how a prima donna like him ended up a member of an intergalactic defense force, except for...

 

JELLYBEAN

Jellybean the kitten is small, but don't let his size fool you. He keeps Salty on his toes (beans), and he may hold the answer to ending the Verkin threat once and for all!

 

The Perks!

The Vol. 1 Cover

48 pages of cats adventure goodness, available as either our VOL 1 cover featuring Rebecca and the Starlight Cats flying in front of Marina Bay Sands, or

 

The LIMITED EDITION Merlion Cover

The limited edition cover featuring the Merlion Cat God and Rebecca. This cover is EXCLUSIVE to this campaign. This is your only chance to get this cover!

 

The LIMITED Merlion Line Art Cover

Limited to only 500 copies! This exclusive line art, B&W version of the Merlion cover is now available, only in our FEATURED TIER. All previous backers for this tier will have this exclusive cover added to your order for no extra charge.

 

Kenneth Rocafort Variant Cover

From DC Comic artist Kenneth Rocafort comes this amazing Starlight Cats: Merlion Rising cover! Available in a 2-pack with the Jon Malin Variant Cover.

 

Jon Malin Variant Cover

Get this awesome Jon Malin Variant Cover for Starlight Cats: Merlion Rising. Also available as a 2-pack with the Kenneth Rocafort variant!

 

COLLECTOR'S EDITION PIN SET OF 4

 

Do you like enamel pins? Then you will love this Collector's Edition Set of 4 Pins featuring all 4 cat members of the Starlight Cats team: Barnaby, Princess L'Amour, Salty and Jellybean.

These are gold-color enamel pins with glitter effect for their Starlight Jewels.

Barnaby and Princess L'Amour measure 1.5 inches tall.

Salty and Jellybean measure 1 inch tall.

This pin set comes on a galaxy-themed backing card with the Starlight Cats logo!

LIMITED TO 500 SETS ONLY!

 

Story Ashcan/Making-Of Book


Want to get more cat content and learn how a comic book comes together? Then you will not want to miss this EXCLUSIVE Story Ashcan/Making of Book! This ashcan includes an EXCLUSIVE Supplemental Story that expands on the lore of the Starlight Cats.

All story pages in this ashcan will be drawn by Shane Davis, so that is an additional 10-20 pages of Shane artwork!

We will be also be including an assortment of page layouts, page progress and even some never-before-seen early developmental art! This book is being produced ONLY for this campaign and will not be reproduced for subsequent campaigns.

 

Metal Lunch Box + 'Then I Met Barnaby' Magnet

Get a Starlight Cats Lunch Box with the 'Then I Met Barnaby' meme on the front! Featuring artwork by Kenneth Rocafort.

Each lunch box also comes with a 4" 'Then I Met Barnaby' magnet.

There is no additional shipping charge if you back a baseball t-shirt as an add-on to this lunch box.

 

Barnaby Baseball T-Shirt + Salty Balls Baseball T-Shirt

Get either the Barnaby Baseball T-Shirt with Kenneth Rocafort artwork, or a Salty Balls Baseball T-Shirt with Shane Davis artwork!

Baseball t-shirts are made of 100% cotton and come in sizes from XS to 3XL.

 

Limited Edition 16oz Merlion Glass Tumbler

We have added 16oz Exclusive Merlion glass tumblers to the campaign! This will most likely be first in the series of Starlight Cats glass tumblers.

Each glass also comes with a 4" holographic Merlion sticker.

Glasses will only ship within USA due to the fragile nature of the item. There is no combined shipping discount  even if you back the glass as an add-on as it ships separately from the books.

 

Character Ink Sketch

Get an Inked Character Sketch from Shane Davis! You can choose which character you want from Starlight Cats: Barnaby, Princess L'Amour, Salty, Jellybean, Rebecca or a Verkin. Your sketch will be done on a 5x7 bristol board in inks that will be shipped to you in pristine condition!

 

Have Your Cat Drawn into Starlight Cats: Merlion Rising!

You have a chance to have your pet cat drawn into Starlight Cats: Merlion Rising as a member of the Elite Palace Guard for the Catz royal family. There are 8 slots available, first-come-first-served.

 

Original Pages


If collecting original art is more your speed, we have a limited number of original inked pages available for purchase! First come first served. Backer #1 for original art will get to choose the page they want first, then Backer #2, etc.

 

Original ONE-OF-A-KIND Covers


Here is your chance to own the original inked covers - available only for this campaign! We will ship the covers worldwide safely with a masonite backing board.

 

The Creative Team

Writers: Shane Davis & Yanzi Lin
Penciller: Shane Davis
Inker: Yanzi Lin
Colorist: Candice Han
Letterer: Eric Weathers
story_txt:
Starlight Cats: Merlion Rising
Starlight Cats is an intergalactic action-adventure 48 pages graphic novel that chronicles the exploits of a little girl named Rebecca and the street cat Barnaby. The vicious rat-like aliens known as the Verkins are bent on conquering Earth, and only Rebecca and an elite team of cosmic-powered cats known as the Starlight Cats stand between them and universal infestation.
 
Starlight Cats is a project that Shane Davis and Yanzi Lin have been planning to work on since 2017. Shane brings to this project almost 20 years of experience as a professional comic book penciller and writer on projects such as DC Comic's Superman: Earth One, Batman, New Gods and more. He also co-created almost every member of DC Comic's Red Lanterns, including the world famous fan-favorite cat Dex-Starr the Red Lantern.
 
Update: Lunch Box & Baseball T-Shirts Now Available!

 
Stretch Goals
UNLOCKED! $40,000: The interior pages for the main Graphic Novel will have a heavier, better quality paper stock!UNLOCKED! $50,000: All Graphic Novels will now be SIGNED by both Shane Davis & Yanzi Lin!UNLOCKED! $60,000: The interior pages for the Story Ashcan/Making-of Book will now be in FULL COLOR!UNLOCKED! $70,000: Every backer gets an Exclusive Salty Trading Card. One card per book backer!UNLOCKED $80,000: More book upgrades - better quality cover stock and all Graphic Novels will now be perfect-bound! Also, every backer gets an Exclusive Catimus Prime Trading Card. One card per book backer!UNLOCKED! $90,000: Every backer gets an Exclusive Barnaby Trading Card and an Exclusive Rebecca Trading Card. One of each card per book backer!UNLOCKED! $100,000: Every book backer gets an Exclusive 'Hang in There!' Salty Fold-Out Poster!$110,000: Every book backer gets an Exclusive 'Project Rex' (our next comic project) Mini Print/Postcard!





The Cast
REBECCA CHOW
Little Singaporean girl Rebecca is on the adventure of her lifetime when her grandmother's heirloom necklace turned out to hold the final Starlight Jewel, and it gets impossibly stuck to her. Now she finds herself to be the newest member of the Starlight Cats, which is led by...
 
BARNABY Barnaby is the leader of the Starlight Cats. Tasked with locating the final Starlight Jewel, he finds himself on the streets of Singapore and inexplicably drawn to Rebecca. He would soon find himself responsible for Rebecca's well-being as he bring her before...
 
PRINCESS L'AMOUR Princess L'Amour is a member of the Catz royalty, an alien cat-like species. She finds herself torn between her obligations to her people and the need to save her friends, which includes...
 
SALTY Salty is an American celebrity cat for the world famous cat treats, Salty Balls™. No one knows how a prima donna like him ended up a member of an intergalactic defense force, except for...
 
JELLYBEAN

Jellybean the kitten is small, but don't let his size fool you. He keeps Salty on his toes (beans), and he may hold the answer to ending the Verkin threat once and for all!
 

The Perks!
The Vol. 1 Cover

48 pages of cats adventure goodness, available as either our VOL 1 cover featuring Rebecca and the Starlight Cats flying in front of Marina Bay Sands, or
 
The LIMITED EDITION Merlion Cover

The limited edition cover featuring the Merlion Cat God and Rebecca. This cover is EXCLUSIVE to this campaign. This is your only chance to get this cover!
 
The LIMITED Merlion Line Art Cover

Limited to only 500 copies! This exclusive line art, B&W version of the Merlion cover is now available, only in our FEATURED TIER. All previous backers for this tier will have this exclusive cover added to your order for no extra charge.
 
Kenneth Rocafort Variant Cover

From DC Comic artist Kenneth Rocafort comes this amazing Starlight Cats: Merlion Rising cover! Available in a 2-pack with the Jon Malin Variant Cover.
 
Jon Malin Variant Cover

Get this awesome Jon Malin Variant Cover for Starlight Cats: Merlion Rising. Also available as a 2-pack with the Kenneth Rocafort variant!
 
COLLECTOR'S EDITION PIN SET OF 4

 
Do you like enamel pins? Then you will love this Collector's Edition Set of 4 Pins featuring all 4 cat members of the Starlight Cats team: Barnaby, Princess L'Amour, Salty and Jellybean.
These are gold-color enamel pins with glitter effect for their Starlight Jewels.
Barnaby and Princess L'Amour measure 1.5 inches tall.
Salty and Jellybean measure 1 inch tall.
This pin set comes on a galaxy-themed backing card with the Starlight Cats logo!
LIMITED TO 500 SETS ONLY!
 
Story Ashcan/Making-Of Book

Want to get more cat content and learn how a comic book comes together? Then you will not want to miss this EXCLUSIVE Story Ashcan/Making of Book! This ashcan includes an EXCLUSIVE Supplemental Story that expands on the lore of the Starlight Cats.
All story pages in this ashcan will be drawn by Shane Davis, so that is an additional 10-20 pages of Shane artwork!
We will be also be including an assortment of page layouts, page progress and even some never-before-seen early developmental art! This book is being produced ONLY for this campaign and will not be reproduced for subsequent campaigns.
 
Metal Lunch Box + 'Then I Met Barnaby' Magnet
Get a Starlight Cats Lunch Box with the 'Then I Met Barnaby' meme on the front! Featuring artwork by Kenneth Rocafort.
Each lunch box also comes with a 4" 'Then I Met Barnaby' magnet.
There is no additional shipping charge if you back a baseball t-shirt as an add-on to this lunch box.
 
Barnaby Baseball T-Shirt + Salty Balls Baseball T-Shirt
Get either the Barnaby Baseball T-Shirt with Kenneth Rocafort artwork, or a Salty Balls Baseball T-Shirt with Shane Davis artwork!
Baseball t-shirts are made of 100% cotton and come in sizes from XS to 3XL.
 
Limited Edition 16oz Merlion Glass Tumbler
We have added 16oz Exclusive Merlion glass tumblers to the campaign! This will most likely be first in the series of Starlight Cats glass tumblers.
Each glass also comes with a 4" holographic Merlion sticker.
Glasses will only ship within USA due to the fragile nature of the item. There is no combined shipping discount  even if you back the glass as an add-on as it ships separately from the books.
 
Character Ink Sketch

Get an Inked Character Sketch from Shane Davis! You can choose which character you want from Starlight Cats: Barnaby, Princess L'Amour, Salty, Jellybean, Rebecca or a Verkin. Your sketch will be done on a 5x7 bristol board in inks that will be shipped to you in pristine condition!
 
Have Your Cat Drawn into Starlight Cats: Merlion Rising!

You have a chance to have your pet cat drawn into Starlight Cats: Merlion Rising as a member of the Elite Palace Guard for the Catz royal family. There are 8 slots available, first-come-first-served.
 
Original Pages

If collecting original art is more your speed, we have a limited number of original inked pages available for purchase! First come first served. Backer #1 for original art will get to choose the page they want first, then Backer #2, etc.
 
Original ONE-OF-A-KIND Covers

Here is your chance to own the original inked covers - available only for this campaign! We will ship the covers worldwide safely with a masonite backing board.
 

The Creative Team
Writers: Shane Davis & Yanzi LinPenciller: Shane DavisInker: Yanzi LinColorist: Candice HanLetterer: Eric Weathers

story:
Overview

From the creators of Englewood, Doc Salem, and Battle Brick Road comes a horror comic like no other. Three Knights, Four Days part one is a 44 page full-color graphic novel set in the year 1188. After returning from the Second Crusade, Three Knights from three different orders of knighthood return to the hometown of their leader to hopefully retire from war. As they arrive at their comrade's home, they find the town besieged by a Satanic cult, and are the only thing that stands between the townspeople and utter annihilation. 

If you're a fan of Berserk, The Thirteenth Warrior, Prince of Darkness, or video games like Baldur's Gate and Doom, this is the comic for you!

 

A Comic Book All-Star Team!

The creative team behind this comic is unmatched when it comes to raw talent. Micah Curtis, creator and writer of Englewood takes the helm of the project. The grim visuals are brought to life by the art of Preston Acevedo of Rockabilly Roadtrip, and Doc Salem, with the gruesome pages colored by Oliver Lee Arce. The thoughts and words of these complex characters are brought to life by the wonderful lettering of Eric Weathers, creator of Flying Fortress.   

Other Features!

  • Companion Art Book!

    • Aside from the comic itself, we're also offering a manga-sized "Art of Three Knights, Four Days" art book that shows the sketch work and creative process of the comic! This is a must-own for any comic collector, and will only be sold as part of this campaign!
    • A limited number of art books will also come with a special Three Knights, Four Days sketch from Preston! Don't miss out, those will be going fast! 

  • Be in the book!

    • Have you ever wanted to be a cultist who pillages villages in England while laughing and hailing Satan? How about just getting diced to pieces by a twelfth century knight? If so, our "Be a Cultist" tier is right up your alley! Includes both the comic and the art book as well!

  • Snag some original art!

    • It goes without saying that Preston Acevedo is a one of a kind comic talent! Snag some of the original pages of the comic! The tier also includes the book and art book as well!

  • Grab a Poster!

    • "Battle Prayer" is available as an add-on for the campaign! A 20 by 16 Poster perfect for framing! Art is done by the super talented Kris Love, who also did the poster tier for Englewood! Once you select your perk, the poster will appear to add-on to your purchase in the check-out screen.

  • Check out the Alt Cover!

    • In tribute to the horror classic Prince of Darkness, Vinnie Tartamella (Through the Woods, City of Venus) put together an alternate cover as our first stretch goal! Available now!

 

Stretch Goals!

20K - Alt cover unlocked! Vinnie Tartamella (Through the Woods, City of Venus) will be doing an alternate cover for us that pays homage to John Carpenter's Prince of Darkness!

30k - Each backer gets three buttons, each one with the trademark helms of each of the titular Knights! Will look great on backpacks and jackets!

35k - Stickers unlocked! Every backer will get a free sticker featuring the heroes of the story!

40k - Trading Cards and Pay Bonus for Everyone! Readers get a trading card of the military commander Lord Fergus and the mysterious Midnight Witch! Everyone attached to the project will get a bonus for reaching this goal!

50k - Sign Everything! Micah Curtis and Preston Acevedo will head to our fulfillment location to sign every book before it goes out!

story:
Reserve your copy today of the expanded deluxe edition of my zine YOU DON'T KNOW DITKO!

Originally published in 2017 as a 24 page mini zine, this newly revised edition features 48 pages, and now printed at comic book size (6.625" x 10.25"). This primer on Steve Ditko went through 3 printings, plus a special commemorative edition to coincide with the current Bottleworks Hometown Heroes Steve Ditko exhibit currently happening in Johnstown, PA.

Featuring the original content of the mini zine, this new hefty printing contains all new articles dedicated to the work and career of Steve Ditko.


 



Among the new features are:

  • Interviews with Lenny Schwartz, the writer & director of the stage play DITKO and actor Derek Laurendeau, who played Ditko in the earliest performances of the play!
  • An interview with veteran comic book artist Steven Butler (SPIDER-MAN, SONIC THE HEDGEHOG), co-creator of the Ditko homage character MR. MIXIT!
  • A photo feature on the 2018 Steve Ditko memorial art show held on November 2 at Nostalgic Books and Comics (Southern California)!
  • My personal memorial tribute to Steve Ditko!

    Carry over content from the original zine includes a Ditko cover art gallery through the decades, an analysis of Ditko's considerable skills in character design, a Ditko timeline, various pieces of fan art I've done over the years and more!

         Color covers, interior pages printed in b&w and gray tones, 48 pages.

 

 

How does Indiegogo work?

I have a funding goal of $500, but really that's just the pre-set minimum amount Indiegogo let's you start at. This new zine will be printed regardless if we reach $500 total pledges. This isn't like Kickstarter in that if we don't reach the goal the campaign doesn't happen.

So if you pledge to any of the perks here you will definitely be getting that one, no worries.

 

As to who I am...

I'm a cartoonist and self-publisher, with 23 years experience in creating and producing numerous comic books and graphic novels. My signature comic book character El Muerto debuted in 1998 and in 2007 was adapted into a live action film starring Wilmer Valderrama. I also work as an educator, teaching comic book workshops at schools and libraries. I also lecture at museums and universities, sharing the story of my creative journey and also on the contributions of Latino creators in the American comic book market.

And of course I'm also a lifelong Steve Ditko fan, having first seen his work through Marvel Tales as well as the Marvel Pocket Books from the late 1970s. This zine is my love letter to the amazing comics and inspiring career of the man from Johnstown, PA, and I hope you can join in with support by pre-ordering the new book.

  • This is my first Indiegogo campaign but I did run my first Kickstarter campaign in 2020 for some new El Muerto comics, which raised over $5,000.
  • I chose Indiegogo this time around because it has a much faster approval process and I wanted to get this book printed and in your hands as soon as possible, plus it's set to debut on September 11 at the Ditko Con during the last day of the  Bottle Works Steve Ditko exhibit.

 

Any pitfalls?

The one thing hovering over all of us is the unpredictability of Covid-19. Mail service or my printing partners could be affected, but as of right now everything seems to be running as usual. The zine is just about done, with only a few more days work on it. Those of you who follow me on social networks know I'm constantly active on there so I'll keep everyone updated there as well as through the Indiegogo channel. Remember this is a quick two week campaign so things will move fairly quickly!
 

Please feel free to share the link for the campaign even if you don't purchase a copy of the zine. Spreading the word online helps, and it's greatly appreciated!

story:
About this wonderful project!

We are Jeremy Frazier and Dave Mansfield from Creamy Rat Studios. We have released several band/charity comics, been published in 2 magazines and released a comic for a low budget slasher film. Dave also fronts the "legendary" band Society Burning.

Now we are entering the minor leagues! Our first movie comic from a known director...Albert Pyun. The film Mean Guns has always been a favorite. Dare I say top 5 in my all time favorite movies! Now I have a chance to continue the story. We even managed to get support from Pyun and Thom Mathews...Crow himself!

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

What do we need? How about $1500. That covers printing, shipping and perks. Most importantly we need your belief that this comic will kick ass!

The comic is complete. It will ship on time. No delays from Creamy Rat Studios!

Besides the comic...you want perks! We have Pyun and Mathews autograph cards! Shirts! Want to be in the comic? We can make that happen!!! Plus hidden perks...

If we fall short of our reasonable goal? Smaller print runs! We will not be stopped!

 

 

 

The Impact

Mean Guns is the second project on Indiegogo from Creamy Rat Studios. Our first Synthcore Dreams was a success. Covered all books, perks and the artists. Any and all help is greatly appreciated!

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

The only challenge we have at this point is the possibility of under funding. To fight this we can scale back print runs. Half the perks have already been covered out of pocket. Keep the risk low and don't ask for money without a complete book!

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Share! Share! Share! On social media! In emails! Yell it from the rooftops!

 

 

 

THE TEAM!

Jeremy Frazier, Dave Mansfield, Ozzy Longoria, JD Santibanez, Zoran Jankovic, Stefan Mrkonjic

Jason Hehir, Bart Buytaert and Francisco Zamora

story:
We are 100% funded now thank you all for the your support !!!

 

 

 

 

Fireshine is like x-men meets the Matrix. Its fantasy and fast-paced action like you've never seen before. Uncover family secrets Genetic abominations and interdimensional reptilians. The Dracon is the rulers of the world below the realm of fire and they want what belongs to them, the twins Sasuke and Sasamei are the keys to open up dimensional portals to enter heaven to start a war to control all creation!  I don't want to spoil it so don't miss this epic action-adventure, For just $12 you can find out what happens so back Fireshine today!!!

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need this money to print the books, the art prints, and the shirts. I am asking for $500 just for starters so I can get funding for a small print run. If so I will be adding more perks and stretch goals to the campaign.  Also, don't worry I have done the artwork for the story already. I am just adding colors, lettering, sound effects, and some art edits.                                   

Other Ways You Can Help

You can help by getting the word out and making some noise about my campaign to your friends or family that like comics/mangas, cool artwork, or just a good story. So make sure to use the Indiegogo share tools!    

                                                        Thanks a lot, folks I deeply appreciate it!

story:
'LADY SATAN: AN ANGEL IN A KILLERS DRESS' is a dark tale of revenge that takes elements of both the horror and thriller genre and blends them with a noir aesthetic and a character driven story that will take you through a personal journey of darkness and vengeance.

 

Check out some of the pages from the book below

 

    After surviving being in a snuff film, Lucille Fourrure (A.K.A. Lady Satan), a stripper turned vigilante from France finds herself on British soil. She has traveled from town to town taking down criminals in the hopes that she will one day find the man responsible for her past ordeal. An ordeal that left her with P.T.S.D. (Post Traumatic Stress Disorder) and P.G.A.D. (Persistent Genital Arousal Disorder) as well as an appetite for revenge.
     But when Lady Satan finds the location of the man responsible for her traumatic past, she discovers that he is a high ranking police officer named Chief Inspector Bennett who is under investigation by internal affairs. Feeling incapable of bringing him down, Lady Satan is reluctant to exact her revenge upon him. Until she finds evidence that links Chief Inspector Bennett to several unforgivable crimes.
     Now Lady Satan must battle her anxiety, doubts, crippling P.T.S.D. and her debilitating P.G.A.D. in order to exact her revenge upon Chief Inspector Bennett!

We have a few different perks to choose from, including an IndieGoGo Exclusive A3 poster, T-Shirt, prints & Stretch Goal items. You can add-on perks before check out including prints and posters and each perk includes you being credited in the book!

Lucifer Storm is an award-winning Author & Graphic Novelist from Bournemouth, South Of England. With an extreme imagination and a huge passion for storytelling, Lucifer has crafted a large stable of characters and stories that have entertained readers across the globe. Lucifer is a proud geek, horror fan, movie lover, musician, animal lover and a passionate supporter of free speech who doesn't show signs of slowing down any time soon.

 

Editorial duties for LADY SATAN are in the capable and very talented hands of John Wakefield who is doing a great job in bringing out the unique personality if this book. And on top of that, the book will contain a foreword written by Robert Geronimo (Writer & Artist of BLOOD REALM from Alterna Comics).

"Art Should Comfort the Disturbed and Disturb the Comfortable" - Cesar A. Cruz.

 

"LADY SATAN: AN ANGEL IN A KILLERS DRESS" is a title that is for mature audiences ONLY!"

The book is an outlaw graphic novel in the vein of such titles as The Crow, Sin City, Preacher, Scars and many others. The story is not shy in taking on sensitive subject matter and it doesn't pull any punches while doing so.

Inspiration for the story has come from multiple sources and has been motivated by the passion for no holds barred story telling.

Below are some samples of Lucifer's art

 

The goal is simple. To give you, the reader, the best story we can. A story that treats you with respect and doesn't talk down to the reader nor patronize the reader in the process. Sometimes art needs to be daring and dangerous. As the old saying goes: Art should disturb the comforted and comfort the disturbed...And we believe that we have done that with this book and we look forward to continuing to do that with future books and characters.

There are always risks. But where there is no risk there is no reward.


No-one is perfect and this is our first crowdfunding campaign! Experience should allow us to spot the snags in advance...However...The unforeseens are just that... unforeseen.

To balance that and inspire your full confidence, the team are determined to make the production of this book as transparent as possible and print is already scheduled in for Mid-June 2021. This means books could be delivered as soon as Early-July. However, international postage will most likely roll that into August 2021. So our delivery date on all the tiers reflects that.

What we can commit to is that all of the team have track records of the highest standards of professionalism and delivery and that Lucifer, as the team leader, is ALWAYS available to contact and discuss aspects of the book's production .

You will be able to see regular updates on production of the book by visiting Lucifer's YouTube channel (Lucifer Storm) where he has live-streams and video content related to writing comics and graphic novels. You can also find him on the usual online haunts of Facebook & Instagram. Or if you prefer, you can visit Lucifer's website (www.luciferstorm.com) and utilize the contact form in the about section.

click here to go to Lucifer's YouTube channel

Refunds will be honoured during the initial campaign and 2 weeks after the backer's initial backing during the Indemand phase. After that, all sales are considered final. 


 

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • If you know anyone who would be interested in this book then tell them how they can find the campaign!
  • You can share this campaign on your social media platforms and let everyone you know about LADY SATAN
  • You can also sign up to the newsletter at the official LADY SATAN website by going to www.lady-satan.com
story_txt:
'LADY SATAN: AN ANGEL IN A KILLERS DRESS' is a dark tale of revenge that takes elements of both the horror and thriller genre and blends them with a noir aesthetic and a character driven story that will take you through a personal journey of darkness and vengeance.

 
Check out some of the pages from the book below






 
    After surviving being in a snuff film, Lucille Fourrure (A.K.A. Lady Satan), a stripper turned vigilante from France finds herself on British soil. She has traveled from town to town taking down criminals in the hopes that she will one day find the man responsible for her past ordeal. An ordeal that left her with P.T.S.D. (Post Traumatic Stress Disorder) and P.G.A.D. (Persistent Genital Arousal Disorder) as well as an appetite for revenge.     But when Lady Satan finds the location of the man responsible for her traumatic past, she discovers that he is a high ranking police officer named Chief Inspector Bennett who is under investigation by internal affairs. Feeling incapable of bringing him down, Lady Satan is reluctant to exact her revenge upon him. Until she finds evidence that links Chief Inspector Bennett to several unforgivable crimes.     Now Lady Satan must battle her anxiety, doubts, crippling P.T.S.D. and her debilitating P.G.A.D. in order to exact her revenge upon Chief Inspector Bennett!

We have a few different perks to choose from, including an IndieGoGo Exclusive A3 poster, T-Shirt, prints & Stretch Goal items. You can add-on perks before check out including prints and posters and each perk includes you being credited in the book!










Lucifer Storm is an award-winning Author & Graphic Novelist from Bournemouth, South Of England. With an extreme imagination and a huge passion for storytelling, Lucifer has crafted a large stable of characters and stories that have entertained readers across the globe. story:
Short Summary

Miu, aka Michael Vega, has been producing cute and sexy adult art of his Peaches and Cream gals since 2001. Club Stripes/Hot Cider Press is planning a big reprint of Miu's two volumes of Peaches and Cream: Super Delicious, and we want your help to do it!

Super Delicious Volume 1 (18+ adults only) focuses mainly on Peaches and Cream themselves, from the very first pics of them back in 2001 to their current selves, plus some featured guest art and a rare comic guest appearance! Comic book sized (6.625" x 10.25") and 96 pages!

Super Delicious Volume 2 (18+ adults only) looks at the supporting characters in the P&C universe. Jam, Blueberry, Milk, Cookies and more are in this volume! Also comic book sized (6.625" x 10.25") and 96 pages!

We're also launching a new (not adult, but probably best for older teens 16+) book, Ask Jam, which collects the fanmail-based comics of Jam and her trusty (and somewhat omniscient?) webcam. This book is a bit smaller than the others, at approximately A5 dimensions (5.83 x 8.27 inches).

As an Indiegogo exclusive, Miu is bundling all his digital wallpaper downloads into one mega-pack! For $10 you can get the complete set and help us with our goals!

We will also be releasing a limited edition 8GB USB Ask Jam flash drive, decorated with fun character cosplay art by Miu! The flash drive will come preloaded with a screen-resolution PDF version of the Ask Jam book, plus the complete wallpaper megapack.

Final appearance may vary.

No more will be produced after this Indiegogo fundraiser ends, so make sure to pledge now!

Please note that this project contains some items with adult-oriented content and you must be 18+ years of age to receive pledge materials marked as Adults Only. Club Stripes/Hot Cider Press and Miu cannot be responsible for the local laws in your area.

What We Need & What You Get

Our funding breaks down like this:

Base goal - Yay! We can print books and make the USB drives for all Indiegogo supporters who want some. We will also have enough books to sell a few at Anthrocon for those who didn't get to participate here. The base goal covers printing books to cover the backers plus a few extra copies for sale at conventions, USB drive making, shipping costs of the books/merch to us, and buying postage and packaging.

Stretch Goals!

$5000 FUNDED! - All people who pledge $20 and up receive a free PDF download of Super Delicious vol. 1!

$5500 FUNDED! - All people who pledge $20 and up ALSO receive a free PDF download of Super Delicious vol. 2!

$6000 FUNDED! - All people who pledge $20 and up ALSO receive a free PDF download of Ask Jam! Flash drive size will also be increased to 16GB! All tiers marked "Early Bird" will receive an additional bonus item (choice of convention-exclusive poster or button set) as thanks for helping us out early in the campaign. 

$8000 FUNDED! - All pledges $20 and up receive a free mini digital portfolio, "Jam's Talent Show" (ADULTS ONLY)! All brand-new material, "Jam's Talent Show" will also be available for a limited time as a digital purchase in the add-ons section of the survey sent out after the campaign closes, if you're not in the $20 and up tiers.

$9000 FUNDED! - Bonus short comic added to the "Jam's Talent Show" digital folio! With special guest star...!

$10,000 FUNDED! - All tiers $30 and up will receive a print version of "Jam's Talent Show" OR Ask Jam, FREE! ("Jam's Talent Show" will also be available for a limited time as a digital/physical purchase in the add-ons section of the survey sent out after the campaign closes, if you're not in the $30 and up tiers.)

$15,000 FUNDED!!! - Upgraded print quality for Ask Jam book + small bonus item for all tiers $30 and up! (secret!) FINAL STRETCH GOAL! Any money pledged past this goal will be saved to upgrade print quality for other books.

Risks & Challenges

We at Club Stripes/Hot Cider Press have been producing books and digital content for the furry/anthro community for more than ten years. While we try to accommodate as much of our production risks as possible, we acknowledge there is always a slight risk of problems in production, and keep backup companies in mind for production assistance in the unlikely event of a problem in manufacturing. The biggest risk is that the books cannot arrive in time for the convention, but our current printer is highly reliable and as long as our files are turned in by the time specified, they have been reliably early, rather than late. :)

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you don't participate in our Indiegogo campaign, we appreciate you spreading the word! Let's get these books made!

story:
Dojo Kun Comics has been publishing comic books for over 4 years now and we've released 12 comics (dojokuncomics.wixsite.com/dojokuncomics). This super-hero trade paperback is the compilation of Dojo Kun Comics' four-issue mini-series, Siamese, which were the first comics we released in our connected super-hero universe.

This is a completed book! Fulfillment will only be waiting for the swag to be produced!  We will make sure to bring something special to our backers and load this TPB will extras, including new covers, behind-the-scenes sketches and concept work and over 100 pages.

Digital Copy of the Siamese TPB - Regular Cover     $15

Digital copy of the The Siamese Trade Paperback – collecting Siamese #01 through #04, with additional behind-the-scenes original character concept art and an art gallery

 

 

Siamese Trade Paperback – Reg Cover    $35 - SOLD OUT - THANK YOU!

The Siamese Trade Paperback – collecting Siamese #01 through #04, with additional behind-the-scenes original character concept art and an art gallery.

 

Siamese TPB – Ariez Hernandez Variant Cover   $35 - SOLD OUT - THANK YOU!

Siamese TPB – Isiah Xavier Bradley Variant Cover   $35 - SOLD OUT - THANK YOU!

Siamese TPB – Bruno Hatano Variant Cover  $35 - SOLD OUT - THANK YOU!

Siamese TPB - Interior Artist Zilson Costa Variant $35 - SOLD OUT - THANK YOU!

 

                        No Longer Available

Set of four 6x9 mini prints of the original covers – $5,000

 

Set of six 6x9 mini prints of the TPB Regular and Variant covers – $6,000

 

Siamese Challenge Coin – $7,000

 

"Meanwhile ..." AshCan - $7,500 

8-page Ashcan with Three New Super-Villains, Two New Super-Heroes and a super with direct ties to Siamese, and a cover by José Garcia!

 

Risks & Challenges

The current environment may lead to some delays in printing and shipping, but the fulfillment of this campaign should be reasonably quick. Much of the work is done already, so there's little to organize and arrange to get this trade paperback and the perks out to our backers.
