story:
The Imperium

A love letter to the classic British telefantasy of the 1960s.

Created by Tzvi Lebetkin and Dominic Racho - The Imperium takes iconic characters and deconstructed them to their roots, reassembles them in, and then dumps them all into a super group with a stonking, mind bending action and archaic adventure.

Biblical: Bible Stories For Atheists, Creationists, Rationalists and Rogues

An incredible epic tale spanning centuries, and fiercely Biblically accurate but with no preaching or polemics agenda - Just a great story well told!!!

This brand new edition, with a revised and rewritten ending harkens from the great tradition of Vertigo comics - in this hard edged tale encompassing the Dove and the Raven from Noah's ark, King Nimrod and the Tower of Babel, and the book of Jonah - tied into one seamless narrative.

Nobel Savages

The lovely Leela with Raquel Welch as Loana from One Million Years B.C.!!!! In the background is the Time Machine, and in the foreground is K-9.

Why are they all together???

WHO GIVES A SHIT!!!!!!  It's FREAKING AWESOME!!!!!!!!!!!  That's all you really need to know.

This wonderful piece of artwork by Dominic Racho is currently a pinup that's now included in most packages. But when we hit $8000 we're supersizing it to an A2 sized (16.5" x 23.4" or 18" x 24" in the US) poster!!

For the Male Gaze Art Cards

A series of (at least) 5 cards celebrating the much maligned ‘male gaze’. Five stunningly rendered, highly tasteful, art cards by Imperium artist, Dominic Racho, based on my genre related 12 year old masturbatary fantasies.  And may I say, I had (and still have) FANTASTIC taste!!!!

So far we have 5 fantasy fillies to choose from for your delight and edification:

 

(click on the images to enlarge them)

1) No Hanky Panky in the Tardis

Poor old Nicola Bryant.  A stunning and awfully healthy young lady cast to be Doctor Who’s companion in the early 80’s.  Neither her, nor I considered for a second that her costume with consist of being squeezed into a think layer of low cut Spandex, with short shorts and heels.

She said of the costume it was a gay man’s idea of sexy (and the gay man in question was the then producer of Doctor Who, the infamous and incorrigible John Nathan Turner).  Well, a gay man, and as it turns out a 12 year old boy - thus Nicola became forever entombed (in the same manner as Zod and how cohorts were entombed in the Superman movie version of the phantom zone) in this rabbi’s spank bank!

2) Keeping the British End Up!!!

The closing line from the pinnacle of James Bond movies - The Spy Who Loved Me, as an ageing Roger Moore creaked over the ravishing form of Barbara Bach in a luxury sea escape vessel, strangely shaped like a giant Hersey’s Kiss. 

Upon seeing this scene General Golgo and M were most taken aback!!! ‘Triple-X’ exclaimed Golgol (that being her spy code name)!!! “Bond, what are you doing cried M”

His answer was simple and perfect!

‘Keeping the British End Up!!!!’

Ba-dadadadadada!!!!! NOBODY DOES IT BETTER!!!! MAKES ME FEEL SAD FOR THE REST!!!

 

(click on the images to enlarge them)

3) Don’t Even THINK It, Citizen!!!

No collection of the rabbi’s formative sexual psyche would be complete without the breath taking form of Judge Anderson.

A Psi-Judge from the world of Judge Dredd, original drawn by the great Brian Bolland and based on Debbie Harry, has sent many a quiver down my spine, and led to the self destructive paper of 2000AD circa 1984 to become hopelessly stuck together!!!

4) Party like it’s 1999

So, with this one I had the great idea to appeal to a broader selection of libidos, and sent for Sandra Benes as played by Zienia Merton in gerry Anderson’s classic Space:1999.

Stunningly beautiful woman that Zienia is, she’s normally just not my type at all. Thankfully for me however, Dominic and I have VERY similar luscious interests, and he ended up drawing her in a form, somewhat more appealing than in real life.

Pahhh - real life!!! We all know it’s over rated anyway!!!

 5)

5) I’m Sensing Strong Emotions, Captain!

Coming soon, the beautiful Betazoid that is Deanna Troy, as portrayed by Marina Sirtis has set hearts (and trousers) all of a quiver, from her native Hackney to Talos IV.

In fact, if I’m ever captured by the Talosians (and the REAL ones, who were played by women, not the creepy fake trek ones from Discovery) - forget Susan George as a tool to lull me into submission.  Just bang me up with the good ship’s counsellor and I’ll tell you whatever you want to know!!! 

6) The Force is Female

Just because I LOVE you guys so much - this series COULD NOT be complete without bthis very special card.  We've all thought about it, and I just had to deliver it for you.

Enjoy!

NEW A2 Art Prints

This series of prints is A2 sized (16.5" x 23.4" or 18" x 24" in the US).

So, I asked Dominic to do a sketch for the sketch card level - but he misunderstood and ended up doing a full drawing, which I just fell in love with - so thought I'd add it as a new add on perk. 

1) A Bohemian in Time and Space

I was SO happy with that, I told the chat on a live stream that if we get just ONE MORE backer, during that stream, we'd commission ANOTHER print.  We got another backer, and so here's poster #2!!!

2) The Eyes Have It

3) Reverse the Polarity of the Neutron Flow 

Hand Drawn Sketch Cards

We wanted to make sure you had something affordable that would include a personalised piece of original artwork, and so we’re proud to announce the SKETCH CARD level!!!

This includes both graphic novels, art cards and a personalised sketch by Dominic.  These sketches can be of whatever you like, but to give you the best quality we’re going to be making a series of 10 suggested sketches for you to choose from - if you go for one of these options you just have a clear idea of what you’re getting!

Hand Drawn Artcards

Own a beautiful, unique piece of stunning bespoke artwork. (click on the images to enlarge them , and you want to because they're FREAKING AWESOME!!!!!)

Hand drawn art cards made of whatever you want by Imperium artist Dominic Racho.  They can be colour, they can be black and white, they can be of your favourite Doctor Who, Star Wars, Star Trek, Comic Book, Lord of the Rings, The Expanse or ANY character you want.

And if you want to kick up up to a whole other level, get a 3D artcard, with lights and electronics built in!!!

Original Imperium Artwork

Dominic just did a FANTASTIC job on the Imperium, and honestly, one of the main reasons I want to get to the $20,000 stretch goal is so we can see some more.  But the artwork is just SO much better in real life than printed on the page, where you can see and appreciate every masterful stroke of the pencil.

The four below pages are classed as Deluxe.

Artwork is sold on a first come, first serve basis.

Click here to view the Imperium art gallery.
story_txt: The ImperiumA love letter to the classic British telefantasy of the 1960s.Created by Tzvi Lebetkin and Dominic Racho - The Imperium takes iconic characters and deconstructed them to their roots, reassembles them in, and then dumps them all into a super group with a stonking, mind bending action and archaic adventure.Biblical: Bible Stories For Atheists, Creationists, Rationalists and RoguesAn incredible epic tale spanning centuries, and fiercely Biblically accurate but with no preaching or polemics agenda - Just a great story well told!!!This brand new edition, with a revised and rewritten ending harkens from the great tradition of Vertigo comics - in this hard edged tale encompassing the Dove and the Raven from Noah's ark, King Nimrod and the Tower of Babel, and the book of Jonah - tied into one seamless narrative.Nobel SavagesThe lovely Leela with Raquel Welch as Loana from One Million Years B.C.!!!! In the background is the Time Machine, and in the foreground is K-9.Why are they all together???WHO GIVES A SHIT!!!!!!  It's FREAKING AWESOME!!!!!!!!!!!  That's all you really need to know.This wonderful piece of artwork by Dominic Racho is currently a pinup that's now included in most packages. But when we hit $8000 we're supersizing it to an A2 sized (16.5" x 23.4" or 18" x 24" in the US) poster!!For the Male Gaze Art CardsA series of (at least) 5 cards celebrating the much maligned ‘male gaze’. Five stunningly rendered, highly tasteful, art cards by Imperium artist, Dominic Racho, based on my genre related 12 year old masturbatary fantasies.  And may I say, I had (and still have) FANTASTIC taste!!!!So far we have 5 fantasy fillies to choose from for your delight and edification: (click on the images to enlarge them)1) No Hanky Panky in the TardisPoor old Nicola Bryant.  A stunning and awfully healthy young lady cast to be Doctor Who’s companion in the early 80’s.  Neither her, nor I considered for a second that her costume with consist of being squeezed into a think layer of low cut Spandex, with short shorts and heels.She said of the costume it was a gay man’s idea of sexy (and the gay man in question was the then producer of Doctor Who, the infamous and incorrigible John Nathan Turner).  Well, a gay man, and as it turns out a 12 year old boy - thus Nicola became forever entombed (in the same manner as Zod and how cohorts were entombed in the Superman movie version of the phantom zone) in this rabbi’s spank bank!2) Keeping the British End Up!!!The closing line from the pinnacle of James Bond movies - The Spy Who Loved Me, as an ageing Roger Moore creaked over the ravishing form of Barbara Bach in a luxury sea escape vessel, strangely shaped like a giant Hersey’s Kiss. Upon seeing this scene General Golgo and M were most taken aback!!! ‘Triple-X’ exclaimed Golgol (that being her spy code name)!!! “Bond, what are you doing cried M”His answer was simple and perfect!‘Keeping the British End Up!!!!’Ba-dadadadadada!!!!! NOBODY DOES IT BETTER!!!! MAKES ME FEEL SAD FOR THE REST!!! (click on the images to enlarge them)3) Don’t Even THINK It, Citizen!!!No collection of the rabbi’s formative sexual psyche would be complete without the breath taking form of Judge Anderson.A Psi-Judge from the world of Judge Dredd, original drawn by the great Brian Bolland and based on Debbie Harry, has sent many a quiver down my spine, and led to the self destructive paper of 2000AD circa 1984 to become hopelessly stuck together!!!4) Party like it’s 1999So, with this one I had the great idea to appeal to a broader selection of libidos, and sent for Sandra Benes as played by Zienia Merton in gerry Anderson’s classic Space:1999.Stunningly beautiful woman that Zienia is, she’s normally just not my type at all. Thankfully for me however, Dominic and I have VERY similar luscious interests, and he ended up drawing her in a form, somewhat more appealing than in real life.Pahhh - real life!!! We all know it’s over rated anyway!!! 5) 5) I’m Sensing Strong Emotions, Captain!Coming soon, the beautiful Betazoid that is Deanna Troy, as portrayed by Marina Sirtis has set hearts (and trousers) all of a quiver, from her native Hackney to Talos IV.In fact, if I’m ever captured by the Talosians (and the REAL ones, who were played by women, not the creepy fake trek ones from Discovery) - forget Susan George as a tool to lull me into submission.  Just bang me up with the good ship’s counsellor and I’ll tell you whatever you want to know!!! 6) The Force is FemaleJust because I LOVE you guys so much - this series COULD NOT be complete without bthis very special card.  We've all thought about it, and I just had to deliver it for you.Enjoy!NEW A2 Art PrintsThis series of prints is A2 sized (16.5" x 23.4" or 18" x 24" in the US).So, I asked Dominic to do a sketch for the sketch card level - but he misunderstood and ended up doing a full drawing, which I just fell in love with - so thought I'd add it as a new add on perk. 1) A Bohemian in Time and SpaceI was SO happy with that, I told the chat on a live stream that if we get just ONE MORE backer, during that stream, we'd commission ANOTHER print.  We got another backer, and so here's poster #2!!!2) The Eyes Have It3) Reverse the Polarity of the Neutron Flow Hand Drawn Sketch CardsWe wanted to make sure you had something affordable that would include a personalised piece of original artwork, and so we’re proud to announce the SKETCH CARD level!!!This includes both graphic novels, art cards and a personalised sketch by Dominic.  These sketches can be of whatever you like, but to give you the best quality we’re going to be making a series of 10 suggested sketches for you to choose from - if you go for one of these options you just have a clear idea of what you’re getting!Hand Drawn ArtcardsOwn a beautiful, unique piece of stunning bespoke artwork. (click on the images to enlarge them , and you want to because they're FREAKING AWESOME!!!!!)Hand drawn art cards made of whatever you want by Imperium artist Dominic Racho.  They can be colour, they can be black and white, they can be of your favourite Doctor Who, Star Wars, Star Trek, Comic Book, Lord of the Rings, The Expanse or ANY character you want.And if you want to kick up up to a whole other level, get a 3D artcard, with lights and electronics built in!!!Original Imperium ArtworkDominic just did a FANTASTIC job on the Imperium, and honestly, one of the main reasons I want to get to the $20,000 stretch goal is so we can see some more.  But the artwork is just SO much better in real life than printed on the page, where you can see and appreciate every masterful stroke of the pencil.The four below pages are classed as Deluxe.Artwork is sold on a first come, first serve basis.Click here to view the Imperium art gallery.

story:
1st TIME OFFERED ON INDIEGOGO!

 

The ASTRAL THRILL3GY is a set of 3 epic sci-fi/action-adventure graphic novels in the Astral Universe!  The highly-acclaimed series has found great success on other crowd-funding platforms— and, now, creator/writer/producer Jay Magnum is bringing the award-winning trilogy to the fabulous community at INDIEGOGO!  What's it about?  Read below!

 

 

What's the story?

These beautiful, high-quality books spin the yarn of Earth's desperate struggle to stand against the evil world-destroying Astrals!  The stories feature an eclectic mix of rich and compelling characters in an extensively detailed world— who are forced to cooperate with each other in order to survive— told through vibrant professional art that's truly dazzling!

With flair, panache, fineness of texture and excruciating attention to detail— each panel for every story beat is presented with polished, crisp, fresh lines and vivid colors— combining for exceptionally-breathtaking imagery!

You'll be wonderfully satisfied with the packaging, production, and— most importantly— the execution of the story.  From start-to-finish, this is a fun, exciting, and captivating epic!

 

 

WOW!   333 PAGES!!!

...and 50 more total "bonus pages" in the back of the books combine for OVER 380 PAGES!

Missed out on the previous campaigns on the other platforms?  No problem!  You can get "up-to-speed" quickly on the entire "Astral" adventure with the ASTRAL THRILL3GY— and the best part is that you won't have to wait long: The books are expected to ship out to you within a few months of the campaign's end, making this campaign, essentially, a pre-order!

 

 

The ASTRAL THRILL3GY is available in softcover, hardcover, or even in special limited-edition variant covers (scroll down below to see all of the variant-cover design options)!

 

SEE FOR YOURSELF  HOW IT ALL STARTED IN "ASTRAL GENESIS"!

Click on the blue button below to read a FREE PREVIEW of Astral Genesis!

OR — Click on the GREEN BUTTON to DOWNLOAD THE FULL GRAPHIC NOVEL!

 

In the near future...

Disgraced ex-astronaut, Jonathan DeVane, must assemble a rag-tag team of misfits in an attempt to stop a devastating attack on Earth by malevolent alien raiders called “Astrals”.

Can DeVane and his pack of underdogs find salvation in each other, and overcome the demons of their sordid pasts long enough to save the world?

...or is doomsday inevitable?

 

 

What do you get with the

ASTRAL THRILL3GY?

  • Great value! The ASTRAL THRILL3GY contains about 17 comic books' worth of content— including full and complete story arcs!
  • 333 beautifully-illustrated, full-color pages!
  • A BONUS "production extras" section in the back of EACH book (nearly 50 bonus pages total) meaning you're actually getting OVER 380 pages, altogether!
  • A professionally written, illustrated, inked, colored, and lettered production!
  • Printed on high-quality 85 lb. gloss paper with a premium 12 pt. glossy softcover!
  • Available in hardcover and limited-edition softcover variants!
  • Digital Edition + digital extras included FREE with every physical book!
  • Hard-hitting, high-octane sci-fi action, adventure, and FUN!

 

Lila— formerly one of the evil Astrals (and an alien/human hybrid)— struggles between her loyalties to her former masters and her "human friends" who have encouraged her to cultivate her own "free will".  Nevertheless, Lila's "darker side" can be unrelenting and unforgiving— though she is usually calm, cool and coldly logical unless provoked!

Rob, a sneaky Russian hacker and wanted fugitive, can open any lock, crack any code, and solve any puzzle!  He is usually out for his own personal gain— unless his current goals just "happen" to align with DeVane, etc.  "The enemy of my enemy is my friend?" Rob would no doubt agree— but are his amazing abilities the result of his exposure to Astral energy as a small child?

DeVane is, well, DeVane— a "man's man" relic from the bygone era of bravado— take it or leave it!  An ex-NASA space-shuttle commander, DeVane spiraled into drunken obscurity— and out of his mind— after a space accident years ago that killed hundreds of people.  Now, he's back— and fixated on spoiling the plans of the evil Astrals and acting as a "de facto" mentor to Lila.  He's Dirty Harry, Rooster Cogburn, John McClane, and Snake Plissken all rolled into one!  How's that for a role model?  Cryptocurrency? Cisgender?  ...the Internet?  DeVane has no clue what you're talking about!

Jeannie is a NASA-shuttle-pilot-turned-academic-overachiever, and a single mom to Angelica.  Her intense drive to succeed in technology, aerospace, and medical sciences often results in strained relationships with her friends (ex-fiancée, DeVane) and her relatives (Angelica)— although her kind, caring, and generous nature makes up for it!  Often the "voice of reason", Jeannie is the "glue" binding them all together!

Angelica, a classic "bad girl", comes with a matching bad attitude to boot!  Born without the ability to hear or speak, she's not going to let those small deficiencies stop her from being a rebellious, badass, hell-raising teen-- much to the chagrin of her "proper" and "squeaky-clean" law-abiding mother, Jeannie!

 

Wait... these are the GOOD GUYS?

Yep, and that’s the appeal of "Astral" graphic novels— the quirkiness of these characters and their interactions is a gold mine for humor, something often found lacking in much of today's science fiction and action fare...

More importantly, however, no matter how dire any alien threat faced by Earth, our little band of misfit heroes (or anti-heroes?) must first confront a much greater challenge:

Can they resolve to set aside their differences, and learn to work together as a team?

...and, speaking of teams:

 

 

You're in good hands!

We're the Astral Team: A troupe of international artists and creators with hundreds of years of comics-industry experience between us!  We produce ASTRAL under the Pet Piranha Entertainment and Visionary Creative Services banners!

 

Jay, why are you doing this?

I'm passionate about "Astral", and over the years I've grown to absolutely love it-- as many others do-- and I'm sure YOU will, too!

The fact is, I'm a fully-independent creator of comics— without the multibillion dollar promotion, advertising, and distribution networks of those other "big" comic publishers.

By pledging for our books, you're not only supporting me and my team— you're making a direct contribution to the survival of small independent publishers like us— proving that quality storytelling and artwork can prevail in a hypercommercial world of mass-production dominated by rich and powerful corporations!

The way we're different is that, through the "Astral" graphic novels and their character-driven stories, we explore core themes about humanity and challenge the "human condition"— by way of a gripping and action-packed thrill ride!  Also, explosions!

The cool part is: Unlike a lot of heavy-handed sci-fi books out there, the Astral adventures splash-in a little humor here-and-there, so it’s upbeat, engaging, and— most importantly-- FUN!

 

 

Best of all:

I’d like to offer YOU— the INDIEGOGO community, my friends and peers-- the opportunity to share in our adventures and support our work— and some of our super-cool and exclusive perks!

 

Purpose of Campaign Funds Raised

Funds raised in this campaign will go directly toward printing books and items associated with perks + postage, and the usual associated Indiegogo and payment-processing fees/costs.

Risks and challenges

Having completed several crowdfunding campaigns already, I have a deep appreciation for what it means to launch a campaign and ask for your support!

I also have a keen understanding of how crowdfunding platforms work, having already completed fulfillment for our past campaigns, "Astral Genesis" and "Astral Evolution". As such, I'm confident that my team and I will be able deliver your rewards as promised, upon successful completion of the campaign.

In addition, my team and I have over 30 years' experience in comics and collectibles fulfillment— so please rest assured that we’ll have no problem shipping your books and other rewards to you promptly as soon as we receive them from our printer.

With overseas production there is always a possibility that delays can occur in the phases of printing, shipping, and customs inspections. As with our previous campaigns, I will be monitoring the process closely, and you have my assurance that if there is any schedule slippage, I will communicate it to you (along with our plan for addressing it) as soon as possible.

In addition, unforeseen circumstances and resulting delays may occur due to the worldwide COVID-19 pandemic. If such conditions arise, I will communicate the situation— and our contingency plan— to you at my earliest possible opportunity.

Notice to backers residing outside of the United States who pledge for physical (mailed) rewards: We cannot be responsible for import/duty fees your home country may charge.  Thus far, we have not had any reports of import/duty fees from backers of previous "Astral" campaigns— but since other countries' import laws have the potential to change at any time (and without any notice to us), we cannot absolutely guarantee that it will not occur.

REFUND POLICY: Backers eligible for a refund under Indiegogo's Refund Policy may request one via that method. If a refund is not possible through Indiegogo's Refund Policy (or the backer is deemed ineligible) then refunds for this campaign are governed by the Pet Piranha Refund Policy, below. Note that purchases made via InDemand are governed by Indiegogo's Refund Policy for InDemand projects, and no refunds will be provided once the time period allotted for refunds under InDemand has elapsed.

PET PIRANHA REFUND POLICY: Backers may request refunds from Pet Piranha through the 15TH DAY after the campaign's final "active date" (or "end date") for raising funds. The amount refunded will be less any INDIEGOGO, payment-processing, and administrative fees— and all perks associated with the refunded pledge will be considered forfeited. After the 15th day post-campaign, no refunds will be provided by Pet Piranha, since all monies raised through the campaign will, at that time, be fully committed toward the fulfillment of the project.

PLEDGE WITH CONFIDENCE!

As always, all of your "Astral" rewards are fully backed by the "Pet Piranha Entertainment Guarantee" (see below). Please contact me if there is anything amiss with your rewards package, and my team and I will do whatever is within our power to make it right!

Your friend & fellow comics fan,

-Jay

 

 

Thank you!

My team and I are grateful for your support!

Your friend & fellow comics fan,

-Jay

story:
Award winning writer Von Klaus (Graveyard Shift Vol. 2) asks, "What would it be like to care for the things that go bump in the night?" This cult hit with the phenomenal art of Marco Maccagni (Zombie Tramp), haunting colors by Tanya Wicker (The Signal), and incredible letters by Eric Weathers (Earthworm Jim, Jawbreakers), tells a genre bending tale of hilarity, horror, and finding love in even the most monstrous of circumstances.

We've put our everything into this and with your help we can put out an amazing book for fans and collectors alike. Because it's YOU the FANS that make this possible. THANK YOU.

Look at what's been unlocked so far!

$15K - PIN IT!: ***UNLOCKED*** - FREE MONSTER M.D. PIN-BACK BUTTON ADDED TO EVERY PHYSICAL PURCHASE.

$18K - BONUS ART!: ***UNLOCKED*** FAN ART GALLERY ADDED TO SKETCH BOOK!

$20K - A SEXIER COVER: ***UNLOCKED*** MONSTER M.D. Cover goes heavier stock, super matte "soft-touch" film laminate with spot gloss UV cover

$25K - BOMBER PATCH! - ***UNLOCKED*** A badass 3 INCH bomber patch with every physical purchase!

$30K - BONUS CHAPTER: ***UNLOCKED***HEIDI'S BACKSTORY!: HEIDI'S TALE: HIDDEN MONSTER - The mesmerizing backstory telling how Heidi H. Hyde became invisible by Von Klaus and drawn by Marco Maccagni!

$35K - FLYING COLORS!: ***UNLOCKED***FULL COLOR VERSION OF THE OFFICIAL SKETCHBOOK

$40K - CROSSOVER!: ***UNLOCKED*** MONSTER M.D. VS SHINOBI SASQUATCH CROSSOVER COMIC TO BE DRAWN BY THE AMAZING MONSTER M.D. ARTIST MARCO MACCAGNI! WRITTEN BY VON KLAUS and OVERSEEN BY SHINOBI SASQUATCH SCRIBE CAL JAMESON!

$45K - TEAM BONUS: ***UNLOCKED*** PAY BONUS FOR MY ARTIST, COLORIST AND LETTERER!

$50K - ***UNLOCKED*** Eric Weathers, the man who lettered the world, SIGNING the book! AND I'm thowing in an awesome Monster MD BOOKMARK!

$60K ***UNLOCKED***  AWESOME TRADING CARD with art by JON MALIN of GRAVEYARD SHIFT AND CABLE.

DIGITAL COMIC: High Quality digital version of Monster MD in PDF format along with a BONUS high quality PDF of the Official Sketchbook Monster M.D.: COLOR BLIND.

SIGNED COMIC BOOK: A 100+ page perfect bound, high quality printed, signed comic book telling the entire first story of Monster M.D. - No cliffhangers here!

SIGNED SKETCH BOOK: A perfect bound, high quality printed, and signed limited edition official sketchbook showcasing development art, character designs, creator notes, lore info, schematics, bonus facts, script excerpts and the author's account of the making of Monster M.D.

PIN-UP POSTER: A high quality foldout poster with sensual art by the astounding Sashi of Heidi H. Hyde, the invisible surgical assistant as a very see through, yet very hot nurse. Signed by Heidi! (She wanted to sign in invisible ink but we wouldn't let her)

OFFICIAL T-SHIRT: A comfy T shirt in Sizes S-XL showcasing the MONSTER M.D. logo and the monster doctor's OATH: "DO NO HARM, UNLESS YOU MUST."

FOLLOW MONSTER M.D.

SPECIAL THANKS: FANS LIKE YOU, Ethan Van Sciver, Narwahl, Karl O'Rowe, Cal Jameson, Nerd Wonder, Jon Malin, Mark Poulton, and Vostos. And to my amazing family who helped me make this book a reality.

***ALL DESIGNS ON PRODUCTS SUBJECT TO CHANGE but will remain badass.
story_txt:
Award winning writer Von Klaus (Graveyard Shift Vol. 2) asks, "What would it be like to care for the things that go bump in the night?" This cult hit with the phenomenal art of Marco Maccagni (Zombie Tramp), haunting colors by Tanya Wicker (The Signal), and incredible letters by Eric Weathers (Earthworm Jim, Jawbreakers), tells a genre bending tale of hilarity, horror, and finding love in even the most monstrous of circumstances.
We've put our everything into this and with your help we can put out an amazing book for fans and collectors alike. Because it's YOU the FANS that make this possible. THANK YOU.

Look at what's been unlocked so far!

$15K - PIN IT!: ***UNLOCKED*** - FREE MONSTER M.D. PIN-BACK BUTTON ADDED TO EVERY PHYSICAL PURCHASE.

$18K - BONUS ART!: ***UNLOCKED*** FAN ART GALLERY ADDED TO SKETCH BOOK!
$20K - A SEXIER COVER: ***UNLOCKED*** MONSTER M.D. Cover goes heavier stock, super matte "soft-touch" film laminate with spot gloss UV cover
$25K - BOMBER PATCH! - ***UNLOCKED*** A badass 3 INCH bomber patch with every physical purchase!

$30K - BONUS CHAPTER: ***UNLOCKED***HEIDI'S BACKSTORY!: HEIDI'S TALE: HIDDEN MONSTER - The mesmerizing backstory telling how Heidi H. Hyde became invisible by Von Klaus and drawn by Marco Maccagni! 
$35K - FLYING COLORS!: ***UNLOCKED***FULL COLOR VERSION OF THE OFFICIAL SKETCHBOOK
$40K - CROSSOVER!: ***UNLOCKED*** MONSTER M.D. VS SHINOBI SASQUATCH CROSSOVER COMIC TO BE DRAWN BY THE AMAZING MONSTER M.D. ARTIST MARCO MACCAGNI! WRITTEN BY VON KLAUS and OVERSEEN BY SHINOBI SASQUATCH SCRIBE CAL JAMESON!

$45K - TEAM BONUS: ***UNLOCKED*** PAY BONUS FOR MY ARTIST, COLORIST AND LETTERER!
$50K - ***UNLOCKED*** Eric Weathers, the man who lettered the world, SIGNING the book! AND I'm thowing in an awesome Monster MD BOOKMARK! 
$60K ***UNLOCKED***  AWESOME TRADING CARD with art by JON MALIN of GRAVEYARD SHIFT AND CABLE.

DIGITAL COMIC: High Quality digital version of Monster MD in PDF format along with a BONUS high quality PDF of the Official Sketchbook Monster M.D.: COLOR BLIND.
SIGNED COMIC BOOK: A 100+ page perfect bound, high quality printed, signed comic book telling the entire first story of Monster M.D. - No cliffhangers here!
SIGNED SKETCH BOOK: A perfect bound, high quality printed, and signed limited edition official sketchbook showcasing development art, character designs, creator notes, lore info, schematics, bonus facts, script excerpts and the author's account of the making of Monster M.D.
PIN-UP POSTER: A high quality foldout poster with sensual art by the astounding Sashi of Heidi H. Hyde, the invisible surgical assistant as a very see through, yet very hot nurse. Signed by Heidi! (She wanted to sign in invisible ink but we wouldn't let her)
OFFICIAL T-SHIRT: A comfy T shirt in Sizes S-XL showcasing the MONSTER M.D. logo and the monster doctor's OATH: "DO NO HARM, UNLESS YOU MUST."

story:
What Are You Backing?

This is the second issue of a new comics magazine. The type of stories will be scifi and fantasy. This issue will have three stories, for a total of 64 pages.  If this is successful, subsequent issues will have more content.

What are the stories?

Three sisters in arms travel the land in search of riches and adventure. Follow Gala, Cayla and Seyelia on their journey as they make use of their powers and skills to defeat villains, vanquish demons and perfect their craft. A fantasy action tale for lovers of manga, anime and fighting games.

Our planet had been taken over by an alien race. The last vestige of humanity is on its last leg. Their only hope is an old mecha that no one seems to be able to active.

With The Red some how released, the treaty between man and nature is danger. The Red is spreading infecting man and nature in order to start a war. A young nymph named Coco takes it upon herself to stop The Red.

Joshua Metzger

Writes the crime comics Punch Drunk (Arcana Comics) and Metzger and Pawlak Presents: Villain (Evoluzione Publishing).

Matteo Leoni

Matteo Leoni was born in Albano Laziale (metropolitan city of Rome) in the 1992. He attended the “Scuola Internazionale di Comics” in Rome and, after obteining the diploma, starts to work immediately for italian little publishers. In the 2016 published with Manfont the post-apocalyptic/fantasy comic “2700 Apocrypha” and, from 2017 to 2018, works on Sci-fi comic “Space Anabasis” published by Edizioni Segni D’Autore.

In the 2018 he also worked on a itaian Indie comic called “Midnight Roads“ and currently he’s drawing the Destiny NY spinoff “Cherry Gilbert: The Necromancer”,  published by Space Between Entertainment and written by Vita Ayala and Pat Shand

Guido Martinez

Torn-S

In 2016, until now, open for commission comic / manga / pinup / design character on art websites such as Devainart / Pixiv and Facebook.ธนธรณ์ สนองบุญ  ( Thanathorn Sanunboon ) or  artist name Torn-S was born in 1985 Bangkok (Thailand). Started working on comics at the age of 17 by becoming an assistant cartoonist at Cx comic company.
Age 19, started working on his comic action / sci-fi "Control Battle" with Siam inter comic company and Thai cartoon studio (in Thailand)
After that, he made comic books from "Summoner master" (in Thailand) and comic books / Action / fantasy "The last Avata elixir of war".

Risks and challenges

story:
165 pages, all colored traditionally.

Volume 1 of a 3 volume project, "DisintegrationStreet" is the next project of "Strangelove: I Want to be Chrome" creator Brenden Swan. With a proven record of delivering a quality product on time, I look forward to sharing my newest story. A story about characters I created over 10 years ago, who can finally come to life with your help.

Summary

Join Charlotte as she starts her new life in the mysterious town of DisintegrationStreet, filled with the bizarre. The dead coming back to life, children being spirited away, a dead body fused into a wall, a man whose every girlfriend commits suicide, and a cult of male virgins.


Reluctant to become involved, Charlotte finds she has little choice when she is revealed to be key to solving the many mysteries of DisintegrationStreet. However, there are those that want to keep these secrets hidden. If Charlotte's not careful, she could end up as a ghost trapped in DisintegrationStreet forever. 165 pages, all colored traditionally.

 

Perks

Want to mix and match perks? (B/W ver. with signed ink sketch for example) Most perks are available as add-ons so you can tailor your order to your liking, and avoid paying for shipping more than once. (original art pages will add more to shipping.)

DisintegrationStreet comes in both a color or black and white option.  The color option has every page colored traditionally.

You can get a signed ink sketch drawn right on the inside cover of your copy.

For the price of one, you can get two of the original art pages used in DisintegrationStreet.

If you missed 2019's Strangelove: I Want to be Chrome, no worries, it is available once again. For more info on Strangelove, check out its ended campaign page https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/strangelove-i-want-to-be-chrome#/

Check UPDATES for more pages.

 

For everyone who supports DisintegrationStreet, whether through backing or spreading the word, I thank you for your support.

story:
Speed of Light is a brand new bi monthly sci-fi anthology. Each issue will have nine, 8 page stories by different creators. Some stories will be serialized and some will be one shots.

What Are You Backing

  • Black & White Sci-FI Anthology Series
  • First issue of an ongoing
  • This is a  72 page square bound magazine

 72:00 by Corey Hardman and Jok

He may not know who he is, where he is, or what the timer on his wrist is counting down to, but he did know the answers were somewhere within the dilapidated city. If he could just stay alive long enough to find them...

Galaxy Heirs by Rubyn Warren II and Ronilson Freire 

A group of space rebels travel to earth to find the rightful heir of a galactic empire.

Argosy by Adam Lawson and Maan House

a serialized deep-space horror tale about an outlaw band of space-prospectors who rip precious metals from corporate-controlled asteroids. On their latest scavenge, they're overtaken by an ancient evil that once lived on Earth.

 Ancient Aliens by Sebastian Suarez and Tadam Gyadu 

An expert in alternative history finds the missing link that confirms his theory... but is he chewing more than he can swallow?

Hunters by Guido Martinez & Pablo Arias

One soldier is being hunted by a group of armed aliens. Can he survive using the equipment on him and his wits?

Veiled by Matt Ringel and Luis Morocho

A father must venture into a fog plagued land known as The Veil to save his children, but within it horrors lay resting and waiting.

Blood Space by Nico Rodriguez and Damon Threet 

A renegade with a unique blood type makes a last ditch effort that plunges her into a brutal fight with not only an underwold space syndicate, but also, herself. Space Blood is a sci-fi crime story that's Tarantino meets Cowboy Bebop.

Magical Mechinations by Shane Morrison and Emi Utrera 

In a deadly war between magic and science, a little girl manages to do the impossible and binds a demon to a powerful machine. But will her new friend be enough to protect her from this war?

Some art from issue 1

 

ADD-ONS

Black Bishop is the top spy for The Board, UK's most secret organization. But when inside information is leaked, all fingers point to her. With her fellow agents in danger, she must eliminate the threat.

What are you backing?

  • This is a 32 page one shot comic.
  • Superhero genre
  • Teen Readers

story:
Dive into the universe of CRIT!

All four of the books are complete and will be ready for print upon the campaigns end. 

Covers:

Issue 0-

Nathan Broughton 

Issue 1 -

Bea Navarro 

 

Issue 2-

Mo Lubisan and Cristiano Cruz

Issue 3- Villains 

Mo Lubisan and Cristiano Cruz

Issue 3- Heroes

Mo Lubisan and Cristiano Cruz

Issue 3 (combined)

 

Interior Samples-

 

 

 

What is CRIT?

CRIT is not just a story of a group of newmade superheroes learning to work together as a team, it’s also a journey of discovery for each of those individual characters. Each issue provides the characters within to explore a little more of their strengths and limitations. The series follows the team as they face challenges, develop their powers, and grapple with choices that test whether or not they can truly call themselves...superheroes.

For Fans Of

  • Beverly Hills Cop
  • Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 
  • Bad Boys
  • The Expendables
  • My Hero Acadamia 
  • Blankman
  • The Fast and The Furious 
  • Deadpool

If you are a fan of buddy action flicks from the 90's and superheroes, you will enjoy this book. 

Who Is CRIT?

 

What's Included?

Issue 0: Roll Initiative

Issue 1: Righteous Indignation 

Issue 2: Vigilant Pursuit 

Issue 3: Unusual Suspects

With all 4 books combined, you'll be getting over 100 pages of content! 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

All of the content is done, but with the COVID-19 pandemic, this can introduce unpredictable issues or delays in shipping. Once the campaign is finished we will move right into printing, and then shipped right to you. If we have any delivery issues, we will make sure the issue is resolved. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word! We know not everyone can support our project financially, but sharing this campaign and our social media pages is a big help!

story:
Short Summary

A story of a young superhero who goes up against his first super-villain! Everything changes on that night as he comes inches away from losing his life. But he finds out he is much more powerful than he once thought! Not only that, there's someone on his trail... And he doesn't quite know why! 

Back Blue Blaze and find out how our young hero goes up against the odds and struggles from disaster to disaster! All while trying to do the right thing, and keep his City safe! 

The Covers

Standard Cover: by Lachlan Bradley & Kevin Sindayen

Variant Cover: by @fist.of.nova

IndieGoGo Exclusive Cover: by @comic_grey

Ultra Rare Variant: by Melvin DC Costiniano 

 

What We Need & What You Get

The funding raised through this campaign will go towards the printing of the actual comic. We were originally planning to have 3 separate STRETCH GOALS, but we decided to just give them to every physical backer at NO EXTRA CHARGE! Here's what you'll get, on top of the original perk:


FREE STICKER!

FREE PRINT! 

FREE MAGNET!

 

A Bit About Us

Hi there! My name's Konnor and I'm the founder of Kingdom Komix and the writer for Blue Blaze! I've been passionate about comics and storytelling since I can remember and can't wait to bring this fresh, unique take on superheroes to you! 

In terms of art, we have Melvin DC Costiniano on the pencils! An absolutely amazing artist who has been killing the page work! Check out his instagram: @subzeroscorcher! Also, here's some of his work below: 



Next up, we have Felipe Aguirre (@aguirre.illustration on Instagram) who is working on the Inks for the pages! Another brilliant artist, here's his work on another page of Blue Blaze:

For the colours, we have the fantastic Kevin Sindayen (@kevinkomics on instagram). Here we have another page of Blue Blaze coloured by him!

story:
MY STORY:

My name is Dusty, aka Tonicmole, creator of Saving the World! I’m extremely excited to bring you the fourth issue in my ongoing series! STW combines the nerdy depth of mainstream super heroes with the sensibilities of 90’s alternative comics. In my opinion the perfect mix of counter culture intellect, and fan service sex appeal, or something like that. Oh, and who am I? Just a fool trying to make comics. Last year I fixed tires for a living. Now I’m trying to be a hotshot comic book creator. Please don’t make me go back to fixing tires.

INTRODUCTION:

Saving the World #4 continues the adventures of our minimum wage super heroes Kierra and Nora in their never ending fight to save the world and pay the rent. In this issue our heroes Kierra and Nora meet a girl named Alice who is being hunted by a relentless would be super hero named Mercy. To protect Alice and defeat Mercy, Nora has to come face to face with the demons of her past and confront them head on.

STW #4 is a 32 page, black and white comic with a beautiful color cover by Illustrator Monk. The interior story is fully written and illustrated by me.

THE BACK STORY:

On October 3rd at 10:30 PM the National Astronomical Detection Agency (NADA) detected a massive global disturbance. Though the disruption lasted mere seconds its effects would be immediately felt by hundreds of thousands of people, and change life on earth forever. Across the globe people reported strange mutations, some as simple as a sixth finger, or as outlandish as our hero, Kierra who developed unlimited super strength. This is where our story begins. In the early days of a world frantically trying to make sense of the unimaginable. The rise of a world of gods and monsters, and the heroes that protect it.

VARIANT COVER:

Kevin Smith's Clerks has always been a major influence on me, so guess what? I made a parody cover!

 

Stretch Goals:

All physical bundles will receive all of the unlocked stretch goals!

 

Zombie Ernie Mini Poster:

ME BEGGING:

Any and all support is greatly appreciated! Unable to back this campaign? No problem. Just share the live'n heck out of it! Let's do this!

story:
the INCANTESI: CHAPTER ONE

 

     The INCANTESI are a group of sorcerers from the 18th century dedicated to protect the world of man; regardless that they are hunted by those they protect. One day, one of the INCANTESI strike back and quickly form the WRATH, a group that willingly branched off from the INCANTESI who's only purpose is the total destruction of those they formerly swore to protect. Over a short amount of time, the WRATH become more malevolent and vicious as thier numbers grow as they leave the INCANTESI.


      The remaining INCANTESI manage to imprison the WRATH in an adjacent pocket dimensional prison. However, at the last minute, there was a flaw in the confinement spell that has to be corrected every other generation.  Only the power of the last INCANTESI can fortify this dimensional prison.

      We meet Cassandra, a dancer from Milan. Cassandra is thrown into the world of the mystic arts when she discovers in the worst ways possible, that she is as the last of the INCANTESI; the heir apparent to mastery of sorcery as well as the keeper of the WRATH,



       Cassandra, forced into this life and finding out the secrets as to WHY she is to be the LAST of the INCANTESI, will leave her with a terrible choice at the last possible minute.... will she embrace her destiny, or be consumed by it?

The INCANTESI will be a FORTY EIGHT PAGE (48) four part graphic novel series released quarterly, the first issue is FULLY FINISHED AND RELEASED with the SECOND ISSUE is already in production. with relase dates in JULY, OCTOBER and JANUARY 2022.

 

WHAT I AM OFFERING....

This campaign is to get this graphic novel into the hands of as many people as possible before and once Conventions open up again. what i am offering is the following...

  1. PAPERBACK, HARDCOVER and DIGITAL COPIES

  2. COMMISSIONS DRAWN BY THE ARTIST.

    3. LIVESTREAM ARTSHOWS on my YouTube Channel (link below) where i will be drawing interior pages IN REAL TIME for the INCANTESI: Chapter TWO ... set for KS campaign in LATE JUNE 

https://www.youtube.com/c/theRICHNESS


WHAT YOU GET WITH EVERY PERK...

    ONE COPY of A4 prints of the cover for CHAPTER ONE 

   ONE COPY of the INCANTESI COMPANION..
the COMPANION has a bunch of notes, musings, pages that didnt make the cut and the VERY FIRST DRAWING of our hero as well as how she came to be...its a 16 page B & W booklet that is FREE FOR EVERYONE WHO BACKS THE PROJECT. :)  

 ...and a cool bookmark :) 

 

WHAT I AM TRYING TO DO...

I am simply trying to do what i have always been meant to do

  ...Tell a story with my art

  ...Tell a GOOD story with my art and writing.

  ...Continue doing what I LOVE doing

  ...and lastly, Sharing these stories with the rest of the world.

CHALLENGES.

As with everything, all challenges are to be met with hard work and determination. I am determined to not just get this out, but also to put out a book which will leave you wanting more. and I feel that this graphic novel does.

THANK YOU FOR JUST HEARING ME OUT...

All I ask is you take a look and if you like it, take a chance and get whichever perk you wish..., digital, paperback of hardcover AND MAYBE  a commissioned drawing by yours truly. 


I am excited to get this book out, a bunch of people have already read it and are anxiously awaiting the second issue. With what Ii have in store for our lovely protagonist,  I can say that you will NOT be dissapointed.. once again...thank you. :)
story_txt:
the INCANTESI: CHAPTER ONE
 
     The INCANTESI are a group of sorcerers from the 18th century dedicated to protect the world of man; regardless that they are hunted by those they protect. One day, one of the INCANTESI strike back and quickly form the WRATH, a group that willingly branched off from the INCANTESI who's only purpose is the total destruction of those they formerly swore to protect. Over a short amount of time, the WRATH become more malevolent and vicious as thier numbers grow as they leave the INCANTESI.
      The remaining INCANTESI manage to imprison the WRATH in an adjacent pocket dimensional prison. However, at the last minute, there was a flaw in the confinement spell that has to be corrected every other generation.  Only the power of the last INCANTESI can fortify this dimensional prison.
      We meet Cassandra, a dancer from Milan. Cassandra is thrown into the world of the mystic arts when she discovers in the worst ways possible, that she is as the last of the INCANTESI; the heir apparent to mastery of sorcery as well as the keeper of the WRATH,
       Cassandra, forced into this life and finding out the secrets as to WHY she is to be the LAST of the INCANTESI, will leave her with a terrible choice at the last possible minute.... will she embrace her destiny, or be consumed by it?

The INCANTESI will be a FORTY EIGHT PAGE (48) four part graphic novel series released quarterly, the first issue is FULLY FINISHED AND RELEASED with the SECOND ISSUE is already in production. with relase dates in JULY, OCTOBER and JANUARY 2022.

story:
MRDR WPN #1 is a 20 page black and white biopunk action comic book.

 

Comic comes with two 6x9 full color mini posters and a trading card.

 

"Foundry" poster by Kristian Rossi

 

"Split the Difference" poster by Joe Ball

 

"Tearing Me Apart" trading card by Art of TZU

 

"Breakout" Mailing List and Early Bird trading card by Simon Pothier

 

MRDR WPN sticker by Six AM Comics for all backers when we reach the $1,000 goal!

 

Cover art and interior art by Rafael Chrestani

 

Creative Team

Creator and plot: Aaron Calimeri

Dialogue, letters and logo: Adam AF

Art: Rafael Chrestani

 

Story

While on a mission to obtain data from a rebel gang, MRDR WPN jacks into a hidden information system and accidentally frees himself from the mind control of his hackers. Discovering the location of a captured woman, he sets out to find her and learn the truth behind what's going on.

Prepare for the next generation of military combat.

 

 

Completion status:

Cover: COMPLETE

Art: COMPLETE

Lettering and dialogue: COMPLETE

"Foundry" poster: COMPLETE

"Split the Difference" poster: COMPLETE

"Tearing Me Apart" trading card: COMPLETE

"Breakout" mailing list trading card: COMPLETE

story:
Short Summary

CATCH BOTH BOOKS IN THE 40 dollar TIER! DON"T MISS OUT! 

 

JUST ADDED!!! A NEW 6 page tale, The Case of the Littlest Dino! This is added to the MAIN BOOK as a thank you for supporting! Its a tale meant to mirror storytime with my daughter, and is about a little girl losing her pet dinosaur and going to get it back. Drawn by Peter Gilmore with words by LUG, TUG, and Gilmore! 

STRETCH GOAL 1: At 20,000; The Case of The Littlest Umbrella will add the AMAZING Kyle Ritter as a colorist to the FRONT cover! Kyle has done work on projects like Cyberfrog, and it would be AMAZING to add his talent here! 

STRETCH GOAL 2:  At 30,000; I will be adding SIGNATURES for myself to EVERYTHING. This is making sure that you not only get a comic, but a SIGNED comics!

STRETCH GOAL 3: At 40,000, MORE PAGES for the GOODIE BIRD TALE! This will allow us to give a few more pages to the tale and make it even better! 

STRETCH GOAL 4: At 50,000. Signatures from TUG AND LUG. Now, I already plan to sign those comics, but what would be cooler than a ThatUmbrellaGirl signature on it? After all, her future is LOOKING BRIGHT in comics and having that later on? O yeah. 

STRETCH GOAL 5: AT 70000. I will record a video that adds a read-through for BACKERS. That way, we have something for ANYONE wanting something fun with vocals, or needing assistance because of needs. 

STRETCH GOAL 5: AT 100000: The BIG 6 FIGURES. At this level, we're adding something special. ESCAPE FROM DINO ISLAND. This will be added to the main book as a secondary story. 10 pages, Black and White to fit the theme. From Peter Gilmore. The cover art is in the "updates" section if you'd like to see it! 

Part of the Goodie Bird explanation is hers as well, plus a few story notes here and there. So she IS part of our creative team! 

Hey THERE!!! This is ThatUmbrellaGuy, teaming up with Keung Lee, to bring you a tale of Lovecraftian-based mystery, paying homage to  the things that go bump in the night! The tale begins with the idea of madness and something more trying to enter our world, and revolves around a certain detective and the cutest unwitting sidekick trying to stop it! We wanted to create something  EVERYONE can love and enjoy, and I also wanted to be able to give something to my daughter to enjoy as well.

Page examples: 

 

 

 

Additionally, ThatUmbrellaGuy is  also teaming up with Peter Gilmore for an ashcan revolving around The Tale of the Goodie Bird. This answers the age-old question: What IS the Goodie Bird? HOW does it impact us? What mysteries does it implore? We hope you enjoy our project and find it as fun to read as we have had making it! 

Beginning!

Exploring!

Passing The Comics Gate and the Creatures outside! 

Resting by the FOREST of the SUNBEAM

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • We are asking for $10,000 to be able to pay the art teams we have teamed up with, as well as to be able to pay for the printing of the book and the ashcan. We also want to be able to ship it to whoever wants a copy, and of course cover taxes and other related expenses! 

 

  • Right now we have 3 perks.

The first perk gets you a physical copy of the ThatUmbrellaGuy/ Keung Lee comic.

The second perk gets you a physical copy of the Keung Lee comic and the ThatUmbrellaGuy/Peter Gilmore Ashcan.

The third perk allows a LUCKY 15 people physical copies of both the ThatUmbrellaGuy/Keung Lee comic and the ThatUmbrellaGuy/Peter Gilmore Ashcan PLUS those 15 people will get their faces/avatars drawn in by Peter Gilmore into the last page of  the Tale of the Goodie Bird!

The campaign is for a 28 page book. B&W. And the ashcan size is currently up to 12 pages. 

 

The Impact

That Umbrella Guy is teaming up with AMAZING TALENTS to ensure that comics are and remain for EVERYONE! We want EVERYONE to be able to enjoy a nice clean fun story that ALL AGES can enjoy! 

 

Risks & Challenges

We don't know what will happen in the future but we can guarantee that we will deal with and face whatever challenges we may face with this project. TUG has always been a great contributor to this community and he's not about to let you down NOW! 

Noting here: AFTER the campaign, there will be NO REFUNDS issued. This is to ensure that items printed will not exceed demand, so to help properly ensure the best product available. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone can contribute who wants to be able to do so but there are so many ways that you can still help get the word out about our project. One way is to use the Indiegogo share tools and to spread the link EVERYWHERE like confetti!

story:
CREATIVE TEAM

BLACK HOPS: U.S.A.-*-G.I. created by Timothy Lim and Mark Pellegrini

  • Art by Timothy Lim
  • Written by Mark Pellegrini
  • Front Cover by Timothy Lim and Genzoman 
  • Back Cover by Jacob Gerber 
  • Omnibus Front Cover by Man Tsang 
  • Omnibus Back Cover by KaFun 
  • Professional modeling by River Breann and Weapon Outfitters 
  • "Blitzkrieg Hop" theme composed by Doug Garrett 
  • Additional art and content by Matthew Weldon, Reagan Long, Bill Williams, CuteSexyRobutts, and Kelsey Shannon
  • MADE and PRINTED in the UNITED STATES of AMERICA

BLACK HOPS: U.S.A.-*-G.I is the ongoing comic book series about a covert strike force consisting of modern day cryptids. Their mission: to thwart an evil organization that specializes in the creation, capture, and weaponization of cryptids of their own. First published in 2018 by Antarctic Press, the characters in BLACK HOPS have gone on to cameo in other comics, such as Punchline and RAGS.

TASK FORCE 22114: "BLACK HOPS"

  • U.S.A.-*-G.I: After surviving an atomic bomb in the 1940's, the rabbit known as U.S.A.-*-G.I. displayed heightened intelligence and other skills, including optic camouflage, prolonged longevity, and the ability to communicate selectively with other creatures using an indecipherable carrier frequency. He has lived for generations with the Frelings, a career military family.
  • PATRIOT-R: In the wake of the 2011 Fukushima reactor meltdown, an irradiated otter was found by United States cleanup personnel. He manifested the same heightened intelligence as U.S.A.-*-G.I. but is much more unpredictable and violent by nature.
  • RIGOR TORTOISE: A multi-billion dollar experiment to artificially create the same set of skills displayed by U.S.A.-*-G.I. Ultimately the money was spent to augment a naturally intelligent terrapin with bionic enhancements and neural implants to be used as a trainable, walking weapon.
  • Penelope Freling: The current owner of U.S.A.-*-G.I. and descendant of the man who first discovered him, she is bonded to him and is the only person capable of understanding his communication frequency. She has reluctantly joined BLACK HOPS and undergone training to be an independent contractor, serving as a translator and necessary backup.

CRYTIQ HIGH COMMAND

  • APEX MOTH: The enigmatic leader and creator of CRYPTIQ, he was a scientist commissioned in 1966 to study and recreate the same conditions that made U.S.A.-*-G.I. A freak accident at his lab in Point Pleasant, West Virginia, turned him into an abomination. He wears a helmet to hide his visage. The leading expert on cryptids, his goal is to find, create, and bio-weaponize them for sinister purposes.
  • HARE TRIGGER: Kanina Lovacova, CEO of the internationally renowned private military company NINGEN. Her company was responsible for keeping watch over Apex Moth while he was in captivity, but he successfully bribed her to join him and use NINGEN as CRYPTIQ's private army. Wanted by the United States for treason, she is currently traversing Europe as she avoids extradition.

BLACK HOPS VOLUME 3

This campaign is the debut of the 3rd installment of the BLACK HOPS saga: taking place almost a year after the events of BLACK HOPS VOLUME 2: HARE TRIGGER and serving as an interquel and bridge between KAMEN AMERICA VOLUME 1 and KAMEN AMERICA VOLUME 2, the team is joined permanently by Penelope as the translator and backup for the team. They must infiltrate a castle in Europe to rescue a defector to the United States with critical information on CRYPTIQ. Unfortunately for them, CRYPTIQ is gunning for this asset as well and it's a race against time to see who gets the target first!

Along the way, the team will pick up new members -- including the highly trained COMMANDO-G -- as the stakes are raised between both sides!

Many of our recent readers have discovered BLACK HOPS for the first time thanks to the revealed tie-in from the epilogue of KAMEN AMERICA, VOLUME 1. As such, we are offering tiers that combine items with VOLUME 3 or with the OMNIBUS, which collects all 3 volumes of BLACK HOPS to date!

We are thrilled to offer you an outstanding, 72 page square bound book that is 100% finished! Our simple campaign is designed to cover our basic overhead of printing, shipping, and fulfillment with our USA-based affiliates, and to compensate us for the work done. The book has covers with artwork from two comics professionals: a front cover with colors by UDON legend Genzoman and a back cover by Jacob Gerber. 

Our omnibus, clocking in at 216 pages, features an incredible front cover by Man Tsang and a back cover by KaFun! It too is square bound, finished, and ready to print!

BLACK HOPS, VOLUME 3: 

  • 72 pages
  • Front cover by Timothy Lim and Genzoman 
  • Back cover by Jacob Gerber 
  • Fully completed, ready to print

BLACK HOPS: OMNIBUS

  • 216 pages
  • Fully completed, ready to print
  • Front cover by Man Tsang, back cover by KaFun 
  • Includes all 3 volumes to date-- BLACK HOPS: Buns of the Patriots, BLACK HOPS: Hare Trigger, and BLACK HOPS: Hopocalypse Now 

We have plenty of rewards to go along with either book:

  • Download of "Blitzkrieg Hop" (the theme of BLACK HOPS) by Doug Garrett 
  • Digital PDF with every physical purchase*
  • Black Hops patch with every physical purchase
  • Limited edition plush toy
  • 5.75 inch Penelope / Black Hops Acrylic Standee
  • Limited edition body pillow

*PLEASE NOTE: you will only have 31 days after a digital download link is sent out to request a new one. Please see the FAQ for more information. It is the customer's responsibility to diligently monitor updates and download files within the 31 day time frame we provide: we cannot take time out our days to stop what we're doing to re-upload files for delinquent backers.

Black Hops: U.S.A.-*-G.I. Volume 3 is the 11th collaborative book by artist / creator Timothy Lim and writer / co-creator Mark Pellegrini. The duo has worked over the decade on a number of licensed works for merchandising, comic book covers, pinups,  and fully illustrated comics, including their latest breakout original work, KAMEN AMERICA. Hopocalypse Now marks their 7th crowdfunded campaign collaboration and it is exciting to continue bringing their projects to IndieGoGo: guaranteed quality books delivered on time!

IMPORTANT INFORMATION REGARDING FULFILLMENT:

We pride ourselves on 2 years of successful crowdfunding and shipping in a timely manner: all of our books between 2019 and 2020 were delivered either a month early or on-time. However, the unique system by which IndieGoGo operates necessitates some personal policies to protect both you, the reader, and us the creators:

  • Digital PDFs are sent within 24 hours of receiving funding from Kickstarter, which is usually 14-17 days after the campaign ends. These files are sent via WeTransfer links, which expire after 7 days. Due to our busy schedules, we will honor the re-sending of links for up to 31 days after the first time the link is sent out. After 31 days, we are not responsible for backers who do not download our files: we have to be able to focus on other work without taking time out of our day to resend huge files to delinquent backers.
  • Physical books will be replaced if our tracking data shows that the parcel has not arrived within a reasonable period of time, or if significant damage was done to the books in transit. However, we are not responsible for book inquiries 3 months after the ship date. After 3 months, USPS will typically scrub tracking data. We cannot be dealing with shipping inquiries 6 months, a year, 2 years after the shipping date: that is not fair to us, nor is it fair to backers who have been monitoring the status of their orders. The onus of responsibility must fall on the customer to keep up with our updates regarding shipping schedules and other inquiries.

The book has covers with artwork from two comics professionals: a front cover with colors by UDON legend Genzoman and a back cover by Jacob Gerber. 
Our omnibus, clocking in at 216 pages, features an incredible front cover by Man Tsang and a back cover by KaFun! It too is square bound, finished, and ready to print!
BLACK HOPS, VOLUME 3: 

72 pages
Front cover by Timothy Lim and Genzoman 
Back cover by Jacob Gerber 
Fully completed, ready to print



BLACK HOPS: OMNIBUS

216 pages
Fully completed, ready to print
Front cover by Man Tsang, back cover by KaFun 
Includes all 3 volumes to date-- BLACK HOPS: Buns of the Patriots, BLACK HOPS: Hare Trigger, and BLACK HOPS: Hopocalypse Now 




We have plenty of rewards to go along with either book:

Download of "Blitzkrieg Hop" (the theme of BLACK HOPS) by Doug Garrett 
Digital PDF with every physical purchase*
Black Hops patch with every physical purchase
Limited edition plush toy
5.75 inch Penelope / Black Hops Acrylic Standee
Limited edition body pillow

*PLEASE NOTE: you will only have 31 days after a digital download link is sent out to request a new one. Please see the FAQ for more information. It is the customer's responsibility to diligently monitor updates and download files within the 31 day time frame we provide: we cannot take time out our days to stop what we're doing to re-upload files for delinquent backers.









Black Hops: U.S.A.-*-G.I. Volume 3 is the 11th collaborative book by artist / creator Timothy Lim and writer / co-creator Mark Pellegrini. The duo has worked over the decade on a number of licensed works for merchandising, comic book covers, pinups,  and fully illustrated comics, including their latest breakout original work, KAMEN AMERICA. Hopocalypse Now marks their 7th crowdfunded campaign collaboration and it is exciting to continue bringing their projects to IndieGoGo: guaranteed quality books delivered on time!
IMPORTANT INFORMATION REGARDING FULFILLMENT:
We pride ourselves on 2 years of successful crowdfunding and shipping in a timely manner: all of our books between 2019 and 2020 were delivered either a month early or on-time. However, the unique system by which IndieGoGo operates necessitates some personal policies to protect both you, the reader, and us the creators:

Digital PDFs are sent within 24 hours of receiving funding from Kickstarter, which is usually 14-17 days after the campaign ends. These files are sent via WeTransfer links, which expire after 7 days. Due to our busy schedules, we will honor the re-sending of links for up to 31 days after the first time the link is sent out. After 31 days, we are not responsible for backers who do not download our files: we have to be able to focus on other work without taking time out of our day to resend huge files to delinquent backers.
Physical books will be replaced if our tracking data shows that the parcel has not arrived within a reasonable period of time, or if significant damage was done to the books in transit. However, we are not responsible for book inquiries 3 months after the ship date. After 3 months, USPS will typically scrub tracking data. We cannot be dealing with shipping inquiries 6 months, a year, 2 years after the shipping date: that is not fair to us, nor is it fair to backers who have been monitoring the status of their orders. The onus of responsibility must fall on the customer to keep up with our updates regarding shipping schedules and other inquiries.

story:
WAKING DREAM, the first book in THE LUCENT series, is an 80-page, full-color trade paperback, made up of 60 pages of story, plus 14 pages of bonus material. Every backer also receives two 8.25"x11.5" (A4) full-color gloss prints.

THE LUCENT is an ongoing fantasy series set in a world not too dissimilar from our own, but where nothing is as it seems. It’s a place where ancient shadow societies, hiding in plain sight, train a select few to tap into mysterious abilities, to fight secret wars for control of the future.
 


In WAKING DREAM, we meet ELLA FORSYTHE, a young woman who from the outside appears to be living an unremarkable life. But every night in her dreams, she’s visited by DAMON SPECTOR, an enigmatic young man who’s teaching her to do things she never thought possible. However when the barrier between dreams and reality begins to blur, she’ll be thrown into the middle of a conflict that will turn everything she knows upside down.

THE LUCENT weaves mystery, suspense, super-powered action, and romance together in a world where our myths and legends come to life. If you enjoy stories that bend reality like The Matrix, and that re-imagine history like The Highlander, or games like Assassin's Creed, then you should consider backing THE LUCENT.
 

 

 

THE LUCENT is written, drawn and colored by me, Michael Bancroft. To ensure that I deliver the best possible product to backers, I have employed Joe Fulton (Flying Fortress, Arc Athena) to work on the project as an editor, and Eric Weathers as letterer.

As you can see below, much of WAKING DREAM is already completed, and I will be updating this progress table weekly for the duration of the campaign. As the sole artist working on this project, there is nothing that will stop me from delivering this book to backers. 
 


THE LUCENT has a beginning, middle, and end that will play out over at least 7 books. Therefore, it is of the utmost importance to me that I earn and maintain your trust, and that starts right here, with me completing and delivering this project to backers in a timely manner.

 

Stretch Goals

story:
Hey my name is Raphael Hamby, I'm 18 years old and I've been inspired to create my own comic book universe! I was born in Alaska, and raised in Hawaii. After Hawaii, I moved to Kansas City and I've been there since. I work at Chick-fil-A, and I draw and create characters on the side. I've created a wide range of characters and story lines that I would love to publish in my own comic books. some day, when my fan base is built high enough, I would love to start producing movies for the comics. 

$250 will be used to print my first 100 comic books
$1,000 will be used Illustration for the first comic book
$250 for miscellaneous expenses

 

This campaign will help fund the creation of my first comic book. Then hopefully start a future world of characters. 

I am a young comic book writer, but I'm a very passionate writer, and seeing encouragement from other people about my work helps me push through.

Other Ways You Can Help

 

Share the message if you can! Let the world know about my characters and the potential it has. And that's all there is to it.

story:
Short Summary

Let's Face It....The Future Is F#$@&)

Maybe The People Just Might Need "a little old fashioned"

Imagine if you will, a Samurai and his beloved, also a Samurai. Together they have found in countless battles. Now they face an encounter unlike anything before. The Future. Stranded  in a more uncaring world than they left behind, Kiro and especially Myshi are like lambs ready for the slaughter.

2100 Samurai is a story of two worlds, of two timelines.

On one hand, you have the village of Ito. A small backwater in the fictional  province of Songor. A region that looks to be during the Edo period of feudal Japan.

On the other hand... we have the cyberpunk dystopia that is the year 2100. A hellscape still scared by the Silca Wars of 2070's. Electronics, anything with a circuit board. Is at a premium. 

It is this cyberpunk future that Kiro finds himself in. Will he find his way? Will a guide swoop in to show him the way?

What will happen when Old Values meet New Morals?

 

2100 Samurai is not only a labor of Love but a team effort.

Nick Gibson-Writer

 

Nick Garber- Pencils and Inks

 

Kitty Pierce- Colors

 

Francisco Zamora- Letters

Here's the Breakdown

Right now the book is about 20% complete as of this writing (September 26th, 2020). Pages 1-3 have been colored. Work has been proceeding quite smoothly. We hope to have the book out by this February. It may even come out sooner. The point is it will come out.

What Your Money Does

After our successful Kickstarter for Project Axis last may, we are ready to step things up to the next level. Our initial goal is to raise $1500. That money will go to a print run of 300 copies. This goal is just the start. Depending on how well the campaign goes, we plan on having an even larger print run.
 

The Risks

Other than the total collapse of our studio their is really no chance of this book not coming out. We have alternative plans in case we do not receive the funds need for a full run. A partial run is completely within our means if it should come to that.

 

There Is More Than One Way To Support Us

If you don't have the funds to support us, don't worry, that's ok. We encourage you to spread the word on any and all social media. Twitter, Facebook, Youtube, Tumblr, Instagram, Tik Tok, hell we wouldn't say no to a smoke signal! Anyway you can is another possible person who could support us.

story:
Overview

MAGNA: THE LAST PANTHEON Vol. 1 expands the Beyond Time Universe, which was first introduced in BLACK TIGER: LEGACY OF FURY!

MAGNA: THE LAST PANTHEON Vol. 1 is the first of a two-part story arc in which protagonist Kati Skogsholm finds herself in league with the last of the world's deities of old and in the middle of their losing battle for survival! This is a 75-page, full-color graphic novel. Production is 100% complete!! This Indiegogo campaign is offering readers a chance to own a printed, limited edition collectible of this supernatural, fantasy-adventure epic!

The A-Team

Created/written by John Hervey (Troubleman), pencils by Marcio Abreu (Red Sonja, Warlord of Mars), covers by Elizabeth Torque (Uncanny X-men, Captain America) & Eduardo Ramirez Viera (Jinnrise), colors by Omi Remalante Jr. (X-O Manowar, Ninjak) and letters by Marco Della Verde (Achille's Inc).

Seriously, only a $500 Campaign Goal?

The budget for pencils, inks, colors and letters for 66 interior comic book pages and  cover images is well in excess of ten thousands dollars. Fortunately the production has already been financed and completed.

Your campaign dollars will go to printing, shipping and the production of more MAGNA comic books!

Oh, We Can Handle It! We're Professionals

Even for a graphic novel for which production is complete, it takes time to get the book printer ready, printed and received from the printer. Once we receive the books then the logistics of fulfilling the campaign perks is another job unto itself. But please don't fret, we have successfully fulfilled a crowdfunding campaign to the satisfaction of our backers in the past and in the process gained some valuable experience regarding the reward fulfillment process.

We will work diligently to fulfill all rewards in a timely fashion, but it's possible that printing or logistic issues could arise and the graphic novel could be delayed. In such a case, backers will be notified, given updates regarding the fulfillment process and new ETAs.

We understand the faith that backers have in us and this project so we will be transparent and communicative throughout the process, posting frequent and timely updates.

  • .

Other Ways You Can Help

You can also greatly help the campaign by:

Sharing the Indiegogo campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and any other social media site you are a part of. The more people we can attract to our cause, the better chance of a successful campaign, and the more people we can share our graphic novel with once made! For more info, check out www.beyondtimecomics.com!

Tell friends, family, everyone you know and everybody you meet!

Like and repost our Instagram posts, like and share our Facebook posts and Indiegogo updates and retweet our tweets... or even better, give us a shout out and include...

story:
(Rob Willis Variant)

 

 

Brutas The Badass #1 is a 48-page action space comedy about a bounty hunter and his psychotic robot sidekick that thinks it's human. Having no memory of his past, Brutas quickly finds himself BEING HUNTED BY IT and unraveling the thread of who he was.

With your help, this book will be an ONGOING title suggested for IMMATURE audiences and fans of books such as Trencher, Deadpool, Lobo, and movies like Planet Terror.

Our initial goal of $8,000 pays for production costs.

Donal DeLay has worked on the Image Comics series Death of Love. Nasser Rabadi has has self-published two novels and ran the hit indiegogo campaign, STARDUST.

Donal is fully penciling, inking, coloring, and lettering the book, but if we hit our FIRST stretch goal, then we'll be hiring an amazing colorist and letterer to help increase the overall quality of the book with their YEARS of experience and professionalism and get a beautiful book into your hands SOONER.

Comics are a passion for us and we really want to make an impression with the quality of our book. Readers deserve it. YOU deserve it.

We pride ourselves in professionalism and delivering, so you can rest assured that you'll love what you pay for.

If at any time you have a question, you can find us on twitter @NasserRabadi13 and @DonalTDeLay or by email, NasserRabadi13@yahoo.com and Donal.delay@gmail.com 

The book is fully scripted and Donal is 10 pages deep into the art. pages will be worked on as the campaign runs and will be done ON TIME to ship!

WHAT ARE OUR STRETCH GOALS?

$15,000 STRETCH GOAL: BEAUTIFUL squarebinding to proudly display the book on your bookshelf.

$20,000 STRETCH GOAL: HIGH QUALITY professional colorist and letterer will be hired.

$30,000 STRETCH GOAL: EXCLUSIVE set of trading cards for EVERYONE and TEN more story pages INCLUDING an original five page short story by Nasser Rabadi and killer artist ANDREW HUERTA.

Interested in helping in other ways, too? Word of mouth is the reason most people pick up books. If you think this is something a certain person would like, please tell them about it, or share on social media.

story:
Steampunk! Fantasy! Romantic Comedy?!

Mia White was an ordinary high school girl with ordinary high school problems. That all changed the day she was given her grandfather's mysterious journal and an even more mysterious antique ring -- one that transports her to another world!

Now this ordinary girl finds herself in an extraordinary realm filled with airships, flying serpents and clockwork cities! But her biggest challenge may come in the form of handsome, aloof (and downright infuriating) mage Crimson Rhen...
 


 

The Classic Webcomic Returns! 

SHADOWBINDERS first set sail in 2010 and ran until 2015 on its own domain, and later on Keenspot and WEBTOON. During its peak, the webcomic was regularly getting over one million pageviews per month. This two book graphic novel set is your second chance to pick up the definitive print edition of Shadowbinders in hardcover!

  • Created by Kambrea and Thom Pratt (aka Geeky Sparkles and Kneon)
  • Help launch the Clownfish Comics imprint!
  • Each 160 page hardcover book is 6" x 9" and in full color -- over 300 pages of material!
  • Book 1 contains Chapters 1-6 of the webcomic, and Book 2 contains Chapters 7-10.
  • Get caught up now for the return of Shadowbinders with all new material in Book 3 (Coming 2022)!
  • They'll be ready to ship almost immediately after Indiegogo releases funds!
  • Check out the teaser comic below for a taste of what the comic is about!


Help Launch Clownfish Comics!

We're hoping to use Shadowbinders as a springboard to launch the Clownfish Comics imprint! We want to produce unique comics and graphic novels that aren't mainstream superhero titles or mopey Tumblr autobiographies. Clownfish Comics aims to produce comics for fans of animation, for gamers, and for pop culture enthusiasts that maybe don't read a lot of monthly books. We have more projects in the works -- stay tuned for announcements!


Tier 1 - Shadowbinders Books 1 and 2

Our primary tier will be Shadowbinders Collection Vol. 1 and Shadowbinders Collection Vol. 2 shipped for $60.00 USD in the United States. Worldwide shipping is additional.
 


Tier 2 - Shadowbinders+ 

Everybody is going "plus," so why can't we? Both books SIGNED by creators Kneon and Geeky as well as an exclusive PRINT PACK and BOOKMARK!
 

 

Tier 3 - Retailer Pack

For verified comic book retailers in the United States ONLY. Three copies of each book at wholesale prices, shipped.
 

 

Risks & Challenges

This is a pretty low risk, lean and mean campaign. No frills. You want books? Here's books.

  • We're ready to rock! Books should begin shipping within days of Indiegogo releasing funds!
  • We only have a few hundred sets in stock, but will go back to press if orders exceed that.
  • Obviously, with the world being turned upside down, delays could happen but it's unlikely.
