story:
Here is just a few samples of my daughter Shani's art from her first sketchbook. Get the Father & Daughter Perk!

We hit the 2K STRETCH GOAL is unlocked !!!!!

Now all $25 and up backers get the deluxe TITAN The Dark Mouse Warrior trading card. 

 

• 3K STRETCH GOAL is unlocked !!!!! - Now my Sketchbook is Extend to 50 pages.

• 4K STRETCH GOAL - LOCKED  - A Second Pakkins' Land Trading Card.

Hello, welcome to my 2019 Indiegogo Sketchbook campaign.  My name is Gary Shipman, and I have been making art for more than 30 years working on comics, movies and other properties. I'm probably best known for my comic book series Pakkins' Land that was nominated for Eisner, Harvey, and Russ Manning Awards. My work has been published through Disney Publishing, Caliber Press, Image Comics, Alias Comics, Cryptozoic, and Zondervan. I have been exploring different styles of art throughout my adult life, with no formal art training. My wife Rhoda and I have been married for 31 years and have 3  beautiful children.

One of my biggest joys is sharing my work with you. That's right, It's you! You're the biggest part of what I do, my expression in art means nothing without someone to share it with. And your contribution helps me to keep going. So thank you for your interest.

My goal is to provide a quality product for you and I hope that you are as excited about this campaign as I am. I need enough for the printing, distribution, and fees to create this sketchbook. Anything beyond that will help to make it possible for me to focus on creating new story and art for the future issues of Pakkins' Land comic book Phase Two.

I'm keeping the perks simple, and the prices as low as possible:

• $10 DIGITAL: gets you a Digital Download 2019 Sketchbook

• $25 SKETCHBOOK: gets you a signed printed copy of my 2019 Sketchbook and a Digital Download 2019 Sketchbook 

• $50 HEADSHOT: gets you an original hand drawn headshot (of the character of your choice) on the cover of a signed, printed copy of my 2019 Sketchbook, a Digital Download 2019 Sketchbook. All Stretch Goals Included (shipping not included)

• $75 TORSO: gets you an original hand drawn torso (of the character of your choice) on the cover of a signed, printed copy of my 2019 Sketchbook, a Digital Download 2019 Sketchbook. All Stretch Goals Included (shipping not included)

• $100 FULL-BODY: gets you an original hand drawn full-body shot (of the character of your choice) on the cover of a signed, printed copy of my 2019 Sketchbook, a Digital Download 2019 Sketchbook. All Stretch Goals Included (shipping not included)


• $150 ORIGINAL ART: gets you an Original piece of 8.5" x 11" Art, a Hand Drawn Rough Sketch in the printed 2019 Sketchbook, and a Digital Download 2019 Sketchbook. All Stretch Goals Included (shipping not included)

• $500 OWN-A-COMIC-PAGE: gets you a Cool original art comic book page from Pakkins' Land. Plus an Original piece of 8.5" x 11" Art, a Hand Drawn Rough Sketch in the printed 2019 Sketchbook, and a Digital Download 2019 Sketchbook. All Stretch Goals Included (shipping not included). Note: For international shipping there will be an additional charge for insurance & tracking which will be determined before mailing.

• $1000 COVER ART: gets you an Original Cover Art from a book I did the cover art on. Pakkins' Land  Plus: a Hand Drawn Rough Sketch in the printed 2019 Sketchbook, and a Digital Download 2019 Sketchbook. All Stretch Goals Included (shipping not included)

Please check the perks out for more specific details!


Some Ways You Can Help

If you like this campaign but just can't contribute at this time, but you still want to help...you can! By getting the word out and sharing on your social media.

And that's all there is to it folks.

 

Looking for more information? Check the project FAQ

Let us know if you think this campaign contains prohibited content.

story:
WE ARE PROUD TO PRESENT! WE DRAW 'EM, YOU WRITE 'EM, WE ALL COLLECT 'EM AND HAVE HOURS, UPON HOURS OF FUN!

COLLECT THE NOSTALGIA 

We all had them! We all collected them! Marvel and DC baseball cards! They were full of charts, powers, cool pics, and power ratings! Now, we can have that same feeling, again and, pass it on to others! We've gotten a lot of requests for something like this, so we made it happen!

  • We did it with The POWERVERESE COLLECTIBLE CARD GAME!
  • Now we're doing it again!

 

 

BUILD YOUR INDIE DECK CARD TODAY!

COLLECT YOUR FAVORITES, TRADE THEM, GET 'EM SIGNED, MY YOU'LL BE HOLDING ON TO A GEM ONE DAY!

(IMAGINE IF ANTHONY PIPER HAD PRODUCED AN INDIE DECK CARD BEFORE HIS TRILL LEAGUE TOOK OFF! AS A COLLECTOR AND FAN, THAT WOULD BE AN AWESOME FEATHER IN SOMEONE'S CAP!  WITH INDIE DECK, WE ALL CAN BECOME COLLECTIBLE!)

Let's Bring the "Collector" back to Indie Comics!

Let's INDIE DECK!

story:
STRETCH GOALS!

$3,000 STRETCH GOAL- Trading Cards - NOT REACHED

Once the campaign reaches $3,000. All physical backers will receive two character trading cards. They come with characters stats and a bio on the back.

 

$1,500 STRETCH GOAL- Digital Character Preview- UNLOCKED

We would like to announce our first stretch goal! Once the campaign reaches $1,500, all backers will receive a special look at an upcoming character for Volume 2. This is a new character to the story and a first look at the next chapter in the Guardians of Erloth series. This perk will be sent to all backers once the campaign has been completed. 

 

 

My name is Chael Roberts and I am a first-time comic book creator. Writing is a passion I have been pursuing since my time in the US Navy. I am pleased to finally be able to bring one of my stories to life with the help of my artist, Ryan Best, and fans like you!

 

 

I am relaunching Volume One of Guardians of Erloth for two reasons. First, to give everyone another chance to get in on this incredible story from the beginning. Second, I hope to cover more of the costs associated with hiring an artist and letterer and printing the comic. I funded my first campaign mostly out-of-pocket because I have full faith in the story and wanted to fulfill my obligation to my amazing backers.

I am offering two versions of the comic book: cover A by the brilliant Keith Hinman and cover B by the phenomenal Caanan White. Can't decide? Get both! In addition to the comic books, you can also purchase some great perks including prints and posters. Check out all the tiers and options to the right!

 

 

 

 

 

You’ll definitely want a copy of this book if you...

...are a fan of fantasy.

...enjoy action-packed stories.

...appreciate amazing artwork.

...want to support indie creators.

...want to support indie artists.

 

 

 

 

No risk to you! Because this campaign is a relaunch of a previously printed book, you are guaranteed to receive your product(s) regardless of whether I reach my goal or not.

 

 

Already backed the book? Not ready to back at this time? No problem! You can still help me reach my goal by sharing this campaign. Make someone's day by introducing them to Guardians of Erloth today!

Twitter @ChaelRoberts     Instagram Scribe of Erloth     YouTube Comics du Nord

story:
Stalled Trek: The City on the Edge of Foreclosure (COTEF, for short!) is an animated puppet parody of what is widely regarded as the original series' best episode! It's like an animated Mad Magazine parody with digital puppets.

The previous Stalled Trek parody was Stalled Trek: Amutt Time (a parody of "Amok Time") and was animated in 2012. I don't call this STALLED Trek for nothing! 

That parody had its beginnings way back in 1995 when it started as a comic parody on my Star Trek fan page. In 2001, I made a full comic version of it and began work on a follow up comic ...which was COTEF.

Now I'm re-making them both as comics twenty years later, making the Stalled Trek name even more accurate. 

I'm currently finishing up the animation on COTEF ...and for a home-made animated puppet movie, it's coming out even better than the first one. That's not a huge accomplishment, I'll grant you, but I want to make this one the Big One.

Thanks to the original funding, I'm making 250 Blu-Rays and I have the extremely talented Max McGuire scoring the film! 

Which leads me to this second round of funding. Audio has been my Achilles Heel partly because I'm largely deaf in one ear and my good ear isn't great, either. Not a good scenario for mixing a film's audio.

Audio is 50% of the film experience and Max has been doing such a fantastic job with scoring, that I really don't want to sabotage that with inferior sound quality.

That's where you come in!

I'm starting this second round of funding so I can give the audio the best quality I can and since there's a limit of how many discs I have left over from the first campaign, I'm going back to Stalled Trek's comic roots!

Well, sort of, anyway!

If you're an older Trekkie like me, then you certainly remember the Star Trek "Fotonovels" from the 1970s, that turned twelve episodes of the original series into paperback photo-stories. Like comics, but using frames of film from the actual shows.

That's the idea here. And for the ultimate nostalgia, there's even a variant cover that parodies the covers of those original books!

 

Stalled Trek Comic Book

This is a standard comic book sized graphic novel. It's 48-pages and adapts both Stalled Trek: The City on the Edge of Foreclosure and Stalled Trek: Amutt Time! It's a flip book, so each story gets its own side.

Just flip the book over to read the other story!

 

Stalled Trek "SeeGeeNovel" Variant Cover

This is the exact same comic, only with a different cover! I've parodied the covers of the original Fotonovels from the 70s. Only these really aren't photos, so I'm calling them SeeGeeNovels (for Computer Generated, of course!) It's just like getting Book #1 and Book #12 ...only much, much dumber!

 

Stalled Trek: COTEF Blu-Ray

(Limited to 100)

This campaign is your last chance to get one of the blu-rays! I'm only making 250 of them for crowdfunding and no more will be printed. 100 of them are gone already, which leaves 150. The Blu-Ray will include the film, a making of feature and an upscaled HD version of Amutt Time! Depending on how this round of funding goes, it might have very cool cover art by another artist!
 

Super Backer Set

(Limited to 50)

Special deal! With this tier you get the both versions of the comic, the blu-ray AND the Amutt Time DVD! Plus you get three exclusive Stalled Trek trading cards, parodying the classic 70s trading cards (which are only available with this set!) I'm limiting this to 50, again because of the limited number of blu-rays. 

 

Plus these cool Stretch Goals!

 

UNLOCKED! Stalled Trek: Amutt Time Poster

Every backer of a physical product will receive the movie poster for the first Stalled Trek!  

 

$5,000—Stalled Trek: Prelude to Ax'd-We-Are Poster

The movie poster for the 2016 parody of the controversial Star Trek fan film. Made during the lawsuit against its makers! Winner of the Best Fan Film award at the Berlin Sci-Fi Filmfest in 2017!

 

$7,500—Stalled Trek: The City on the Edge of Foreclosure Poster

You will be able to display all three Stalled Trek posters proudly on your wall! Imagine the thrill as guests to your home stare in wonder (...wonder about your taste in entertainment, that is!)

 

$10,000—Stalled Trek: Balance of Terrier

This is a stretch goal that is really a stretch! If somehow we reach $10K, I will increase the number of pages and add a third, brand new Stalled Trek parody to the comic! In Balance of Terrier, Captain Krok finds himself and his crew in a deadly cat and mouse game with the Ruffulans! Turns out they look just like the Vulcanines and they have a bone to pick! Is the USS Secondprize any match for a Bird Dog of Prey?

 

Thank You!

I am having a blast making this movie and I'm really thankful to all who have supported me and to those who may choose to support me in this campaign. As a kid, I loved digging into Mad and Cracked magazines and watching cartoons and Star Trek. I certainly never dreamed I'd get to combine all of those loves into a hobby that I love. Please spread the word to Star Trek fans you know and thank you so much!

story:
Fight the Fish. Save the Princess.​ This book is InDemand! This campaign couldn't have been such a success without you the backer and Indiegogo for pushing this campaign to the front page! Together, we are going to make a great book that the whole family will enjoy.

Earthworm Jim: Black & White LEATHER are sold out and they will arrive in February an instant collector's item! Congrats if you got one! Some other tiers will remain available until we begin to ship in February.
 

Thanks to the fans of EWJ who have stuck with EWJ for over 25 years because we finally have the authentic Earthworm Jim Saga! EWJ2: Fight The Fish will be loaded with even more features on this campaign, but look at what the book has already achieved:

Hardcover, 9" x 12", full color, 160 Pages 
Gold Gilded Edges 
Embossing & Debossing
UV Spot Gloss, 2 different colors of foil!
Every backer gets a colorized Re-issue of THEY CALLED HIM EVIL mini-comic from 1991!
Every backer gets a set of 3 different Earthworm Jim stickers!
Evil the Cat cloth PATCH!
Doug T will read you Earthworm Jim 2: Fight the Fish!

This all-ages story takes place just after the first book EWJ: Launch the Cow!  The bad guys, Bob and #4, kidnap Princess What's Her Name and it's up to Earthworm Jim, Peter Puppy, Snot and Farmer Jim to go to the Planeta De Agua and save her!

INTRODUCING Earthworm Jim: Black & White LEATHER Cover Edition!

THIS ITEM IS SOLD OUT! At DougT Comics we think the printed book is a marvelous form of art. So for the first time ever we're offering Earthworm Jim: Launch the Cow in a Black & White, leather cover edition! This will be a most unique art book! Here's a rough idea of the leather cover (we've changed and improved it significantly):

Every Leather book comes with these features:
1. EWJ LEATHER will be hand-signed and numbered with an EWJ headsketch inside!
2. TEE SHIRT designed by Doug T (sizes S to XXXL)

3. EWJ black and white logo patch:

4. EWJ 1" enamel pin:
Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RuDoO8vTQ_c


These LEATHER book tier items will not be available for add-ons and will only be available on this one campaign. This leather book will have just this ONE PRINTING so it will be an instant collector's item!

We start with 160 pages of the black and white art from Earthworm Jim: Launch the Cow! and Fight the Fish! Some will be partially inked, most are completely inked. The cover has a metal, aged, shield overlay, ribbed spacers on the spine, a cloth ribbon, essays on the philosophy of black and white, rice-paper tip-in sheet and more! The goal is to make the book crazy-stupid-rich with detail and fun! 



MAGICAL MYSTERY PSYCROW ZOMBIE PATCH:
Below is the Indiegogo First-48-hours exclusive PSYCROW ZOMBIE cloth-embroidered patch! Back this campaign in the first 48 hours and we will add this patch to your order for free!

Crafted By a Team of Artists:
Our team has the proven experience to make quality books delivered in our famously engineered shipping boxes covered in crazy decorations. The pages of these books are already inked and our colorist KATHERINE GARNER has now colored the entire book! Her work is marvelous as she paints them in Photoshop. Here's 2 sample pages from EWJ2: Fight the Fish...



These books are collectable, handsome coffee table editions and my backers always have a blast opening their unique shipping boxes as the stretch goodies pour out! You'll get your hardbound books quickly and our customer service offers amazing white-glove care for your shipment.

STRETCH GOALS:
UNLOCKED! EWJ 2 gets Hardcover, 9" x 12", full color, 160 Pages 
UNLOCKED! EWJ 2 gets Gold Gilded Edges 
UNLOCKED! EWJ 2 gets Embossing & Debossing
UNLOCKED! EWJ 2 gets UV Spot Gloss, 2 different colors of foil!
UNLOCKED! Every book backer gets a colorized Re-issue of THEY CALLED HIM EVIL mini-comic from 1991!
UNLOCKED! Every book backer gets a set of 3 different Earthworm Jim stickers!
UNLOCKED! Doug T will read you Earthworm Jim 2: Fight the Fish!
UNLOCKED! $100k- Every Backer gets a QUARTER BLACK FERRET sticker!

UNLOCKED! $120k expensive, antiqued SCULPTED METAL SHIELD on leather cover!
UNLOCKED! $130k every backer gets a PDF script of the Bigfoot Bill 3: floppy comic!
UNLOCKED! $140k Leather edition gets ribbed spacers on the spine!
UNLOCKED! $145k Emboss the leather cover!
UNLOCKED! $150k Gold Foil Stamp on Leather edition to give it some bling!
UNLOCKED! $155 Deboss the leather cover!
UNLOCKED! $160k Alejandro Mirabal B & W print for ALL BACKERS (KS too)!
UNLOCKED! $170k rice-paper or vellum chapter separator for the Leather book!
UNOCKED! $180k cloth ribbon added to leather edition!
UNLOCKED! $190k Earthworm Jim METAL TRADING CARD for all Leather Edition backers!
UNLOCKED! $200k Full 4-color custom designed shipping box!

ADD-ONS are how you CUSTOMIZE this campaign!
You may need a book that isn't on your tier, so you can add-on books to create your own custom order. The main items we are offering to add-on:
Earthworm Jim 1: Launch the Cow! Get the book that broke the Ingiegogo comic-funding record!
Earthworm Jim 2: Fight the Fish! Get more copies of the newest DougT Comic!
Bigfoot Bill 1: Shadow of the Mothman This is the FIRST book we made in the big new format!
Bigfoot Bill 2: Finger of Poseidon The 2nd chapter of my newest character!
The Making Of Earthworm Jim never-told stories on how the original team made a great game!
Bigfoot Bill 3 Floppy Comic Get more copies of the 24-page preview (every backer gets 1)!
They Called Him Evil Floppy Comic Get more copies of this 8-pager (every backer gets 1)!
Evil the Cat Patch You get one patch for free already. Want more? Add one on!
Sticker Set Every sticker we create for the campaign will be added. There are 3 EWJ stickers!

On the Numbering of Leather Books:
The books will be given out in order of Indiegogo tier cost first, then numerical order. The first backer in the highest tier gets the lowest numbered book.

Metal shield art to be sculpted for Leather cover:

Risks & Challenges

We all know the pandemic has kicked certain businesses in the crotch so we can experience some printing and shipping delays. The delays are slight (less than 2 months on the last campaign) so we will get you your books no matter what.

Can't Contribute But Want To Help?

Help us spread the word about Earthworm Jim 2: Fight the Fish to your friends! Just copy the link above and post it in your social media! Sharing is caring.

Follow Me

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/dougtennapel

Mailing List: http://earthwormjimcomic.com/

Shopify Store: http://doug-tennapel-comic-library.myshopify.com/
story_txt: Fight the Fish. Save the Princess.​ This book is InDemand! This campaign couldn't have been such a success without you the backer and Indiegogo for pushing this campaign to the front page! Together, we are going to make a great book that the whole family will enjoy.Earthworm Jim: Black & White LEATHER are sold out and they will arrive in February an instant collector's item! Congrats if you got one! Some other tiers will remain available until we begin to ship in February. Thanks to the fans of EWJ who have stuck with EWJ for over 25 years because we finally have the authentic Earthworm Jim Saga! EWJ2: Fight The Fish will be loaded with even more features on this campaign, but look at what the book has already achieved:Hardcover, 9" x 12", full color, 160 Pages Gold Gilded Edges Embossing & DebossingUV Spot Gloss, 2 different colors of foil!Every backer gets a colorized Re-issue of THEY CALLED HIM EVIL mini-comic from 1991!Every backer gets a set of 3 different Earthworm Jim stickers!Evil the Cat cloth PATCH!Doug T will read you Earthworm Jim 2: Fight the Fish!This all-ages story takes place just after the first book EWJ: Launch the Cow!  The bad guys, Bob and #4, kidnap Princess What's Her Name and it's up to Earthworm Jim, Peter Puppy, Snot and Farmer Jim to go to the Planeta De Agua and save her!INTRODUCING Earthworm Jim: Black & White LEATHER Cover Edition!THIS ITEM IS SOLD OUT! At DougT Comics we think the printed book is a marvelous form of art. So for the first time ever we're offering Earthworm Jim: Launch the Cow in a Black & White, leather cover edition! This will be a most unique art book! Here's a rough idea of the leather cover (we've changed and improved it significantly):Every Leather book comes with these features:1. EWJ LEATHER will be hand-signed and numbered with an EWJ headsketch inside!2. TEE SHIRT designed by Doug T (sizes S to XXXL)3. EWJ black and white logo patch:4. EWJ 1" enamel pin:Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RuDoO8vTQ_cThese LEATHER book tier items will not be available for add-ons and will only be available on this one campaign. This leather book will have just this ONE PRINTING so it will be an instant collector's item!We start with 160 pages of the black and white art from Earthworm Jim: Launch the Cow! and Fight the Fish! Some will be partially inked, most are completely inked. The cover has a metal, aged, shield overlay, ribbed spacers on the spine, a cloth ribbon, essays on the philosophy of black and white, rice-paper tip-in sheet and more! The goal is to make the book crazy-stupid-rich with detail and fun! MAGICAL MYSTERY PSYCROW ZOMBIE PATCH:Below is the Indiegogo First-48-hours exclusive PSYCROW ZOMBIE cloth-embroidered patch! Back this campaign in the first 48 hours and we will add this patch to your order for free!Crafted By a Team of Artists:Our team has the proven experience to make quality books delivered in our famously engineered shipping boxes covered in crazy decorations. The pages of these books are already inked and our colorist KATHERINE GARNER has now colored the entire book! Her work is marvelous as she paints them in Photoshop. Here's 2 sample pages from EWJ2: Fight the Fish...These books are collectable, handsome coffee table editions and my backers always have a blast opening their unique shipping boxes as the stretch goodies pour out! You'll get your hardbound books quickly and our customer service offers amazing white-glove care for your shipment.STRETCH GOALS:UNLOCKED! story:
So, what's this all about?

Hi, my name is Karl Stephan and I write and draw comics. I've been published by Slave Labor Graphics in the past and now want to try my hand at crowdfunding my latest comic, Mary Boys. This project consists of 2 issues of 24 pages each.

The Mary Boys are quadruplets born with a rare genetic condition that causes enlarged hands and feet, distorted facial features and prevents sufferers from growing any body hair. Their condition also affects the way they metabolise alcohol. Drinking beer gives them almost superhuman strength and endurance (unlike the rest of us who send drunk texts to people we ...shouldn't).

The boys are from a backwater English town called Basham where they were raised by an old priest named Parrish. May years ago Parrish was the victim of an attempted robbery which left him with a bullet in his skull and flashbacks to a past life when he was a member of the original Order of the Knights Templar hundreds of years ago. Using his revived knowledge he trained the boys in the Templar fighting traditions.

Basham is riddled with many social problems thanks to a huge retail corporation driving out small businesses, cutting jobs and leaving large sections of the community impoverished and at the mercy of gangs.

Parrish prophesied that Basham will suffer a great biblical apocalypse unless it is purged from its evils. So, the boys roam the streets at night with their cricket bats, heavy boots and lager cans to bring in the needed salvation by force.

The 'Mary' in the title is a reference to the Boys being Catholic and also to the mysterious image of the Blessed Virgin being ever present in their nocturnal missions, guiding them in their fight against gangsters, hooligans and wrong-uns, including Basham’s own police force.

This is a very British black comedy that will appeal to fans of comics like Tank Girl, The Goon, Cerebus, TMNT, Marshall Law and TV shows like The Young Ones and The League of Gentlemen.

Save for the lettering the covers and interior pages are all traditionally illustrated with real media, so it looks definitively old school.

Your contribution will help bring this deeply personal yet patently untrendy comic into the world!

What's in it for me?

The perks you will receive for helping to bring this project into the world are listed in detail the right hand column and include digital and print versions of Mary Boys issues 1 and 2, digital versions of my existing print catalogue, art prints and patches.

Risks and Challenges

As far as experience goes, I already have one 175 page graphic novel under my belt, so I am confident that I can see this project through to the end. Both covers and incentive art pieces have been drawn; interior pages are all lettered and have been drawn to the final pencil stage. All that remains for me to do is is ink the final 35 pages, which should realistically take between 3 to 4 months .

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute money, you can still help by spreading the word about this campaign by using the share tools.

story:
He-Man and the Masters of the Universe meet old school Heavy Metal Magazine! 

If you love properties like MOTU, Thundercats, and Heavy Metal, then Serpent Handler is the right comic for you!

I'm a 2011 Kubert School graduate who has committed my life to freelance cartooning and comics. Over the past few years I've worked on several licensed sketch cards for Topps and Upper Deck. That includes multiple one of a kind sketch cards for several Star Wars trading card sets for Topps, and one of a kind sketch cards for several Marvel Comics sets for Upper Deck.

I've penciled and inked a one shot pirate adventure comic for Blue Juice Comics, Anne Bonnie: Gummerblot Day, that will be in comic shops Summer 2019.

Serpent Handler started out as Badge Art for Zapp Con 3 in New Jersey. I've reversed engineered a whole wealth of ideas that I'd like to illustrate in comics to enjoy! There's nothing like creating and sharing narrative comics with others!

With your support, this will be the starting point for what will be a continuing series of Serpent Handler comics! 

I initially need $5,000 to commit the time needed to draw the planned minimum 48 pages of content and cover. This will also allow me to print the comics, stickers, and prints to fulfill the orders. This will be a limited print run of 250 copies of this book! They will each be individually numbered.

If $10,000 is raised artist and colorist Anwar Hanano will color the book! We have to be able to pay him too for his hard work! Anwar is a fellow Kubert School graduate who has various credits with Archie Comics, DC Comics, and Toresh Games! 

Projected completion date would be February 2020. That allows me the time needed to make the pages as great as I can make them in order for you to have a more stellar comic!

I have several perk tiers lined up, so check those out and choose what's right for you. We'll be adding more as we go along. Also, spread the word! Grass Roots!

If my initial goal of $5,000 isn't met, it would definitely prolong the projected/planned release and ship date. The more I raise essentially allows me the time I need to produce the art! If I don't reach goal I'd still print the exact amount of copies to fulfill orders, which is why my goal is so important!

Once again, thanks for reading, contributing, and spreading the word!

story:
Black Bishop is the top spy for The Board, UK's most secret organization. But when inside information is leaked, all fingers point to her. With her fellow agents in danger, she must eliminate the threat.

What are you backing?

  • This is a 32 page one shot comic.
  • Superhero genre
  • Teen Readers

Marcel Dupree Creator/Story

Born in San Diego, California. He owns and operates Evoluzione Publishing. Either creator or co-creator of comics such as Le Fay, POM, SFC, Babylon Working, Seeing Red.

Guido Martinez Story/Script

Born and based in Buenos Aires, Argentina. Lover of superhero, action and fantasy comics. Creator of stuff that hopefully some day people around the world will enjoy. Appreciative of creativity, open-minded sense of humor and bright colors. Metal music and fighting games enthusiast. Creator of Knight and PIS.  Also, co-creator, co-writer and co-plotter of Three Thorns and SFC. Enjoy!

Gaurav Shrivastava - Artist

I'm a Comic book artist from a small town Morena, India. I have been reading comics and drawing stuff since I was a 4. My career began with holycow entertainment where i did numerous titles.  I am known for my dynamic muscular superhero art also for beautiful women drawing. I have won the best penciller award for my best selling title the last asuran. I am now working with Evoluzione Publishing and other indie publishers.

story:
PLEASE NOTE:  We will be fulfilling the rewards from both the US and Australia in order to lower shipping costs for the backers. The pledges will be converted from AUD to your local currency ($1 USD = $1.45 AUD).

 

EXILIUM is a graphic novel consisting of the entire six-issue limited series published by Alterna Comics, including a bonus 10-page story from the world of Exilium. 

It is a story set in the late 21st century when the first official contact is made with an advanced, extra-terrestrial race. On the run from a superior force, they seek refuge on Earth, deeply dividing humanity. 

Unknowingly leading their oppressors to Earth, the aliens, along with their human allies, struggle to mount an effective defense.

Now, humanity's only hope lies with a mysterious group known as the Exilium!

 

LATEST: We've reached our stretch goal which means some very cool bonuses for all our backers!

 

 

Hi! I'm Ben Slabak, the creator/writer of EXILIUM. I have been writing and producing comics since 2014 and EXILIUM happens to be one of my favourite stories I have written, borne out of love for sci-fi and space opera classics such as Star Trek, Battlestar Galactica, Stargate, Firefly, and others. 

Since concluding a successful Kickstarter campaign on May 7, we have received a whole bunch of queries from latecomers and those who missed the campaign wishing to pledge. In addition, since launching the Kickstarter in April, the Australian dollar had dipped further against the US dollar, meaning that all our production costs, which are in USD, would increase as a result. So we've turned to Indiegogo in order to give those who missed the Kickstarter an opportunity to get their hands on some Exilium goodies, and for this purpose, we've created several new rewards including the Indiegogo-exclusive signed trading card and postcard that will be included with each physical graphic novel.

If you think EXILIUM is just another alien invasion story - think again! Within the world of EXILIUM there lies an ominous secret - a deep-seated mystery spanning several generations, slowly unravelled by the heroic trio of Nia, Tr'u, and Ken, as they risk everything to try and save humanity from annihilation. Packed with action, drama, space battles, and sprinkled with some lighter moments and humor.

The funds raised from the campaign will be used to cover the cost of printing the 200-page graphic novel, both for the campaign reward fulfilment as well as for distribution to comic and book shops and direct sales. We have some great rewards, including some exclusive to Indiegogo.

 

 

 

"This book instantly absorbs you into its vibrant world then leaves you gasping for more."   - 4 Guys and a Comic

"EXILIUM is truly one of Alterna's top titles for 2018." - Mike Rogers, Bleeding Fool

"Sci-Fi masterpiece." - DC Fans United

"EXILIUM is something of a love letter to old-school fans of Science Fiction... It’s a fun read with lots of potential - a high recommendation for Sci-Fi fans." - Phillip Pratt, Bounding Into Comics

 

 

 

You will have an opportunity to pick up some great EXILIUM rewards such as the physical and digital copies the EXILIUM graphic novel; a 6-inch resin action figure of the fan-favorite character TR'U; as well as the entire EXILIUM six-issue Alterna newsprint series.

Included with each physical tier is this very cool, Indiegogo-exclusive trading card, produced specifically for this campaign and will not be available outside of it.

 

For those into action/adventure à la Indiana Jones or National Treasure, or historical action stories, we have a digital book lovers bundle consisting of other comic books written and created by Ben Slabak, including Trail issues #1-6, Trail: New World #1-2, Terminus A Quo #1, and 1566 A.D. - The Prologue.

6-inch resin figure of the EXILIUM character TR'U also available as a reward

 

 

 

The risk with this particular campaign is very low since the EXILIUM graphic novel is 100% complete. We will be using reliable printers where we don't anticipate any major issues and we fully expect to ship the rewards as stated. However, if we do run into any unforeseen circumstances, we'll certainly endeavour to remedy them at the soonest to ensure that you receive your rewards in a timely manner. As you can see above, we already have a proof copy of the EXILIUM graphic novel and it's looking fantastic!

As you can see above, we already have a proof copy of the EXILIUM graphic novel and it's looking fantastic!

story:
Meanwhile...: The best anthology you've never heard of!

The collected Meanwhile... is a 220-page full-colour anthology bringing together the first four issues of the acclaimed series, with groundbreaking storytelling by:

Gary Spencer Millidge

David Hine

Mark Stafford

Yuko Rabbit

Chris Geary

Fionnula Doran

Bridget Mayne

Sean Bright

Sally Jane Thompson

Krystian Garstkowiak

Krent Able

Jenny Robins

Euan Cook

Frances Castle

ILYA

Rainbow Buddy

Thierry Labrosse

Darryl Cunningham

This project is to raise the funds for production and distribution of the collected edition of Meanwhile... #1-4.

 

The collected edition of Meanwhile...

220 pages, full colour 165 x 235mm, perfect bound

Retail price: £19.99

The Ethos of Meanwhile...

Originally launched in 1998 as a black and white anthology, we relaunched Meanwhile... in 2015 because we wanted to demonstrate the astonishing diversity of storytelling possible with comics. Each issue is a mixture of ongoing episodes (Strangehaven, The Bad Bad Place, 10 Minutes) and self-contained stories (Heavy, Melody Baker, Inc., Sonnet 18, etc) featuring creators from the UK, Canada, USA, China, Japan, and Poland. 

The first four issues of Meanwhile... were 52 pages long, and featured the relaunch of Strangehaven by Gary Spencer Millidge, and a brand new series, The Bad Bad Place by David Hine and Mark Stafford, which has been released as a graphic novel. 

Praise for Meanwhile...

“With its enticing smorgasbord of styles and approaches to the comics form,

Meanwhile… is a veritable feast of diverse creative visions. Soaring Penguin have

embraced one of the great traditions of the medium – the anthology comic – and

given it a relevant, contemporary, and invigorating voice.”

- Andy Oliver, Broken Frontier

 

"...offers us some impressive creators and strips."

- Antony Esmond, Downthetubes.net

 

"Meanwhile... is going to be hard to find... but you are going to have to make this your mission. It will be worth it."

- Rich Johnston, Bleeding Cool

 

"It’s honestly a toss-up between Meanwhile… and the relaunch of Dark Horse Presents for Best Anthology of 2014."

- Nevs Coleman, FA - the Comiczine

 

A glimpse inside 

The Covers

Meanwhile... 1 by Gary Spencer Millidge

Meanwhile... 2 by Mark Stafford

Meanwhile... 3 by ILYA and Rainbow Buddy

Meanwhile... 4 by Darryl Cunningham

This collected edition by Sally Jane Thompson

Sally's cover is still under wraps but will be revealed soon. (We have the thumbnails, though and it's going to be terrific!)

 

The Bookplates

Bookplate 1 by Krent Able

Bookplate 2 by Gary Spencer Millidge

Risks and Challenges

Apart from the forward and the cover, the book is complete. We're printing a collected edition so that it's suitable for selling in bookstores. We think the stories here are terrific and we want more people to read them. The only risk is that this campaign falls short of our goal, in which case we print fewer copies, and we're unable to give the creators an additional payment for their efforts.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some of you are not able to support this collected edtion by contributing money. It's possible you already have the individual issues, or that you've already received a PDF through other channels. We're okay with that. One of the most important ways you can support this project is by sharing this campaign with your friends and other passionate comic book fans! Share this campaign on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram or talk it up at your Local Comic Shop.
story_txt:
Meanwhile...: The best anthology you've never heard of!The collected Meanwhile... is a 220-page full-colour anthology bringing together the first four issues of the acclaimed series, with groundbreaking storytelling by:Gary Spencer MillidgeDavid HineMark StaffordYuko RabbitChris GearyFionnula DoranBridget MayneSean BrightSally Jane ThompsonKrystian GarstkowiakKrent AbleJenny RobinsEuan CookFrances CastleILYARainbow BuddyThierry LabrosseDarryl CunninghamThis project is to raise the funds for production and distribution of the collected edition of Meanwhile... #1-4. The collected edition of Meanwhile...220 pages, full colour 165 x 235mm, perfect boundRetail price: £19.99The Ethos of Meanwhile...
Originally launched in 1998 as a black and white anthology, we relaunched Meanwhile... in 2015 because we wanted to demonstrate the astonishing diversity of storytelling possible with comics. Each issue is a mixture of ongoing episodes (Strangehaven, The Bad Bad Place, 10 Minutes) and self-contained stories (Heavy, Melody Baker, Inc., Sonnet 18, etc) featuring creators from the UK, Canada, USA, China, Japan, and Poland. The first four issues of Meanwhile... were 52 pages long, and featured the relaunch of Strangehaven by Gary Spencer Millidge, and a brand new series, The Bad Bad Place by David Hine and Mark Stafford, which has been released as a graphic novel. Praise for Meanwhile...
“With its enticing smorgasbord of styles and approaches to the comics form,Meanwhile… is a veritable feast of diverse creative visions. Soaring Penguin haveembraced one of the great traditions of the medium – the anthology comic – andgiven it a relevant, contemporary, and invigorating voice.”- Andy Oliver, Broken Frontier "...offers us some impressive creators and strips."- Antony Esmond, Downthetubes.net "Meanwhile... is going to be hard to find... but you are going to have to make this your mission. story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
STRYDE

Follow the story of Vincent Patterson AKA Stryde, he's a sidekick to Cobalt. While the city of Denver see's Cobalt as a hero, Vincent finds out he is almost as corrupt as the people they are throwing in prison. This causes Stryde to eventually quit his life of crime fighting and pursue other things. Years later and Vincent is pulled back into the fight by Cobalt when a mysterious organization called The Underworld settles in their town. 

ASCENSION

Stryde: Ascension is the finale to Vincent's Stryde. It's a giant sized issue, with it being well over 30 pages, it makes it bigger than my previous two issues COMBINED. The majority of the story takes place in The Underworld, with Stryde and Cobalt taking on the villains Animus and Romulus. This issue is very action packed, so expect very fun interactions with these villains. This specific issue tackles the important side of being a hero that hasn't really been touched on in mainstream comics. 

FULL STORY

Stryde: Full Story is the entire story of Vincent's Stryde. It has taken years but the entire story of Vincent's Stryde is in one book. It follows Vincent as a kid, to sidekick, all the way to and adult with a kid of his own. This character has tons of heart and I wanted to make an accessible story about a hero's entire career.

PERKS

All backers will be getting their name in the comic with the purchase of any perk.

Stryde: Ascension Digital Copy: For 4 USD get the digital copy of our latest issue of Stryde AND all the previous issues sent digitally to your email. 

Stryde: Ascension Physical Copy: For 8 USD get the final issue of Vincent's Stryde AND all the previous issues sent digitally to your email, also comes with a sticker! New to Stryde? No worries, you will be emailed the previous issues digitally.

Stryde: Full Story: For 19 USD get the entire story of Vincent's Stryde. This contains Origin, Underworld, and Ascension all in one book, also comes with a sticker!

Stryde: Full Story (ZHC Variant): The same exact content as Stryde: Full Story but instead it has a cover drawn by Zach Hsieh. Back in 2016 he drew the first cover for Stryde, it'll now be a variant to bring this journey full circle.

Get Drawn in the comic (Limited): For 50 USD get DRAWN in the comic, this also comes with Stryde: Full Story and a sticker!

Giant Bundle(Limited): For 75 USD get DRAWN in the comic, this also comes with Stryde: Full story, Variant, and Ascension. Also comes with a sticker.

Producer Bundle (Limited): For 100 USD get DRAWN in the comic, this comes with everything the giant bundle has to offer. The cool thing is you get a producer credit, your name is on the front cover alongside mine.

WHY BACK THIS PROJECT?

You could brush this story off as just another superhero story. But if you take a chance on it, you'll see that it's a very interesting take on the hero and sidekick genre. This is far away from Batman and Robin, imaging if Punisher had a sidekick is a more accurate comparison!

STRETCH GOALS

1000 USD: A few additional pages get added to Stryde: Ascension.

1500 USD: Ever physical backer get an additional sticker.

2000 USD: Young Stryde and Cobalt flashback added.

2500 USD: Stryde Magnet added to all physical copy backers.

3000 USD: Mini Stryde Poster given to all physical copy backers.

THANK YOU

While money is always an issue, I'm just happy to be able to finish my mini series on Vincent's Stryde. It took literal years of setbacks and cancellations but through perseverance here we are! Any amount is appreciated as we look to end on a high note. Even if the comic doesn't make enough funds I still plan on getting it out. I also have 2 successful campaigns on my back as proof that I will get this comic in your hands.

Random Artwork from the project:

story:
Short Summary

Hello Everyone!  I'm Art Thibert, and welcome to my Black and White Vol. 1 Second Chance campaign.  Because many of you missed the original IGG campaign, I wanted to make sure you had a chance at grabbing a copy of this exciting graphic novel for your own.  

To celebrate, I've penciled and inked a new piece of Black and White artwork that is going to be made into a bombastic oversize poster.  This poster has colors done by the ever exceptional colorist Kyle Ritter!

We have the original cover, the limited Greg Capullo variant cover and/or the Vampirella graphic novel with a cover that highlights the Vampirella and Black & White anniversaries for you to choose from!  Each tier comes with a Black & White 25th Anniversary Trading Card.  Also, these books are printed and ready to ship now!

                                                       TOTAL ANNIHILATION TIME, BABY!

Black & Whie Vol. 1 is a 54-page graphic novel and is square bound.  Also, the book is printed on upgraded interior and cover paper.  

Inside Pages

     ORIGINAL GREG CAPULLO VARIANT                NEW GREG CAPULLO VIRGIN COVER

You asked for it -- we listened!  Because of the limited print run on the original Greg Capullo variant cover, we are close to running out of these awesome covers.  We thought (since you have asked -- and since this campaign is all about second chances!)  that we would offer this new virgin variant cover.  It's available as both a tier and as an add-on at checkout. 

ORIGINAL CAMPAIGN GOODIES

Find these awesome goodies in either the Killer Bot Tier or as an Add-On item.

story:
We hold no secrets, we share all knowledge. This is how we survive.

Somewhere deep within the mountain lives The Mother, and The Mother gives life to all R'K'Hola. They break away from the mountain every day, supplying it with water and food, gathering information from other creatures on Druss, and protecting The Mother from harm.

Today Oktaz went out for water, avoiding the gigantic Hydraki birds who break them up for nesting material. That is until he hears a scream for help nearby...

Life On Cora - Oktaz Climbs, is a 32 page standalone story on the world of Cora, and the third in this series. The comic is done at the launch of this campaign and are pretty much ready to print!

Read the first 8 pages here: https://tapas.io/episode/2063121

Cora is a blue orb making its way through the universe, its blue light pulsing warmth in the desolate vastness of space, with continents orbiting around it like planets around a sun. A single gigantic cloud supplies the creatures living on these continents their water, and life thrives in this improbable world.

You can read the first two issues of Life On Cora for free here:

https://tapas.io/series/Life-on-Cora

Life On Cora #1 and #2 are available as add-ons as well.

 

Check out the original art and original page tour by Mike Jimmy here! Going over all pages in Life on Cora #3, together with tons of concept art of all kinds.

 
 

Main cover

Stone Surfer - Pebbles In Peril

 

 

 

UNLOCKED!

LOCKED!

 

Shipping:

  • Netherlands: €7
  • European Union: €9
  • Rest of the World: €23

 

Faeries and Ents has finished several issues already with this series and other ones, and has organized two successful comic anthologies, and we think we're fully capable of bringing this project to completion within the given time frame. The comic pages are all done and only a few still need to be colored at the start of this campaign.

story:
God forgives... HE DOESN'T!

SIX-GUN GORILLA is the epic saga of a pistol-packing Silverback and his quest for vengeance. Prepare yourself for the strangest, most startling Old West hero of them all!

Back by popular demand! Our last campaign was the surprise hit of 2019. In 2020 we at Team Six-Gun are cranking things up several notches. Here's what we've got for you:

  • The original SIX-GUN GORILLA: LONG DAYS OF VENGEANCE 148 page graphic novel  collecting chapters #1-#6, signed by the author, now with a stunning variant cover by Canaan White.
  • The latest 24 page chapter/issue in the series, THE BIG GUNDOWN signed by the author.
  • You have the option to buy just the LONG DAYS OF VENGEANCE graphic novel or THE BIG GUNDOWN by themselves. Buy them together, I knock $5 bucks off the price.

 

It all begins with SIX-GUN GORILLA: LONG DAYS OF VENGEANCE is 148 pages of critically acclaimed escapist Pulp adventure full of epic gun-fights, tense showdowns, saloon brawls, horse chases, and righteous payback!

 


And check out this killer cover gallery featuring a variety of amazing talents:

Wes Huffor

Chadwick Haverland

The saga continues in SIX-GUN GORILLA: THE BIG GUNDOWN, 24 pages of adventure and carnage. Our heroes finally take the fight to bad guys and a battle ensues that will make the local undertaker a very busy man! It ain't called THE BIG GUNDOWN for nothin'!

And now all orders will come with this wicked cool bitchin' STICKER by Mark Marianelli!

 

East Congo, 1849:  A baby gorilla is orphaned when a big-game hunter slaughters his entire tribe.  Placed aboard a boat to Europe, a kindly circus owner, Malloy, wins him in a card game and raises him like a son next to his daughter, Abigail, who names the tiny simian Kumba (an African word for "roar"),

Texas, 1866. Kumba has grown to maturity and become the star attraction of Professor Malloy's Traveling Circus, putting on a spectacular show as the most novel trick shot artist West of the Pecos, the Six-Gun Gorilla! Abigail and Kumba yearn to see the big cities in the East, but Malloy wants to put as much space as possible between them and the Civil War.

The war, however, comes to them in the form of Giuliano Schmidt, a Union spy wounded and on the run from hired gun Gravesend and his gang of cut-throats. When Gravesend discovers that Malloy and his circus family have been helping Schmidt, he exacts a terrible revenge. Now Kumba takes up his guns and sets out on the vengeance trail, a journey that will lead him to unexpected places, old friends and a conspiracy that could change the course of history.

One of the true unexpected pleasures of this project has been the response of the critics. I had a feeling that some of them would really get a kick out of the book, but I didn't expect this level of love:

"It don't get much better than this, Pal. A rootin--tootin' six-gun shootin', Western adventure that makes me run off at the adjectives. Wonderful stuff." - JOE R. LANSDALE (author of Bubba Ho-Tep , Hap and Leonard and Cold In July)

“...it has real weight and emotion… a well-crafted western that just happens to have a gun-toting gorilla as the main character. If you like westerns, gorillas, crazy concepts, or just plain ol’ good comics, then this is one worth checking out.” - COMIC BOOK THERAPY

“Hats off to creators Brian Christgau and Adrian Sibar (whose art on this book is just magnificent!) because they have created a very compelling world.” - CRUSTULA.COM

"Who can say no to a well-executed western starring a ferocious six-gun wielding simian? ...a really good comic-book." - THE COMIC AGE

“Christgau’s story is setting itself up to be a fantastic reimagining of a lost classic, and one worth keeping an eye on.” - SUPER ATOMICA

“Together with artist Adrian Sibar, writer Brian Christgau has revised and changed-up the classic Six-Gun Gorilla pulp tale, blending it with beloved old school western cinematic tropes that make it an ingenious cross between Clint Eastwood’s Pale Rider and a wild Twilight Zone episode.” - NERDVANA

“Read this comic book. I’m dead serious. Find it, buy it, and enjoy how Six-Gun Gorilla: Long Days of Vengeance succeeds as any good comic book should.” - COMIC BASTARDS

“…a well-crafted western that just happens to have a gun-toting gorilla as the main character. If you like westerns, gorillas, crazy concepts, or just plain ol’ good comics, then this is one worth checking out.” - COMIC BOOK THERAPY

"...a work of art that pushes the classic notions of a true western with modern ideals and updated storytelling providing a cohesive product that is a ride to read and pleasure to look at." - - PULP CULTURED

“…an indie book that deserves to play with the big boys.” - GEEKASM

 

And coming soon, the epic #ComicsGate DOC ALPHA/DOC SALEM/SIX-GUN GORILLA crossover:

 

And coming in the next campaign, a 3-D printed Six-Gun Gorilla statuette!

“Hats off to creators Brian Christgau and Adrian Sibar (whose art on this book is just magnificent!) because they have created a very compelling world.” - CRUSTULA.COM
"Who can say no to a well-executed western starring a ferocious six-gun wielding simian? ...a really good comic-book." - THE COMIC AGE
“Christgau’s story is setting itself up to be a fantastic reimagining of a lost classic, and one worth keeping an eye on.” - SUPER ATOMICA
“Together with artist Adrian Sibar, writer Brian Christgau has revised and changed-up the classic Six-Gun Gorilla pulp tale, blending it with beloved old school western cinematic tropes that make it an ingenious cross between Clint Eastwood’s Pale Rider and a wild Twilight Zone episode.” - NERDVANA
“Read this comic book. I’m dead serious. Find it, buy it, and enjoy how Six-Gun Gorilla: Long Days of Vengeance succeeds as any good comic book should.” - COMIC BASTARDS
“…a well-crafted western that just happens to have a gun-toting gorilla as the main character. If you like westerns, gorillas, crazy concepts, or just plain ol’ good comics, then this is one worth checking out.” - COMIC BOOK THERAPY
"...a work of art that pushes the classic notions of a true western with modern ideals and updated storytelling providing a cohesive product that is a ride to read and pleasure to look at." - - PULP CULTURED
“…an indie book that deserves to play with the big boys.” - GEEKASM
 
And coming soon, the epic #ComicsGate DOC ALPHA/DOC SALEM/SIX-GUN GORILLA crossover:

 
And coming in the next campaign, a 3-D printed Six-Gun Gorilla statuette!

story:
Overview

TALES FROM THE CLASSROOM is a fun-packed postmortem romp following everyone’s favorite teenage Zombie, Rob Muerto, as he struggles to adapt to his new school. 

Back in Romero (his previous, all-Zombie high school) Rob used to be the coolest, most popular kid around. But when he transfers to K. Thulhu High — a multi-species school whose students include Vampires, Wolfmen and everything in between — he must come to terms with being at the bottom of the proverbial social heap.

Not only that, he has to contend with the ruthless bullying of Drake, a Nosferatu who also happens to be the most popular kid in K. Thulhu.

  • First installment of a potentially ongoing series.
  • 41 pages of top-caliber art by Sebastián Bronico (pencils), Juan Castro (inks), and Matias Laborde (colors). 
  • Meticulously lettered by the great Lucas Gattoni.
  • High quality print job, featuring 70.lb gloss paper stock pages and foil stamp cover.

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

 

TALES FROM THE CLASSROOM was originally scheduled to release all the way back in 2010 through a well-known independent publisher. Sadly, the publisher since dismantled and the project fell through. But it's now back, stronger than ever!

All 41-pages are pencilled, inked, colored and lettered -- the book is done! We just need to raise enough to cover printing and shipping costs. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Random Class Photo

Leg Day

Bad Hair Day

P.E. Class w/ Coach Frank

Meet the Muertos

Movie Night

Detention

Principal Kong's Office

 

 

​

 

Rob Muerto has been wanting to tell this story ever since he clawed out of the grave and got the first whiffs of putrescine on his own rotting corpse. As a Zombie, or "pulse-challenged individual", he has fought to have his voice heard in a world populated with monsters of all shapes, creeds, and sizes -- all of whom seem to think Zombies are beneath them. Rob has honed his writing skills on roughly 15.3K Twitter posts, 253 Reddit threads, and various other message boards. He received a B- in his creative writing course, the most any monster of his kind has gotten. When he's not writing stories, you're likely to find him out in a landfill, sipping on frozen brain drips and basking in the sun. 

Sebastián Bronico is an illustrator, comic artist and designer from Buenos Aires, Argentina. His first work in the industry was as a background artist and background inker for “Joan”, the Italian series written by legendary South-American author Robin Wood, and pencilled by Carlos Pedrazzini for Aurea Editoriale. He then became head-penciler for Beware of the Art, a team of artists and writers that developed content for major publishing houses and media developers like Radical Comics, Viper Comics, Edilingua and Minimoko; also providing artistic assets for solo projects like David Hine’s “Ryder on the Storm” and Kirker Butler’s “Blue Agave and Worm”. Since 2014 he is working for major houses in Argentina like Media Business, ENERC, Zarek and Public Television doing storyboarding, advertising, character design and conceptual art. He had two gallery openings, one in Centro Cultural Recoleta with the CompArte assembly and the other in Centro Cultural Borges with the ExpoArtistas assembly. He lives with Victoria, his beloved Female Fury, and Mangudai, his pan-dimensional Shar Pei.

Juan Castro is a professional inker from Tijuana, Mexico with over 10 years of experience in the industry. He has worked on many high-profile titles, including "Arrow" , "Aquaman", "Wonder Woman" , "G.I. Joe" , and "Transformers", for publishers like DC Comics , Image, IDW, Dark Horse, Valiant, and more...

Matias Laborde hails from Buenos Aires, Argentina but is currently based in Berlin, Germany. He is an experienced and versatile artist—and all around nice guy—who has worked on everything from coloring titles for BOOM! Studios (WWE) to working as senior artist for major videogame companies. 

Lucas Gattoni Lucas Gattoni is a seasoned graphic designer and typesetter now pursuing his dream job of comic book lettering. He's bringing over to this medium over fifteen years of professionalism and a lifetime passion for storytelling. His work has been published in Mike Wieringo Tribute Tellos v2, Eskimo Kisses (Scout Comics) & Ghost Thunder Presents #2 among many other indie publications. He lives in his home country of Argentina with his husband and their four unnamed goldfish (oops, make that three now).

 

 

 

 

$3.000 - 2 Page comic with art by TaD Lambert is included with every copy of TALES FROM THE CLASSROOM

 

$5.000 - Production of TALES FROM THE CLASSROOM - PART II is unlocked and fast-tracked.

 

$10.000 - A fear-inspiring TALES FROM THE CLASSROOM bookmark is included with every physical copy perk tier. 

 

$12.000 - Unlocks additional perk tier featuring a wicked TALES FROM THE CLASSROOM poster!

 

$15.000 -  Unlocks additional perk tier featuring a bone-chilling t-shirt of everyone’s favorite teenage Zombie, ROB MUERTO!

 

$20.000 - ?????

story:
Every backer gets a FREE bookmark!

 

DRAGONRAGE is 100% completed,

full color on-going comic series, 36 interior pages with  a BONUS 5 page back story.

 

 

JAS SINGH Exclusive CampaignCover!

DAVID FINCH Cover

JIMMY REYES Variant Cover 

JAS SINGH Variant Cover

 

 

 

 

 

Nuri was an orphan and a field servant for the kingdom of Blackcliff. Now she’s a young woman, adjusting to a more comfortable lifestyle as a weapon of the monarchy.

But the surrounding kingdoms don’t want to live in the shadow of a dragon. And when Nuri begins to learn the truth about her past, she realizes she may be a danger to the very people she’s trying to protect.

 

We're already working on the next Issue.

 

Second Chance!!!

That's right, you lucky devils! We're running a Second Chance campaign for DragonRage: A Cradle of Embers, the super-sexy, ultra cool comic from Page One Comics! Maybe you missed out on the first campaign 'cuz you thought, "There's no way they'll only run 30 days," and then we stuck to our guns and YOU MISSED IT! Or, maybe you heard the hype from your friends, the hip ones, you know, the ones who got an EXCLUSIVE cover by David Finch! And you got all bummed out because YOU didn't get the most bad-ass comic on Indiegogo! Well, buckle up, amigos - we're BRINGING IT BACK!

 

What We Need & What You Get

Simply put: We need the funds to bring you more AWESOME comics.

When we launched the first campaign, we had no idea how much of a buzz it would create.  And we want to keep buzzing! We have issue two of DragonRage in the works and other stories in development, so help us get those in your hands!

When you contribute to this Second Chance campaign for DragonRage, you're getting your choice among three BRAND NEW cover variants by Jimmy Reyes and Jas Singh! Plus, you'll get three new pages of fan art, contributed by all you fabulous Page Onesies out there! (I don't know if that name will stick, but we're going with it for now!) Aaaaaaand, we're giving you a SNEAK PREVIEW of issue two of DragonRage! You win all the way around!

 

Just a few of the many Unboxing Videos:

DAVID FINCH
COMIC BOOK BOB

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Here's the BEST part: There are ZERO risks here, because the challenges have all been overcome! That's right; all the hard work has been done! This comic is complete! All we have to do is print it, package it, and put it in your hands!

Other Ways You Can Help

Take a look at the perks we're offering. If you see something you like, get it! If you think somebody else might like what we're doing, tell them about it! Get the word out! Visit our website, follow us on social media, and be a part of our Saturday livestreams on YouTube! Page One Comics is about you, so come be a part of the family!

 

See The Sparks Comic DragonRage Review:

story:
Vi förlängde med 3 dagar samt lade till fler livestreams och addons! Addons finner du i nästa steg efter att du valt en perk.

Nosebleed Studio är Sveriges främsta mangatecknarkollektiv och idag ett av bara två förlag som fortsätter ge ut manga på svenska.

Vi har funnits sedan 2006 och har utvecklats från ett nätverk av serieskapare som tecknar svensk manga och gör lite egna seriefansin till ett ordentligt förlag med distribution till bokhandlar och bibliotek landet över!

Om 2020 have varit ett helt vanligt år så hade vi, liksom många andra bokförlag, just nu planerat vår närvaro på Bokmässan i Göteborg. Vi hade flera kul saker vi ville släppa där, men så blev det inte. Istället sitter vi alla hemma.  Därför håller vi denna kampanj, så att alla gamla och nya fans av Nosebleed Studio kan få tag på färsk svensk manga och bra deals, precis som ni skulle kunnat i vår monter på Bokmässan! Och nu kan ni dessutom göra det från er dator hemifrån, så praktiskt!

Denna korta kampanj är alltså inte en insamling för att producera en specifik bok, utan mer en chans för er fans att tillsammans känna att ni "besöker" vår digitala monter, istället för på Bokmässan. Här, under bara denna vecka, kan ni:

  • Köpa manga till specialpriser!
  • Få tag på signerade böcker och originalbilder!
  • Hitta våra nyaste nyheter!

Vi kommer också ha ett gäng direktsända teckningssessioner och samtal på vår Youtube-kanal, så att det verkligen känns som att ni får träffa oss, ställa frågor och se oss rita! Se schemat längre ner.

 

Nytt från Nosebleed Studio!

Nosebleed Manga Club 
Den 14:e oktober släpper vi Sveriges första mangaläsarapp! Här ska du inte bara kunna läsa alla våra egna mangaserier (över 2500 sidor!) utan dessutom kommer vi från och med november börja släppa nytt material i appen. Vi håller redan på att köpa in utländska mangaserier av hög kvalité, serier som inte ens finns på engelska ännu. Appen kommer ha ålderskategorier och som förälder kan du skapa ett konto till ditt barn och ställa in rätt ålder.

Med denna prenummerationstjänst kan du hela tiden få det senaste som släpps från oss direkt i din mobil eller läsplatta, och behöver inte längre vänta ett år på nästa bok. Appen kommer ha vissa gratisserier (t.ex. första kapitel på längre serier) men vill man ha alla serierna obegränsat så kommer den kosta 39 kr/månad eller 399 kr/år. Vi kommer garanterat fylla på med minst 50 sidor i månaden!

I denna kampanj kan du köpa en rabatterad årsprenummeration för bara 350 kr!

Penguin Rumble bok 4
Den spännande sista delen i Joakim Wallers humoristiska äventyrsserie om Erika som börjar jobba på det futuristiska djurpensionatet Noak Park i Stockholm, och upptäcker att hon kan tala med djuren där! I denna avslutande volym får du äntligen se hur det går för Erika och hela Noaks Park, en actionladdad upplösning med flera överraskningar! Hela serien passar läsare från 6 år och uppåt, men är kul för vuxna mangaläsare likväl.

I denna kampanj kan du köpa bok 4 signerad, eller hela serien för bara 350 kr!


Förhandstitt från Penguin Rumble 4, där vi äntligen får läsa slutet på serien!

 

Våra specialdeals!

I denna tabell kan du se vilka saker du får i varje paket:


 

 

Nosebleed Studio Live!

På vår Youtube-kanal kommer ni kunna se följande direktsända evenemang! Missa inte chansen att delta i chatten och ställa frågor. Klippen kommer även att dyka upp i efterhand på kanalen.

Här är direktlänkar till varje livestream, schemalagda så att du kan ställ in en påminnelse!
1/9: Magnolia "Toffuo" Winroth livetecknar
2/9: Joakim Waller livetecknar
3/9: Nosebleed Studio Live! - Panelsamtal om appen!
4/9: Natalia Batista livetecknar
5/9: Felix Östergård livetecknar
7/9: Natalia Batista livetecknar
8/9: Magnolia "Toffuo" Winroth livetecknar
