story:
About Us:

Rhys here, for Ideal Comics. 

The Ideal Comics crew has been making super-hero, horror, and comedy comics (all set in our shared universe), since 2006; but this is our first crowd funding. We are excited to bring you along with us as we share an unsung adventure from one of the first characters we created!

Our universe is full of superheroes, demons, monsters, and aliens intersecting in a world as down-to-earth as it is fantastic. Tales of Shadow:  Sola Voce is a story that crosses many of those intersections, and we are stoked to bring it to you. 

Unfortunately in 2020, our original penciller became unable to continue, and so we had to start over with are from page one. I am providing the words for art by Barry Tetz.

 

What We Need & What You Get

And what are we offering? Twenty-eight full color pages of monsters and mystery starring The Expositioner and some unexpected friends! Part procedural, part action, with character drama mixed, if you love classic comics of crime-solving and head busting, Tales of Shadow: Sola Voce is for you!

But that's not all! Every physical copy will come included with a centerfold poster by our team.

(not the final poster)

Additionally, we will be producing a nine card set of Ideal Comics trading cards. These cards will feature characters from the "VoX Populi" miniseries, as well as from our greater universe; and will feature art from Barry Tetz, Rico Cobos, and Peter Simeti

     

Higher levels will also get a special in-universe ashcan that will be a separate, stand alone story!

 

The Impact

While we have been making indie comics for print and the web for almost 15 years, we are excited to stretch our legs on this platform. Social Media is a whole  new world than existed when we began, and we have met so many great folks out there and hope you will come alongside us to create something great.

Tales of Shadow: Sola Voce is a story that we have not seen much of in comics these days--a genuine detective story paired with all the over the top action that make super-heroes beloved. We believe their is a gap today's market for that kind of story, and we want to meet that demand!

Risks & Challenges

We are asking $2000 for this project, which will cover our printing costs, give a little something for our team, and a nest egg to start Issue 2.

We are very excited for this project! So excited that we are running it on a shoe string! We want to get the comic into your hands! We want to hear you all talking about Expositioner around the water cooler! We believe so much in this project that we are committed to fulfillment! We are running a flexible funding campaign, which means Indiegogo will disperse funds if we cross $500. Our commitment to you is to get out your books even if we don't net a dime. We are working behind the scenes to get you your copy in March 2020!

Other Ways You Can Help

We have tried to incorporate awards at many levels--something for everyone! But life is tough for everyone, we get that. If you believe in what we are doing, and you just can't afford to get our books, please be part of the dream!

  • Get the word out and make some noise about Sola Voce and Ideal Comics.
  • Hit that link and share this Indiegogo!

 

Progress So Far!

As we complete new pages, we will post low res versions here!
story_txt:
About Us:
Rhys here, for Ideal Comics. 
The Ideal Comics crew has been making super-hero, horror, and comedy comics (all set in our shared universe), since 2006; but this is our first crowd funding. We are excited to bring you along with us as we share an unsung adventure from one of the first characters we created!Our universe is full of superheroes, demons, monsters, and aliens intersecting in a world as down-to-earth as it is fantastic. Tales of Shadow:  Sola Voce is a story that crosses many of those intersections, and we are stoked to bring it to you. 
Unfortunately in 2020, our original penciller became unable to continue, and so we had to start over with are from page one. I am providing the words for art by Barry Tetz.
 

What We Need & What You Get
And what are we offering? Twenty-eight full color pages of monsters and mystery starring The Expositioner and some unexpected friends! Part procedural, part action, with character drama mixed, if you love classic comics of crime-solving and head busting, Tales of Shadow: Sola Voce is for you!
But that's not all! Every physical copy will come included with a centerfold poster by our team.

(not the final poster)
Additionally, we will be producing a nine card set of Ideal Comics trading cards. These cards will feature characters from the "VoX Populi" miniseries, as well as from our greater universe; and will feature art from Barry Tetz, Rico Cobos, and Peter Simeti
     
Higher levels will also get a special in-universe ashcan that will be a separate, stand alone story!
 
The Impact
While we have been making indie comics for print and the web for almost 15 years, we are excited to stretch our legs on this platform. Social Media is a whole  new world than existed when we began, and we have met so many great folks out there and hope you will come alongside us to create something great.
Tales of Shadow: Sola Voce is a story that we have not seen much of in comics these days--a genuine detective story paired with all the over the top action that make super-heroes beloved. We believe their is a gap today's market for that kind of story, and we want to meet that demand!

Risks & Challenges
We are asking $2000 for this project, which will cover our printing costs, give a little something for our team, and a nest egg to start Issue 2.
We are very excited for this project! So excited that we are running it on a shoe string! We want to get the comic into your hands! We want to hear you all talking about Expositioner around the water cooler! We believe so much in this project that we are committed to fulfillment! We are running a flexible funding campaign, which means Indiegogo will disperse funds if we cross $500. Our commitment to you is to get out your books even if we don't net a dime. We are working behind the scenes to get you your copy in March 2020!

Other Ways You Can Help
We have tried to incorporate awards at many levels--something for everyone! But life is tough for everyone, we get that. If you believe in what we are doing, and you just can't afford to get our books, please be part of the dream!

Get the word out and make some noise about Sola Voce and Ideal Comics.
Hit that link and share this Indiegogo!

 
Progress So Far!
As we complete new pages, we will post low res versions here!

story:
Get ready for the next installment of Richard Boom's instant Kickstarter success, "SISTERHOOD"! 

Love & Betrayal in a solo-issues as Gwynn takes center stage and combats Nazi Werewolves in a fight till the death - all in ONE intense issue. No nudity... just loads of fun, amazing art and a story that will make you shed a tear, for sure!

 

SISTERHOOD is a series of  one-shot, stand-alone stories. Each comicbook will feature different artists, to ensure not only a high quality but also creating a platform  for outstanding artists.

ISSUE THREE: a 32-page story book, with 115 grams interior pages and perhaps even a cardstock cover to some covers, yet to be established! 

Story is by J.L. Fox with stunning art by international artist Vinz El Tab (Upperdeck, Crow, Alien, Zenescope’s Wonderland and Coffin Comics' Lady Death).

ISSUE ONE: the origin issue in which we saw the rising of the Sisterhood,  the introduction of the Khepri god/computer and during a new adventure Sisterhoods leader Rand is shown to share his mind with Dymonos! 

You can order this as an Add-On. Check FAQ and PM me if you want a complete collection.

ISSUE TWO: High-priest Dymonos makes a heart-wrenching  discovery that not only lets him question his loyalty towards his  master, the mighty god Khepri, but also sets him on a path of righteous  revenge and destruction. 

You can order this as an Add-On. Check FAQ and PM me if you want a complete collection.

Don't miss out on the THIRD oneshot issue of a series that has received high praise from fans and industry professionals alike. Just a few words from special friends!

 o and remember!! Everyone will get a FREE trading card from the start!!!

art by Markus von Renthe-Fink, artist/writer/magician to Sisterhood #2

7 Variants, 6 foil and 6 metal covers

Covers by Vinz el Tabanas, Stef Wilson (hommage to Frazetta), cosplay artist Cara Nicole and finally by Italian artist Vincenco Cucca (tributing Alien). All covers can be found in regular, rainbow foil or metal (real metal) versions.

Cover A:  Dancing, by Vinz El Tab, also available in Rainbow Foil and in real Metal (see video)

Cover B:  Mirrors, by Vinz El Tab, also available in Rainbow Foil and in real Metal (see video)

Cover C:  Biker Babe, by Vinz El Tab, also available in Rainbow Foil and in real Metal (see video)

Cover D:  Frazetta Hommage, by Stef Wilson, also available in Rainbow Foil and in real Metal (see video)

Cover E:  Cosplay, by Cara Nicole, also available in Rainbow Foil and in real Metal (see video)

Cover F:  Alien, by Vincenzo Cucca, also available in Rainbow Foil and in real Metal (see video)

Cover G:  Alien NSFW, by Vincenzo Cucca

Cover G is differently colored and due to the fact that Vincenzo Cucca drew this one topless originally, it will be the first ever Topless Sisterhood cover.

I cannot yet show you how the RAINBOW FOIL covers will look like in real life, since they have to be produced first, but I did produce the METAL covers, which are REALLY METAL covers!! Check the video below! > YOUTUBE

 

 

 Here is the Mockup to the Foil Covers!

Art by Vinz el Tabanas who decided to go all out on this one! Already ALL art is fully done! Only lettering is currently being done!

ALL the 32 pages have been penciled, inked and colored!!

Wanna read more? Then BUY the book :) 

REWARDS in various forms and sizes.

Regular items

  •     Sisterhood #1, 2, 3 >   digital versions
  •     Sisterhood #3 will be in regular covers, FOIL cover and yes, Metal covers!
  •     Sisterhood #3, cover A "Dancing"by Vinz El Tabanas
  •     Sisterhood #3, cover B "Mirror Shattered" by Vinz El Tabanas
  •     Sisterhood #3, cover C "Biker Babe" by Vinz El Tabanas
  •     Sisterhood #3, cover D "Cosplay" by Cara Nicole and Alfred Trujillo
  •     Sisterhood #3, cover E "Frazetta Hommage" by Stef Wilson
  •     Sisterhood #3, cover F "Alien Tribute" by Vincenzo Cucca
  •     Sisterhood #1 & #2 & #3, all cover versions > also via Add On available! And via the FULL SCORE level. Check visual  "Collect Them All" below!
  • Sisterhood Artist Edition #1 > also via Add On available! Check visual  "Collect Them All" below!
  • PRINTS (see below) with art by various (add-on for 10/each or 50 for all 9)

FUN STUFF:

  • 3D MOUSEPADS with art by Vinz El Tab, Budd Root (add-on for 20) 
  • MOUTH MASK with art by Vinz El Tab

 You can pledge on the right, or you can add-on these to your regular pledge. Check FAQ if you do not know how! 

3D Mousepads, for your weary eyes (ahum) hands!!

Mouth Masks... to sylishly protect your loved ones :)

 

ARTSY FARTSY STUFF:

Limited to a handfull, these are with Black Jewel 3D finish! Above you see Sisterhood #1, #2 and #3. Get them separately or as set!! Includes a regular cover as well.

  • Black Jewel Editions to #1, #2 and #3: separately and as set.
  • Original Art NOW by Eelco Koper 
  • Original Art NOW by Marlon Teunissen > limited spots
  • Original Art NOW by Dinesh van den Berg > limited spots
  • Original Art: Interior Pages from #1 by Diego Loiola (check below and ask for a PDF)
  • Original Art: Interior Pages from #2 by Markus von Renthe-Fink (check below and ask for a PDF)
  • Original Art: Interior Pages from #3 by Vinz El Tabanas (check above and ask for a PDF)

Pledge first, then check via Facebook or BAD-website which page you want or request a PDF from me. DIBS via PM :)

 See below!

ORIGINAL ART NOW!! Artists providing you some cool art-opportunities, via real commissions! Also Original Interior pages and covers!!

GUEST ARTISTS:

I have found 3 amazing Dutch artists who would love to contribute to spreading some love around! 

EELCO is offering fully inked pieces with a 2-character maximum. 

MARLON is offering detailed headshots in pencils. (limited to 5)

DINESH is also offering fully inked pieces with a 2-character maximum. (limited to 10)

Interior pages to #1 are now for sale!

Original pages to #2 are now for sale!

 

Add comics, add products, add prints add more!!

  • Sisterhood #1 & #2 & #3, all cover versions > also via Add On available! And via the FULL SCORE level.
  •  Sisterhood Artist Edition #1 > also via Add On available! 
  • TOWELS with art by Vinz el Tab (add-on for 40) 
  • 3D MOUSEPADS with art by Vinz El Tab, Budd Root (add-on for 20) 
  • KEY CHAINS (set) with art by Vinz El Tab (add-on for 5) 
  • MOUTH MASK with art by Vinz El Tab (add-on for 10) 
  • MAGNETS with art by Vinz El Tab (only via pledges) 
  • PRINTS (see below) with art by various (add-on for 10/each or 50 for all 9)

Check the other projects for more info. #1 has a 32 pg story, #2 has a 22+7 pg story and the Art Ed #1 is a massive 48-pager

Available Prints > (L>R) Cosplay, Ebas, Cain, Enhart, El Tabanas, Capullo, Teunissen, Grafunkel, McCaffrey

RICHARD BOOM: Project Leader/Creator

Richard Boom  started out in the comic industry as your regular  fanboy, just reading  comics and enjoying it even more due to the  internet and making contact  with creators. As his contact list grew, so  did his interest in the  complete field of comic. Starting up a Bad Grrl Comics Fan club in 2001  was the first step to go further then his own living  room. Soon  thereafter he began setting up websites for Arthur Suydam,  Eric  Basaldua, Broadsword Comics and focussing on titles like  Vampirella,  Cavewoman, Hack/Slash and more... He even started working  with the FACTS comicon organization where he also met the founder of  Broken Frontier and  shortly thereafter began doing headlines for this  news site. Later he  founded the website COMICSFORSINNERS which more resembles his prior BadGrrl fanclub.  Nowadays Richard  dabbles in Art Agency, sending out comic Press  Releases and since 2019 publishing various comic books.

J.L. Fox: Writer

A self taught creator that took lesson from Alan Moore’s: Writing for Comics and Ray Frensham’s book, Screenwriting. 

Fox’s diverse style can bring out both the best in his audience, or extract from them their darkest emotions and fears.  

“Laugh, and the world laughs with you; Weep and you weep alone.” —Ella Wheeler Wilcox

VINZ EL TABANAS: artist

Vinz El Tabanas discovered comic books through manga and US comic  books, before getting in the world of graffiti, tattoos and other graphical arts. His first publication is Le Miroir des templiers, both  issues have been published at Tartamudo Editions after which he switched  to The French Crow volume 4 and 5 at Réflexions. After this, he started  a complete story of The Creeps for a US editor. He has also  worked on various projects for Urban Rivals, Alien franchise, for  Legendary Encounters, Existenz X610z trading card, Arcana comics, Hammer light FX, Wireless Generation, Collision studio, Canal +, Millimages,  Golden moustache for Microsoft X-box One… and many other projects for  American editors, among which covers for Zenescope’s Wonderland and Lady Death...

Since 2015, he lives at Montreal and  work principaly in Videogames Industry, as concept Artist and  Storyboarder. For Ludia Inc., he contribute on the Battle Star  Galactica, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turles Legends, Dungeon & dragons:  Warriors of Waterdeep and Disney's Wonderfull World project. Since 2  years, he works now at BEHAVIOUR Interactive on the game DEAD by Daylight  and continues the freelance work for cool projects like :  Sisterhood!

http://vinzeltab.wix.com/creabox https://www.artstation.com/artist/vinz_el_tab

GUEST ARTISTS BIO's 

EELCO KOPER:

A self-taught Dutch comic artist from the North of the Netherlands (Grijpskerk) who publishes under his own independent label, Koper Comics. He is the creator of the superhero 'Powerbeast'. Koper Comics has published around 50 magazine-sized comics starring the beloved 'Powerbeast'. With the title  ‘Superhelden’ (=Superheroes) he brought translations of work by American artists like Paul Grist, Erik Larsen and Terry Moore to a Dutch audience. Eelco is currently working on his Superhero Daycare comic, which will launch very soon!

https://www.facebook.com/kopercomics

MARLON TEUNISSEN:

Marlon is an artist living in the tiny Netherlands. She sometimes creates artwork  for books and games and personal commissions, but mostly I create  personal art, comics and other art related things to make my dreams come  true and do what I love best; trying to bring my ideas and my fantasy  worlds to life!

etsy.com/shop/dreamchaserart

patreon.com/dreamchaserart

dreamchasergallery.com

http://www.facebook.com/#!/dreamchaser.art.5

www.instagram.com/dreamchaserart

DINESH VAN DEN BERGH: 

Dinesh van den Berg is an independent comic artist based in Holland. Though still an newbie talent, he has illustrated numerous comics for many small press publishers in the Netherlands such as Windmill-Comics and Comics of the West. Inspired by ancient mythology and current films Dinesh has a unique approach to depicting fast paced action and fighting scenes. Creating stories set in an ancient and strange past, and pitting massive armies against one another he is able to throw the reader straight into the conflict immersing them in the chaos.  His style mixes the japanese action manga and American superhero comics into a great blend of the two. In 2017 he released his first book “Drakan” where the epic scale of mass combat blends with ancient norse mythology introduced a unique world, first released in small segments in the Dutch anthology magazine “Holllandsch Metaal”.            If you are interested in seeing more of his work check him out at his links: https://www.instagram.com/dinocomics4ever/ http://dineshart.com/            If you’re interested in helping him develop more comics and getting more involved making the story then check out his Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/dinocomics4ever

FREE for All Physical Backers!!

The comicbook is all written, penciled and colored. This project is set up mostly for lettering, printing and shipping... and of course to have FUN with regular, variant and metal covers :) to be fair!

Questions about this project? Check out the FAQ

story:
FORSAKEN GODS

is a

60 page full colour comic book.

I'm looking to get this amazing comic printed and out into the world, and I'd like to involve you.

 

STRETCH GOALS!

  • $3,300 UNLOCKED- 4 more pages of art are added to the book, totaling 64 pages!
  • $5,500 - everyone gets an acrylic pin! early backers keep their unique pin reward.
  • $6,600 - Everyone gets extra trading cards! Early backers still keep their exclusive!
  • $7,700 - Early backers get their acrylic pin reward upgraded to hard enamel!
  • $8,800 - everyone gets a special Lithograph!
  • $350,000 - Face reveal?

ADD-ON PERKS!

Base tier now has Add-on perks!

Now you can add a little extra to your order.

Choose from four extra premium rewards upon check-out!

  • Original Sketch art - an original piece of pencil sketch art done to your request!
  • Original colour art - an original piece of full coloured art done to your request!
  • Acrylic standee - An acrylic standee of Skull knight himself! limit of 50
  • Variant trading card - Get an extra trading/tarot card of your choice!

You can choose between the following

Samara - the Historian

Gaurdian - The Sentry

PLUS

Derek - The Romantic

 

ABOUT THE PROJECT

FORSAKEN GODS tells the story of a young woman named Samara, an archaeologist in a fantasy world called Epic Earth, filled with monsters, dragons and magic. She's trying to find relics from a war that was waged between the gods. However, her expedition goes sideways, and she comes face to face with something she never anticipated.

 

THE CHARACTERS

 

SAMARA ANKMAH

An archaeologist fascinated with discovering the history of the fantasy world she lives in. Her only living relatives are her older brother and aging grandmother. During one of her expeditions she inadvertently awakens:

 

SKULL KNIGHT

A mysterious floating flaming skull encased in ancient armor, the Skull Knight is incredibly strong, has next to no vocabulary, and seems to be genuinely friendly despite his appearance and perchance for violence.

 

WHAT DO YOU GET IN RETURN?

60 pages colour cover and interior, behind the scenes concept art, lots of pin-ups from special guest artists.

 

Risks & Challenges

The book is all thumbed out and written, it merely needs to get cleaned up and polished before heading off to the printers. The only risks that I can see are if maybe I might get hit  by a bus and it crushes my drawing hand or something. In which case I can get a friend to help finish it, just because I hate having to make people wait for something they've already paid for.

LACKING IN FUNDS? THAT'S OKAY

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help!

Spread the word about this campaign! We live in the age of social media after all (right?), so sharing this with your friends on facebook, instagram or twitter can introduce it to someone new!

 

SAMPLE PAGES!

Here are some sample pages, all of the final pages will be in full colour when they go to print.

ABOUT THE

CREATOR

FresherLuke is the author and the

creator of the infamous graphic novel

Bikini Cowboy.

$5,500 - everyone gets an acrylic pin! early backers keep their unique pin reward.

$6,600 - Everyone gets extra trading cards! Early backers still keep their exclusive!

$7,700 - Early backers get their acrylic pin reward upgraded to hard enamel!

$8,800 - everyone gets a special Lithograph!

$350,000 - Face reveal?

story:
ETHAN VAN SCIVER’S CYBERFROG RETURNS!

I’m Ethan Van Sciver, a comic book artist and one of the creators behind many of your favorite DC COMICS, such as GREEN LANTERN, FLASH, SUPERMAN, BATMAN, and WONDER WOMAN!  I’ve spent the last 20 years working diligently at my craft, creating valuable characters and franchises for both Marvel and DC that have been spun off into other comics, films, cartoons and video games.  And it’s been fun, but ultimately, I don’t own any of these characters.   

 

I’m taking a step out into my own venture, and I’d like you to come along and support me!  I have a character called CYBERFROG, created back in 1993, that I do own, and that I strongly feel is due for a comeback!  I’ve had a story in mind for a decade, but now is the time.  

 

(APPLICABLE SALES TAX IS INCLUDED IN ALL TIER PRICES)

 

$90,000 STRETCH GOAL- CHROMIUM COVER! *UNLOCKED* All backers will receive their purchased copies of CYBERFROG:BLOODHONEY #1 with a beautiful shiny chromium enhanced cover!

$130,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED*- COLOR INTERIORS FOR CYBERFROG 1998 ASHCAN!  All backers at the $50 level and above will receive colorized Cyberfrog ASHCANS by KYLE RITTER instead of black and white!

$150,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED* - TWO TRADING CARDS!  Each backer at any level will receive a CYBERFROG and a SALAMANDROID trading card, complete with stats and information on the back!

$200,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED*- COLORIZED RE-RELEASE OF THE SUPER RARE 1998 CYBERFROG AMPHIBIONIX #1 ASHCAN FOR ALL $50+ BACKERS!

$250,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED* - COLORIST KYLE RITTER RECEIVES A $10,000 THANK YOU BONUS FROM THE FANS!

$275,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED*- CYBERFROG AND SALAMANDROID BOOKMARK FOR ALL BACKERS, ONE ADDED PER EACH COPY COMIC BOOK PURCHASED!

story:
Your favorite supernatural gangster is BACK on Indiegogo! JOHNNY PHANTASM in Devil's Night features an original NEW story in a 48 page OVERSIZED comic book! Riot Press, along with the Alterna Press's Printing Partnership Program, are bringing this story to you on classic newsprint!

 HAVE COMICS SHIPPED TO YOUR DOOR!!!

In this 48 page GIANT comic book Johnny Phantasm, demon mob boss, struggles to keep control of New Detroit...A city Johnny fought very hard to get under his control. Now in the year 1985 there is a bigger threat then ghosts, ghouls and gangsters...BIG government! Check out this beautifully illustrated book with art by Patrick Thomas Parnell and written by Evan Pozios(Time Grunts, Caliber Comics). Edited by Dr. Andrea Lorenzo Molinari (Scout Comics, Caliber Comics). 

If you love Halloween, if you love the 80's and if you love comics...this is for you!

This book is Beetlejuice meets Scarface. For fans of Batman, Joker, Daredevil, Dick Tracy, The Shadow and The Mask.             

                        

Gold Heist  $50 (Featured)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

  A Full House for $45 (Available in ALL IN!)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Baseball T-Shirt

 

Artwork:

 

Johnny Phantasm Collector's Glass Set with Holiday Card and Yule Poker Chip!

Great for a gift!!!

 

 

Stretch Goals:

$9k Stretch Goal                         Halloween Poker Chip (for everyone) UNLOCKED

$11k Stretch Goal                        Retro Garbage Pail Kids Trading Card (for everyone)UNLOCKED

$12k Stretch Goal                       Retro Garbage Pail Kids Trading Card(for everyone)UNLOCKED

$13k Stretch Goal                       Retro Garbage Pail Kids Trading Card(for everyone)UNLOCKED

$14k Stretch Goal                        Retro Garbage Pail Kids Trading Card(for everyone)UNLOCKED

$20k Stretch Goal                       The Toy at FAN FEST Poker Chip(for everyone)UNLOCKED

$25k Stretch Goal                       Over sized Poster(for everyone) Variant Cover Reveal!UNLOCKED

$30k Stretch Goal                        New Years 1986 Poker Chip (Collectors)(for everyone)

$35k Stretch Goal                        8 added pages of content!!!!!

EVERYONE GETS ALL 4 OF THESE TRADING CARDS & THE CECIL PUZZLE ON THEIR BACK

Every since the start we have been giving out poker chips with Johnny Phantasm... and this time is no exception!!! At the Stretch Goal of $9k you start collecting bank!!!

 

Evan K. Pozios is a professional writer and attorney from Detroit, MI. Most notably, Evan is the creator of Time Grunts, published by Caliber Comics.

 

Patrick Thomas Parnell is a professional illustrator and college instructor from Sarasota, FL. Patrick has worked on projects such as Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, Mega Man and Sonic the Hedgehog. 

 

Edited by Dr. Andrea Lorenzo Molinari (Scout Comics, Caliber Caliber), writer of The Shepherd (Caliber Comics). 

 

After successfully collaborating on Time Grunts for Caliber Comics, Patrick, Evan and Andrea are bringing back JOHNNY PHANTASM for a THIRD successful Campaign!!!

 

                                                      ORIGINAL PAGES FOR SALE!!!! (not in order)

When you order your page, message us and let us know what page you would like! They are numbered!

story:
My name is Gary Shipman, and I have been making art for 30 years working on comics, movies and other properties. I'm probably best known for my comic book series Pakkins' Land that was nominated for Eisner, Harvey, and Russ Manning Awards. My work has been published through Disney Publishing, Caliber Press, Image Comics, Alias Comics, Cryptozoic, and Zondervan. I have been exploring different styles of art throughout my adult life, with no formal art training. My wife Rhoda and I have beed married for 30 years and have 3  beautiful children.

I'm an artist who wants to share a little beauty where I can. You are the biggest part of what I do, my expression in art means nothing without your contribution. I do what I do for you.

Thank you.

New! 

 

Silver Surfer Perk!

Check out my Star Wars art perk. 

Secret Perks!

When you get any of my print perks I will send you a secret perk to add-on an original remark drawing to the print. 
Sample of some remark prints.

 

Original Pakkins' Land Comic Page!

 

INDIANA JONES COLLECTORS!

I'm making my Artist Profs available. There are only 4 left! This was an AMAZING job to work on an artist dream come true!  Check it out in the perks section.

 

STAR TREK HARDCOVER with Original Art Sketch!: 

JLA

story:
Hello, welcome to the PAKKINS' LAND OMNIBUS Indiegogo campaign. My name is Gary Shipman, and I have been making art for more than 30 years working on comics, movies and other properties. I'm probably best known for my comic book series PAKKINS' LAND that was nominated for Eisner (1998), Harvey, and Russ Manning Awards (1997).  

Amazing news fellow Pakinslanders!!!

We've hit our $19K stretch goal, and we're so close to the summit of reaching our big $20K goal!

King Aryah has put out the call to the kingdom far and wide to ask if you can help us in reaching this grand milestone. Our gratitude and thanks go out to all of you that have made the Pakkins' Land Omnibus Campaign a success thus far, but we need your help in giving us an extra boost past $20K. As a way of saying Thanks to all of our loyal Pakkins' Land supporters, we've come up with a special limited time program that we think you'll like.

Here's how it works - 
Refer family, friends, or anyone that you think may enjoy becoming part of the Pakkins' Land family and supporting this campaign, and if they become a backer, you will get a special, limited-edition Pakkins' Land Adventure Patch created to commemorate the Omnibus campaign! This is our way of saying Thanks for going the extra mile in making our $20K goal a reality! This patch is exclusive and only available to our supporters who make the referral. That's it. It's that easy! So put the call out far and wide to family and friends, and let's hit the $20K goal and beyond!

Stretch Goals!!

 

• 20K STRETCH GOAL  UNLOCKED! A new Princess Tavita trading card. 

• 17K STRETCH GOAL  Unlocked. All backers at the shippable perk level will receive an exclusive Pakkins' Land sticker.

• 16K STRETCH GOAL  Unlocked. A new Pakkins' Land Trading card.

• 15K STRETCH GOAL  Unlocked. Character profiles will be added to the Pakkins' Land Ominbus.  

• 13K STRETCH GOAL  Unlocked. A new FOIL Pakkins' Land Trading card.• 14K STRETCH GOAL  Unlocked. All backers receive a Thank You credit in the Pakkins' Land Omnibus. 

• 12K STRETCH GOAL  Unlocked. To All Hard Cover backer will get both the original 1998 edition and the new remastered pages in a PDF.

• 11K STRETCH GOAL  Unlocked. To All Hard Cover backer get Mike S. Miller Dust Jacket signing. 

• 10K STRETCH GOAL  Unlocked. For All Hard Cover backers Mike S. Miller will be creating an Exclusive wraparound dust jacket cover.

• 5K STRETCH GOAL  Unlocked. A new Pakkins' Land Trading card.

My work has been published through Disney Publishing, Caliber Press, Image Comics, Alias Comics, Cryptozoic, Cider Mill Press, and Zondervan. 

I have been exploring different styles of art throughout my life, with no formal art training. My wife Rhoda and I have been married for 31 years and have 3 beautiful children.  Follow along as a series of strange events brings Paul to a fantastic world called "Pakkins' Land". There he meets a mysterious giant Eagle of light who gives him a feather as a token of friendship. At the touch of this feather, Paul knows it is something special, and as the Eagle mysteriously vanishes, Paul realizes that he is lost in this new world. Soon Paul is befriended by extraordinary talking animals, who set off together to find the long lost King Aryah, and try to return Paul to his own land. The pathway is not without danger, and thus begins the adventure of this ALL AGES story called Pakkins' Land. 

Now for the first time ever the complete PAKKINS' LAND comic series is offered in a large 11" x 8 Hard Cover size and a 9" x 6" Soft Cover, presented in it original Nori, black and white, includes a foreword by comic veteran JIM KRUEGER. When this campaign reaches its goal of 10K All Hard Cover backers will receive an exclusive wraparound dust jacket cover by artist Mike S. Miller. 

 This series has been something that is near and dear to me and my family for many years and I wish to share all the wonder, thrills, and adventure with all of you.  You are the biggest part of what I am doing, my expression in story and art mean nothing without your contribution. I do what I do for you.

 

What We Need & What You Get

My goal is to provide a quality product for you and I hope that you are as excited about this campaign as I am. We need enough for the printing, distribution, and fees to create the PAKKINS' LAND OMNIBUS. Anything beyond that will help to make it possible for me to focus on creating new story and art for the future issues of my Pakkins' Land comic book series.

We're keeping the perks simple. Just click on a perk on the right to open its details.

The Pakkins' Land Coloring book!

For the fist time ever you can get the Pakkins' Land Coloring book! This is a 45 page coloring book filled with great images from Pakkins' Land.  You will have hours of fun bringing your own personal coloring touch to the Pakkins' Land art. Then enter your best work in the Pakkins' Land Coloring book contest on my YouTube channel!

FREE Comic!

Everyday is Free Comic Day here. Just click the link to get your FREE digital copy of the 1st issue of Pakkins' Land.
https://www.dropbox.com/s/3im5cwaqylrtjsx/Pakkins-Land-ISS01.pdf?dl=0 

 

Bookmarks 

Own Original Art Page!

At the "Original Art" perk level

 

You Get a Set of 13 Trading Cards! 

 

Own Original Cover Art!

At the "Original Cover Art" level

 

Get Vintage Pakkins' Land stuff!

At the "VINTAGE PAKKINS' LAND STUFF" level 

• 25K STRETCH GOAL  To be announced.  

• 30K STRETCH GOAL  To be announced.  

• 40K STRETCH GOAL  To be announced.  


 

STAR TREK HARDCOVER with SKETCH!:  You can find the Star Trek book here. https://igg.me/at/GaryShipman/x/18833604

Ways You Can Help

Please share and get the word out! Make some noise about The PAKKINS' LAND OMNIBUS campaign. Just hit the Indiegogo share buttons at the top!

Gary
God bless you all.
I just can't thank you enough.
Thank you for taking the time to look things over here.

The pathway is not without danger, and thus begins the adventure of this ALL AGES story called Pakkins' Land. Now for the first time ever the complete PAKKINS' LAND comic series is offered in a large 11" x 8 Hard Cover size and a 9" x 6" Soft Cover, presented in it original Nori, black and white, includes a foreword by comic veteran JIM KRUEGER. When this campaign reaches its goal of 10K All Hard Cover backers will receive an exclusive wraparound dust jacket cover by artist  Mike S. Miller. 
 This series has been something that is near and dear to me and my family for many years and I wish to share all the wonder, thrills, and adventure with all of you.  You are the biggest part of what I am doing, my expression in story and art mean nothing without your contribution. I do what I do for you.
 
What We Need & What You Get

My goal is to provide a quality product for you and I hope that you are as excited about this campaign as I am. We need enough for the printing, distribution, and fees to create the PAKKINS' LAND OMNIBUS. Anything beyond that will help to make it possible for me to focus on creating new story and art for the future issues of my Pakkins' Land comic book series.
We're keeping the perks simple. Just click on a perk on the right to open its details.
The Pakkins' Land Coloring book!

For the fist time ever you can get the Pakkins' Land Coloring book! This is a 45 page coloring book filled with great images from Pakkins' Land.  You will have hours of fun bringing your own personal coloring touch to the Pakkins' Land art. Then enter your best work in the Pakkins' Land Coloring book contest on my YouTube channel!
